S06psp_4u:198: ity ākārāḥ sarvākārajñatādhiṣṭhānāḥ ity uktā ākārāḥ
S06psp_4u:199: atha khalu śakrasya devānām indrasyaitad abhavat,
S06psp_4u:200: pūrvajinakṛtādhikārās te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca bhaviṣyanti,
S06psp_4u:201: yeṣām iyaṃ prajñāpāramitāśrotrāvabhāsam āgamiṣyati. tathāgatāvaropitakuśalamūlās te sattvā bhaviṣyanti,
S06psp_4u:202: yeṣām iyaṃ prajñāpāramitāśrotrāvabhāsam āgamiṣyati. kalyāṇamitraparigṛhītās te sattvā bhaviṣyanti,
S06psp_4u:203: yeṣām iyaṃ prajñāpāramitāśrotrāvabhāsam āgamiṣyati. kaḥ punar vādo ya udgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyanti,
S06psp_4u:204: udgṛhya dhārayitvā vācayitvā paryavāpya tathatvāya pratipatsyante,
S06psp_4u:205_0: bahubuddhaparyupāsitās te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca bhaviṣyanti. ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ
S06psp_4u:205_1: śrutvā udgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyanti,
S06psp_4u:206_0: udgṛhya dhārayitvā vācayitvā paryavāpya tathatvāya pratipatsyante paripṛṣṭhāś ca
S06psp_4u:206_1: pūrvakā api taiḥ kulaputraiḥ kuladuhitṛbhiś ca tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ
S06psp_4u:207: ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ śrutvā nottrasiṣyanti na saṃtrasiṣyanti na saṃtrāsam āpatsyante. bahubuddhakoṭīṣu te dānapāramitāyāṃ caritāḥ,
S06psp_4u:208: evaṃ śīlapāramitāyāṃ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ vīryapāramitāyāṃ dhyānapāramitāyāṃ bahubuddhakoṭīṣu te prajñāpāramitāyāṃ (PSP_4:9)
S06psp_4u:209: caritā, ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ śrutvā nottrasiṣyanti na saṃtrasiṣyanti na saṃtrāsam āpatsyante.
S06psp_4u:210: atha khalu āyuṣmāñ cchāriputro bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_4u:211: ye bhagavan kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā imām evaṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ śrutvā nottrasiṣyanti na saṃtrasiṣyanti na saṃtrāsam āpatsyante,
S06psp_4u:212: śrutvā ca udgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyanti,
S06psp_4u:213: yathā avinivartanīyā bodhisattvā mahāsattvās tathā te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaro vā dhārayitavyāḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_4u:214_0: gambhīrā bhagavan prajñāpāramitā. na khalu pūrvam acaritena ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu śakyeyaṃ
S06psp_4u:214_1: gambhīrā prajñāpāramitā adhimoktum. ye punar bhagavan kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaro vā
S06psp_4u:214_2: imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ pratikṣeptavyāṃ maṃsyante pūrvāntato 'pi taiḥ kulaputraiḥ
S06psp_4u:214_3: kuladuhitṛbhiś ca iyaṃ gambhīrā prajñāpāramitā pratiksiptā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_4u:215_0: tathā hi teṣāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṛṇāṃ cāsyāṃ gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ nāsti
S06psp_4u:215_1: śraddhā nāsti prasādo nāsti prema nāsty adhimuktis taiḥ kulaputraiḥ kuladuhitṛbhiś
S06psp_4u:215_2: ca na buddhā vā bodhisattvā vā pratyekabuddhā vā śrāvakā vā paripraśnīkṛtāḥ,
S06psp_4u:246: atha khalu śakro devānām indra āyuṣmantaṃ śāriputram etad avocat:
S06psp_4u:247: gambhīrā bhadanta śāriputra prajñāpāramitā. kim atrāścaryaṃ syāt?
S06psp_4u:248_0: ya imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ pūrvānte 'pi nādhimuktā bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ
S06psp_4u:255: daśatathāgatabaleṣu caturṣu vaiśāradyeṣu catasṛṣu pratisaṃvitsu pañcasv abhijñāsu nādhimuktāḥ,
S06psp_4u:256_0: aṣṭādaśasv āveṇikeṣu buddhadharmeṣu nādhimuktāḥ. ye pratikṣipeyur iti nātrāścaryam.
S06psp_4u:256_1: namaskaromi bhagavatyai prajñāpāramitāyai sarvajñajñānasya sa namaskāraṃ karoti yaḥ
S06psp_4u:257: atha khalu bhagavān śakraṃ devānām indram etad avocat:
S06psp_4u:258: evam etat kauśikaivam etat. sarvajñajñānasya sa namaskāraṃ karoti,
S06psp_4u:259: yaḥ prajñāpāramitāyā namaskāraṃ karoti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_4u:260: ato nirjātā hi kauśika buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ sarvākārajñatā,
S06psp_4u:261: sarvākārajñatānirjātā ca prajñāpāramitā prabhāvyante. sarvajñatāṃ kauśikātikramitukāmena kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthātavyam,
S06psp_4u:262_0: evaṃ mārgajñatāyāṃ sthātukāmena sarvākārajñatājñānam utpādayitukāmena sarvavāsanānusaṃdhikleśān
S06psp_4u:262_2: kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthātavyam,
S06psp_4u:263: evaṃ srotaāpattiphale sattvān sthāpayitukāmena sakṛdāgāmiphale anāgāmiphale arhattve sattvān sthāpayitukāmena pratyekāyāṃ bodhau sattvān pratiṣṭhāpayitukāmena,
S06psp_4u:265: bhikṣusaṃghaṃ parikarṣayitukāmena iha bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yogam āpattavyam.
S06psp_4u:267: evam ukte śakro devānām indro bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_4u:268: kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ pratiṣṭhito bhavati?
S06psp_4u:273: kathaṃ vā prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann adhyātmaśūnyatāyāṃ yogam āpadyate yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāyāṃ yogam āpadyate?
S06psp_4u:274: kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāñ caran saptatriṃsadbodhipakṣeṣu dharmeṣu yogam āpadyate?
S06psp_4u:275: evam apramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattiṣu. kathaṃ śūnyatānimittāpraṇihiteṣu yogam āpadyate?
S06psp_4u:276: evam aṣṭavimokṣeṣu navānupūrvavihārasamāpattiṣu yogam āpadyate. katham abhijñāsu yogam āpadyate?
S06psp_4u:277: evaṃ daśasu tathāgatabaleṣu caturṣu vaiśāradyeṣu catasṛṣu pratisaṃvitsu. katham aṣṭādaśasv āveṇikeṣu buddhadharmeṣu prajñāpāramitāyāñ caran yogam āpadyante bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ?
S06psp_4u:278: evam ukte bhagavān śakraṃ devānām indram etad avocat:
S06psp_4u:279_0: sādhu sādhu kauśika sādhu khalu punas tvaṃ kauśika yas tvaṃ tathāgatam etam arthaṃ
S06psp_4u:279_1: paripraśnīkartavyaṃ manyase. idam api te kauśika buddhānubhāvena pratibhānam utpannam.
S06psp_4u:279_2: tena hi kauśika śṛṇu sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasikuru bhāṣiṣye 'haṃ te. iti catvāraḥ prayoktākāraḥ
S06psp_4u:280: iha kauśika bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran rūpe na tiṣṭhati,
S06psp_4u:281: yadā rūpe na tiṣṭhati tadā rūpe na yogam āpadyate,
S06psp_4u:283: vijñāne na tiṣṭhati yadā vijñāne na tiṣṭhati tadā vijñāne na yogam āpadyate. cakṣuṣi na tiṣṭhati,
S06psp_4u:284: evaṃ śrotre ghrāṇe jihvāyāṃ kāye manasi na tiṣṭhati,
S06psp_4u:285: evaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yogam āpadyate. rūpe na tiṣṭhati,
S06psp_4u:286: evaṃ śabde gandhe rase spraṣṭavye dharmeṣu na tiṣṭhati,
S06psp_4u:287: evaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yogam āpadyate. cakṣurvijñāne na tiṣṭhati,
S06psp_4u:293: evaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yogam āpadyate. pṛthivīdhātau na tiṣṭhati,
S06psp_4u:296: evaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yogam āpadyate. avidyāyāṃ na tiṣṭhati,
S06psp_4u:297: evaṃ saṃskāreṣu vijñāne nāmarūpe ṣaḍāyatane sparśe vedanāyāṃ tṛṣṇāyām upādāne bhave jātau jarāmaraṇaśokaparidevaduḥkhadaurmanasyopāyāseṣu na tiṣṭhati,
S06psp_4u:298: evaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yogam āpadyate. dānapāramitāyāṃ na tiṣṭhati,
S06psp_4u:299: evaṃ śīle kṣāntau vīrye dhyāne prajñāpāramitāyāṃ na tiṣṭhati,
S06psp_4u:300: evaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yogam āpadyate. adhyātmaśūnyatāyāṃ na tiṣṭhati,
S06psp_4u:301: evaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yogam āpadyate yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāyāṃ na tiṣṭhati,
S06psp_4u:302: evaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yogam āpadyate. smṛtyupasthāneṣu na tiṣṭhati,
S06psp_4u:303: evaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yogam āpadyate. evaṃ samyakprahāṇarddhipādendriyabalabodhyaṅgamārgeṣu na tiṣṭhati,
S06psp_4u:304_0: evaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yogam āpadyate. evaṃ caturṣv apramāṇeṣu caturṣu dhyāneṣu catasṛṣv
S06psp_4u:304_1: ārūpyasamāpattiṣu pañcasv abhijñāsu śūnyatānimittāpraṇihiteṣv aṣṭāsu vimokṣeṣu navasv
S06psp_4u:305: evaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yogam āpadyate. evaṃ daśasu tathāgatabaleṣu vaiśāradyeṣu pratisaṃvitsv aṣṭādaśasv āveṇikeṣu buddhadharmeṣu na tiṣṭhati,
S06psp_4u:306: evaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yogam āpadyate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_4u:307: tathā hi sa rūpaṃ nopalabhate yatrāvatiṣṭheta yatra vā yogam āpadyate,
S06psp_4u:309: vijñānaṃ nopalabhate yatrāvatiṣṭheta yatra vā yogam āpadyate,
S06psp_4u:310_0: evaṃ dhātūn āyatanāni pratītyasamutpādāṅgāni pāramitāḥ saptatriṃśadbodhipakṣān dharmān
S06psp_4u:310_3: catasraḥ pratisaṃvido 'ṣṭādaśāveṇikān buddhadharmān nopalabhate yatrāvatiṣṭheta yatra vā yogam āpadyate.
S06psp_4u:312: punar aparaṃ kauśika bodhisattvo mahāsattvo rūpe na yujyate,
S06psp_4u:313: yad rūpe na yujyate evaṃ rūpe yogam āpadyate,
S06psp_4u:318: buddhadharmeṣu na yujyate yad buddhadharmeṣu na yujyate,
S06psp_4u:319: evaṃ buddhadharmeṣu yogam āpadyate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_4u:320: tathā hi sa bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ pūrvāntato rūpaṃ nopalabhate,
S06psp_4u:326_0: madhyato vijñānaṃ nopalabhate. evaṃ dhātūn āyatanāni pratītyasamutpādāṅgāni pāramitāḥ
S06psp_4u:326_2: aṣṭau vimokṣān navānupūrvavihārasamāpattyabhijñāḥ sarvaśūnyatāḥ sarvasamādhīn sarvadhāraṇīmukhāni
S06psp_4u:329: atha khalv āyuṣmān śāriputro bhagavantam etad avocat: gambhīrā bhagavan prajñāpāramitā.
S06psp_4u:330: bhagavān āha: rūpatathatāgambhīratayā śāriputra gambhīrā prajñāpāramitā,
S06psp_4u:335: bhagavān āha: rūpaduravagāhatayā śāriputra duravagāhā prajñāpāramitā,
S06psp_4u:337_0: vijñānaduravagāhatayā śāriputra duravagāhā prajñāpāramitā. evaṃ dhātvāyatanapratītyasamutpādaḥ
S06psp_4u:344: śāriputra āha: kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati?
S06psp_4u:346: sacec chāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran rūpaṃ gambhīram iti na carati carati prajñāpāramitāyāṃ,
S06psp_4u:348_0: vijñānaṃ gambhīram iti na carati carati prajñāpāramitāyām. evaṃ dhātvāyatanapratītyasamutpādapāramitābodhipakṣyadharmāryasatyāpramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattyaṣṭavimokṣanavānupūrvavihārasamāpattiśūnyatānimittāpraṇihitābhijñāsarvasamādhisarvadhāraṇīmukhadaśabalavaiśāradyapratisaṃvidāveṇikabuddhadharmā
S06psp_4u:348_1: gambhīrā iti na carati carati prajñāpāramitāyām. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_4u:349: tathā hi yā śāriputra yāvad buddhadharmāṇāṃ gambhīratā na te buddhadharmāḥ.
S06psp_4u:351: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran rūpaṃ duravagāham iti na carati carati prajñāpāramitāyāṃ,
S06psp_4u:353_0: vijñānaṃ duravagāham iti na carati carati prajñāpāramitāyām. evaṃ dhātvāyatanapratītyasamutpādapāramitāsarvaśūnyatāsarvasamādhisarvadhāraṇīmukhabodhipakṣyadharmāryasatyāpramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattiśūnyatānimittāpraṇihitābhijñādaśabalavaiśāradyapratisaṃvidāveṇikabuddhadharmā
S06psp_4u:353_1: duravagāhā iti na carati carati prajñāpāramitāyām. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_4u:354: tathā hi yā śāriputra yāvad buddhadharmāṇāṃ duravagāhatā na te buddhadharmāḥ.
S06psp_4u:356: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ (PSP_4:15)
S06psp_4u:357: caran rūpam apramāṇam iti na carati carati prajñāpāramitāyāṃ,
S06psp_4u:359_0: vijñānam apramāṇam iti na carati carati prajñāpāramitāyām. evaṃ dhātvāyatanapratītyasamutpādapāramitābodhipakṣyadharmāryasatyāpramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattyaṣṭavimokṣanavānupūrvavihārasamāpattiśūnyatānimittāpraṇihitābhijñāsarvaśūnyatāsarvasamādhisarvadhāraṇīmukhadaśabalavaiśāradyapratisaṃvidāveṇikabuddhadharmā
S06psp_4u:359_1: apramāṇā iti na carati carati prajñāpāramitāyāṃ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_4u:360: tathā hi yā śāriputra yāvad buddhadharmāpramāṇatā na te buddhadharmāḥ.
S06psp_4u:363_0: yathā gambhīreyaṃ bhagavan prajñāpāramitā duravagāhā apramāṇā iyaṃ bhagavan prajñāpāramitā
S06psp_4u:363_1: tathā navayānasaṃprasthitānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ purato na vaktavyā mā
S06psp_4u:363_2: te imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ śrutvā uttrasiṣuḥ saṃtrasiṣuḥ saṃtrāsam āpatsyante.
S06psp_4u:363_3: avinivartanīyasya yaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya purato bhāṣitavyo sa imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ
S06psp_4u:363_4: śrutvā nottrasiṣyati na saṃtrasiṣyati na saṃtrāsam āpatsyate na kāṅkṣayiṣyati na nirvicikitsiṣyati,
S06psp_4u:365: atha khalu śakro devānām indra āyuṣmantaṃ śāriputram etad avocat:
S06psp_4u:366: saced bhadanta śāriputra navayānasaṃprasthitasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya purata iyaṃ gambhīrā prajñāpāramitā bhāṣyeta ko doṣaḥ syāt?
S06psp_4u:368_0: sacet kauśika navayānasaṃprasthitasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya purata iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā
S06psp_4u:368_1: bhāṣyeta uttrasyeta saṃtrasyeta saṃtrāsam āpadyeta pratibādhyeta pratikṣipet. nādhimucyeta
S06psp_4u:368_2: sthānam etat kauśika vidyate yas sa navayānasaṃprasthito bodhisattvo mahāsattva imāṃ
S06psp_4u:369: sa kṛcchreṇa cireṇānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyeta. iti kṛcchre cirābhisaṃbodhaprayogaḥ
S06psp_4u:371: santi punar bhadanta śāriputra avyākṛtā bodhisattvā mahāsattvā ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ śrutvā nottrasiṣyanti na saṃtrasiṣyanti na saṃtrāsam āpatsyante.
S06psp_4u:373: na te kauśika bodhisattvā mahāsattvāś cireṇa vyākaraṇaṃ pratilapsyante anuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ. ya imāṃ (PSP_4:16)
S06psp_4u:374_0: prajñāpāramitāṃ śrutvā nottrasiṣyanti na saṃtrasiṣyanti na saṃtrāsam āpatsyante.
S06psp_4u:374_1: te ekaṃ vā dvau vā trīn vā tathāgatān atikramiṣyanti. tato vyākaraṇaṃ pratilapsyante
S06psp_4u:375: atha khalu bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ śāriputram āmantrayate sma: evam etac chāriputraivam etat,
S06psp_4u:376_0: cirayānasaṃprasthitās te śāriputra bodhisattvā mahāsattvā bhaviṣyanti. ciracaritāḥ
S06psp_4u:376_1: ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu bahubuddhaparyupāsitās te śāriputra bodhisattvā mahāsattvā ya imāṃ
S06psp_4u:376_2: gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ śrutvā nottrasiṣyanti na saṃtrasiṣyanti na saṃtrāsam āpatsyante.
S06psp_4u:376_3: uttare ca śrutvā udgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti yathopadiṣṭāyāṃ
S06psp_4u:377: atha khalv āyuṣmān śāriputro bhagavantam etad avocat: pratibhāti me bhagavan pratibhāti me sugata.
S06psp_4u:380: tadyathāpi nāma bhagavan svapnāntaragato mahāyānasaṃprasthitaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayet,
S06psp_4u:381: dhyānapāramitāṃ vīryapāramitāṃ kṣāntipāramitāṃ śīlapāramitāṃ dānapāramitāṃ bhāvayet,
S06psp_4u:383: veditavyam etad bhagavann abhyāsannī bhavaty ayaṃ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā anuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ. kaḥ punar vādo?
S06psp_4u:385: dhyānapāramitāṃ vīryapāramitāṃ kṣāntipāramitāṃ śīlapāramitāṃ dānapāramitāṃ bhāvayet,
S06psp_4u:386: veditavyam etad bhagavann abhyāsannī bhavaty ayaṃ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā anuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ. iti vyākaraṇalābhaprayogaḥ
S06psp_4u:387: paripakvakuśalamūlās te bhagavan kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca bhaviṣyanti,
S06psp_4u:388: ya imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ lapsyante śravaṇāya śrutvā ca pratipatsyante. cirayānasaṃprasthitās te bhagavan kulaputrā kuladuhitaraś ca bhaviṣyanti,
S06psp_4u:389: avaropitakuśalamūlā bahubuddhaparyupāsitāḥ kalyāṇamitraparigṛhītās te bhagavan kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca bhaviṣyanti,
S06psp_4u:390_0: ya imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ śrutvā udgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti
S06psp_4u:390_1: paryavāpsyanti yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyanti. abhyāsannās te bhagavan kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś
S06psp_4u:390_2: ca bhaviṣyanty anuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodhervyākaraṇasya vyākariṣyanti vā, (PSP_4:17)
S06psp_4u:391: avinivartanīyā vā te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś cānuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodher,
S06psp_4u:392: yeṣāṃ svayam iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā upapatsyate upapannāṃ ca satīm udgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyanti. ity avinivartanīyaprayogaḥ
S06psp_4u:393: tadyathāpi nāma bhagavan puruṣo yojanaśatikād aṭavīkāntārān niṣkrāmet,
S06psp_4u:394_1: niṣkrāmen niṣkramya paśyed grāmasya nagarasya nigamasya vā pūrvāni nimittāni gopālakān
S06psp_4u:394_2: vā paśupālakān vā sīmā vā ārāmān vā vanāni vā udyānāni vā udyānanimittāni vā grāmān
S06psp_4u:394_3: vā nagarāṇi vā nigamān vā rājadhānīn vā rāṣṭrāṇi vā pūrvanimittāni grāmasya nagarasya
S06psp_4u:394_4: nigamasya vā dṛṣṭvaivaṃ bhavati yādṛśānīmāni pūrvanimittāni dṛśyante abhyāsanna ito
S06psp_4u:394_5: grāmo vā nagaraṃ vā nigamaṃ vā rājadhānyo vā rāṣṭrāṇi vā bhaviṣyanti. sa āśvāsaprāpto bhavet,
S06psp_4u:395_0: na cāsya bhūyo bhavati caurabhayaṃ vā caṇḍālabhayaṃ vā caṇḍamṛgabhayaṃ vā bubhukṣābhayaṃ
S06psp_4u:395_1: vā pipāsābhayaṃ vā. evam eva bhagavan yasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya svayam iyaṃ
S06psp_4u:395_2: gambhīrā prajñāpāramitā upapatsyate upapannāṃ ca satīm udgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati
S06psp_4u:396_0: veditavyam etad bhagavann abhyāsanno 'yaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhaviṣyati vyākaraṇasyānuttarāyāḥ
S06psp_4u:396_1: samyaksaṃbodher na cireṇābhisaṃbhotsyate. tena ca bodhisattvena mahāsattvena na bhetavyaṃ
S06psp_4u:396_2: śrāvakabhūmer vā pratyekabuddhabhūmer vā. tat kasya hetor?
S06psp_4u:397: imāni tāni pūrvanimittāni yad utemāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo labhate darśanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya śravaṇāya.
S06psp_4u:398: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ śāriputram etad avocat:
S06psp_4u:399: evam etac chāriputraivam etat. iti niryāṇaprayogaḥ
S06psp_4u:400: pratibhātu te śāriputra bhūyasyā mātrayā buddhānubhāvena.
S06psp_4u:401: śāriputra āha: tadyathā pi nāma bhagavan puruṣo mahāsamudraṃ draṣṭukāmo bhavet,
S06psp_4u:402: sa gacchet mahāsamudraṃ darśanāya yathā yathā gacchet mahāsamudraṃ tathā tathā paśyet stambaṃ vā stambanimittaṃ vā parvataṃ vā parvatanimittaṃ vā,
S06psp_4u:403: tenaivaṃ veditavyaṃ dūre ito mahāsamudro nāsanna (PSP_4:18)
S06psp_4u:405: na hi mahāsamudrasyābhyāse kaścit stambo vā stambanimittaṃ vā parvato vā parvatanimittaṃ vā dṛśyante. tadyathāpi nāma bhagavan puruṣo mahāsamudraṃ draṣṭukāmo bhavet,
S06psp_4u:406: sa yathā yathā gacchet mahāsamudraṃ darśanāya tathā tathā na paśyet stambaṃ vā stambanimittaṃ vā parvataṃ vā parvatanimittaṃ vā,
S06psp_4u:407: tasyaivaṃ bhavati na dūre ito mahāsamudra āsanna ito mahāsamudraḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_4u:408: na hi mahāsamudrasyāsanne kaścit stambo vā stambanimittaṃ vā parvato vā parvatanimittaṃ vā dṛśyate,
S06psp_4u:409: kiṃ cāpi sa puruṣaś cakṣuṣā mahāsamudran na paśyati. atha ca punaḥ sa niṣṭhāṃ gacchati,
S06psp_4u:411: neto bhūyo dūre mahāsamudra iti. evam eva bhagavaṃs tena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena evaṃ veditavyam,
S06psp_4u:412: imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ śṛṇutā udgṛhṇatā dhārayatā vācayatā paryavāpnuvatā yoniśo manasikurvatā,
S06psp_4u:413_0: evaṃ cintayitavyaṃ kiṃ cāpy ahaṃ tena bhagavatā na saṃmukhaṃ vyākṛto 'nuttarāyāṃ
S06psp_4u:413_1: samyaksaṃbodhau iyadbhiḥ kalpair iyadbhiḥ kalpaśatair iyadbhiḥ kalpasahasrair iyadbhiḥ
S06psp_4u:413_2: kalpaśatasahasrair iyadbhiḥ kalpakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrais tvam anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim
S06psp_4u:414: atha ca punar bodhisattvena mahāsattvena evaṃ veditavyam,
S06psp_4u:415: āsannībhūto 'smy anuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodher vyākaraṇasyeti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_4u:416_0: tathā hy aham imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ labhe darśanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya
S06psp_4u:416_1: śravaṇāya śrutvā codgṛhṇāmi dhārayāmi vācayāmi paryavāpnomi yoniśaś ca manasikaromi.
S06psp_4u:417_0: tadyathāpi nāma bhagavan vasante pratyupasthite śīrṇaparṇapalāśeṣu stambheṣu ākarajāteṣu
S06psp_4u:417_1: veditavyaṃ jāmbūdvīpakair manuṣyair netaś cireṇa patrāṇi ca puṣpāṇi ca phalāni ca
S06psp_4u:418: imāni tāni pūrvanimittāni stambeṣu dṛśyante netaś cireṇa patrāṇi ca puṣpāṇi ca phalāni ca prādurbhaviṣyanti,
S06psp_4u:419: āttamanaskā jāmbūdvīpakā manuṣyā bhaviṣyanti tāni ca pūrvanimittāni dṛṣṭvā stambeṣu,
S06psp_4u:420: evam eva bhagavan yo bodhisattvo mahāsattva imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ labhate darśanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya śravanāya śrutvā (PSP_4:19)
S06psp_4u:421: codgṛhṇāti dhārayati vācayati paryavāpsyati yoniśaś ca manasikaroti paripakvakuśalamūlaḥ sa bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo veditavyaḥ,
S06psp_4u:422_0: bahubuddhaparyupāsitaḥ sa bhagavan kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā veditavyaḥ. veditavyam
S06psp_4u:422_1: etad bhagavaṃs tena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena pūrvakair eva kuśalamūlair upanīto
S06psp_4u:423_0: yo 'ham imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ labhe darśanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya śravaṇāya
S06psp_4u:423_1: yathopadiṣṭāyāṃ ca prajñāpāramitāyāṃ pratipadyeyaṃ tatra devaputrāḥ pūrvabuddhadarśino
S06psp_4u:423_2: bhavanti. te pramuditāḥ prītisaumanasyajātāḥ pūrvakāṇām api bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānām
S06psp_4u:423_3: imāny eva pūrvanimittāni abhūvan vyākaraṇāya na cireṇāyaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo
S06psp_4u:425: tadyathāpi nāma bhagavan strīgurviṇī sā yathā yathā āsannaprasavā bhavati tathā tathāsyāḥ kāyo veṣṭate 'dhimātraṃ ca kāye vedanāklamathaś ca jāyate,
S06psp_4u:430: tābhir vedanābhir vartamānābhir alpabhāṣyā ca bhavati,
S06psp_4u:432_0: tena pūrvakeṇāyoniśomanasikāreṇāsevitena bhāvitena niṣevitena imām evaṃrūpāṃ vedanāṃ
S06psp_4u:432_1: pratyanubhavāmīti. veditavyam evaṃ tato 'nyābhiḥ strībhir yādṛśāny asyāḥ striyo nimittāni
S06psp_4u:432_2: dṛśyante na cireṇaiveyaṃ strī prasaviṣyati. evam eva bhagavan bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānām
S06psp_4u:432_4: paripakvakuśalamūlānām iyaṃ gambhīrā prajñāpāramitā upapatsyate upapannāṃ ca satīm
S06psp_4u:432_5: udgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyanti,
S06psp_4u:433: veditavyam etan na cireṇaiṣāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ vyākaraṇaṃ bhaviṣyati anuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ.
S06psp_4u:435: sādhu sādhu śāriputra idam api te śāriputra buddhānubhāvena pratibhānam utpannam. iti kṣiprābhisaṃbodhaprayogaḥ
S06psp_4u:436: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_4u:437: āścaryaṃ bhagavan yāvad anugṛhītāḥ suparīttāś ceme bodhisattvā mahāsattvās (PSP_4:20)
S06psp_4u:440_0: tathā hi subhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvā bahujanahitāya bahujanasukhāya pratipannā
S06psp_4u:440_1: lokānukampāyai mahato janakāyasyārthāya hitāya sukhāya devānāñ ca manuṣyānāñ cānuttarāyai
S06psp_4u:440_2: samyaksaṃbodhaye pratiṣṭhante bodhisattvacaryāñ caranto 'nekāni sattvaśatāni anekāni
S06psp_4u:440_3: sattvasahasrāṇi anekāni sattvaśatasahasrāṇi anekāni sattvakoṭiniyutaśatasahasrāṇi anugrahīṣyanti,
S06psp_4u:441: caturbhiḥ saṃgrahavastubhir dānena priyavadyena arthacaryayā samānārthatayā daśakuśaleṣu karmapatheṣu samādāpayanti,
S06psp_4u:442_0: caturṣu dhyāneṣu caturṣv apramāṇeṣu catasṛṣv ārūpyasamāpattiṣu samādāpayanti. ātmanā
S06psp_4u:442_1: caiteṣu dharmeṣu pratiṣṭhitā bhavanti. ātmanā ca dānapāramitāyāṃ caranti parāṃś ca
S06psp_4u:442_2: dānapāramitāyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpayanti. ātmanā ca śīlapāramitāyāṃ caranti parāṃś ca śīlapāramitāyāṃ
S06psp_4u:442_3: pratiṣṭhāpayanti. ātmanā ca kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ caranti parāṃś ca kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ
S06psp_4u:442_4: pratiṣṭhāpayanti. ātmanā ca vīryapāramitāyāṃ caranti parāṃś ca vīryapāramitāyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpayanti.
S06psp_4u:442_5: ātmanā ca dhyānapāramitāyāṃ caranti parāṃś ca dhyānapāramitāyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpayanti.
S06psp_4u:442_6: ātmanā ca prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caranti parāṃś ca prajñāpāramitāyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpayanti.
S06psp_4u:442_7: te ca prajñāpāramitām āgamya upāyakauśalyena sattvān srotaāpattiphale pratiṣṭhāpayanti
S06psp_4u:442_8: na cātmanā sākṣāt kurvanti. evaṃ sakṛdāgāmiphale anāgāmiphale arhattve,
S06psp_4u:443_0: pratyekāyāṃ bodhau pratiṣṭhāpayanti na cātmanā pratyekāṃ bodhiṃ sākṣāt kurvanti.
S06psp_4u:443_1: ātmanā cāvinivartanīyāṃ bhūmim ākrāmanti parāṃś cāvinivartanīyabhūmau pratiṣṭhāpayanti.
S06psp_4u:444_0: anyāṃś ca bodhisattvān buddhakṣetrapariśuddhau samādāpayanti. ātmanā ca sattvān paripācayanti
S06psp_4u:444_1: parāṃś ca sattvaparipāke samādāpayanti. ātmanā cābhijñā utpādayanti parāṃś cābhijñāprāptaye
S06psp_4u:444_2: samādāpayanti. ātmanā ca dhāraṇīmukhaṃ pariśodhayanti parān api dhāraṇīmukhapariśuddhaye
S06psp_4u:444_3: samādāpayanti. ātmanā ca pratibhānasaṃpadaṃ pratilabhante parān api pratibhānasaṃpadi
S06psp_4u:444_4: samādāpayanti. ātmanā ca rūpasaṃpadaṃ parigṛhṇanti parān api rūpasaṃpatpratilābhāya
S06psp_4u:444_5: samādāpayanti. ātmanā ca lakṣaṇasaṃpadaṃ parigṛhṇanti parān api (PSP_4:21)
S06psp_4u:445_0: lakṣaṇasaṃpatpratilābhāya samādāpayanti. ātmanā ca kumārabhūtasaṃpadaṃ parigṛhṇanti
S06psp_4u:445_1: parān api kumārabhūtasaṃpatpratigrahāya samādāpayanti. ātmanā ca bodhipakṣyān dharmān
S06psp_4u:445_2: niṣpādayanti parān api bodhipakṣyadharmapariniṣpattaye samādāpayanti. ātmanā ca satyavimokṣanavānupūrvavihārasamāpattiśūnyatānimittāpraṇihitadhāraṇīmukhān
S06psp_4u:445_3: utpādayanti parān apy eṣu samādāpayanti. ātmanā ca catvāri vaiśāradyāni utpādayanti
S06psp_4u:445_4: parān api caturṣu vaiśāradyeṣu samādāpayanti. ātmanā ca catasraḥ pratisaṃvida utpādayanti
S06psp_4u:445_5: parān api caturaḥ pratisaṃvidaḥ prāptaye samādāpayanti. ātmanā ca mahāmaitrīṃ mahākaruṇāṃ
S06psp_4u:445_6: mahāmuditāṃ mahopekṣāṃ vibhāvayanti parān api caturapramāṇā vibhāvanāyai samādāpayanti.
S06psp_4u:445_7: ātmanā cāṣṭādaśāveṇikān buddhadharmān niṣpādayanti parān api aṣṭādaśāveṇikeṣu buddhadharmeṣu
S06psp_4u:445_8: samādāpayanti. ātmanā ca sarvākārajñatām anuprāpnuvanti parāṃś ca sarvākārajñatāyāṃ
S06psp_4u:445_9: samādāpayanti. ātmanā ca sarvavāsanānusaṃdhikleśān vijahanti parān api sarvavāsanānusaṃdhikleśotsargāya
S06psp_4u:445_10: samādāpayanti. ātmanā cānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyante parāṃś ca samyaksaṃbodhim
S06psp_4u:445_11: abhisaṃbodhaye samādāpayanti. ātmanā ca dharmacakraṃ pravartayanti parāṃś ca dharmacakraṃ
S06psp_4u:447: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_4u:448_0: āścaryaṃ bhagavann āścaryaṃ sugata yāvad bahuguṇasamanvāgatās te bodhisattvā mahāsattvā
S06psp_4u:448_1: ye sarvasattvānāṃ kṛtaśaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caranti anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyante.
S06psp_4u:448_2: kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ prajñāpāramitābhāvanāparipūriṃ gacchati?
S06psp_4u:450: yadā subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran rūpasya vṛddhiṃ na samanupaśyati,
S06psp_4u:451: na vedanāyā na saṃjñāyā na saṃskārāṇāṃ,
S06psp_4u:455_0: yadā subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran na dhātvāyatanapratītyasamutpādapratītyasamutpādāṅgānāṃ
S06psp_4u:455_1: pāramitānāṃ saptatriṃśatāṃ bodhipakṣyāṇāṃ dharmāṇām āryasatyānām apramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattīnām
S06psp_4u:456_0: sarvaśūnyatānāṃ sarvasamādhīnāṃ sarvadhāraṇīmukhānāṃ daśānāṃ balānāṃ caturṇāṃ vaiśāradyānāñ
S06psp_4u:456_1: catasṛṇāṃ pratisaṃvidām aṣṭādaśānām āveṇikānāṃ buddhadharmāṇāṃ vṛddhiṃ na samanupaśyati
S06psp_4u:459: yadā ca subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran rūpasya parihāṇiṃ na samanupaśyati,
S06psp_4u:460: na vedanāyā na saṃjñāyā na saṃskārāṇāṃ,
S06psp_4u:462_0: tadā bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitābhāvanāparipūriṃ gacchati. evaṃ dhātvāyatanapratītyasamutpādapāramitābodhipakṣyadharmāryasatyāpramāṇa
S06psp_4u:463: tadā bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitābhāvanāparipūriṃ gacchati. ity avṛddhyaparihāṇiprayogaḥ
S06psp_4u:464: punar aparaṃ subhūte yadā bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran dharma iti na samanupaśyati,
S06psp_4u:469: kuśalam akuśalaṃ vyākṛtam avyākṛtam iti na samanupaśyati,
S06psp_4u:480: prajñāpāramitān na samanupaśyati yāvat sarvajñatān na samanupaśyati,
S06psp_4u:481: tadā bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitābhāvanāparipūriṃ gacchati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_4u:482: tathā hi subhūte dharmāṇāṃ dharmalakṣaṇatām upādāya avinivartanīyatām upādāya riktatām upādāya tucchatām upādāya asāratām upādāya vaśikatām upādāya.
S06psp_4u:485: bhagavān āha: rūpācintyatayā subhūte acintyaṃ deśyate, vedanā saṃjñā (PSP_4:23)
S06psp_4u:487: vijñānācintyatayā subhūte 'cintyaṃ deśyate. dānapāramitācintyatayā acintyaṃ deśyate,
S06psp_4u:488_0: evaṃ śīlapāramitā kṣāntipāramitā vīryapāramitā dhyānapāramitā prajñāpāramitācintyatayācintyaṃ
S06psp_4u:488_2: sarvajñatācintyatayā subhūte 'cintyaṃ deśyate. sacet subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ
S06psp_4u:488_3: prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran rūpam acintyam iti na saṃjānīte,
S06psp_4u:490_0: vijñānam acintyam iti na saṃjānīte paripūrayiṣyati prajñāpāramitām. evaṃ dhātvāyatanāni
S06psp_4u:490_1: pratītyasamutpādaḥ pratītyasamutpādāṅgāni pāramitāḥ śūnyatā sarvasamādhayaḥ sarvadhāraṇīmukhāni
S06psp_4u:492: subhūtir āha: ko 'tra bhagavan gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyām adhimokṣate?
S06psp_4u:493: bhagavān āha: yaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ pūrvam api carito bhavati,
S06psp_4u:497: subhūtir āha: kiyatā bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ pūrvam api carito bhavati,
S06psp_4u:501: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran rūpaṃ na kalpayati na vikalpayati,
S06psp_4u:507_0: vijñānasvabhāvan na kalpayati na vikalpayati. evaṃ dhātūn āyatanāni pratītyasamutpādaṃ
S06psp_4u:510: sarvajñatāsvabhāvan na kalpayati na vikalpayati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_4u:513_1: sarvajñatā acintyā. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ pūrvam api carito
S06psp_4u:513_2: bhavati ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu tathāgatāvaropitakuśalamūlo bhavati bahubuddhaparyupāsitaḥ
S06psp_4u:515: bhagavān āha: rūpagambhīratayā subhūte gambhīrā prajñāpāramitā,
S06psp_4u:518: sarvajñatāgambhīratayā subhūte gambhīrā prajñāpāramitā. ity avikalpaprayogaḥ
S06psp_4u:519: subhūtir āha: ratnarāśir bhagavan prajñāpāramitā ratnadātrī,
S06psp_4u:520_1: samyaksaṃbodher dātrī dharmacakrapravartikeyaṃ bhagavan prajñāpāramitā. iti phalaratnadānaprayogaḥ
S06psp_4u:521: subhūtir āha: sarvadharmāṇāṃ śuddharāśir bhagavan prajñāpāramitā.
S06psp_4u:522: bhagavān āha: rūpaviśuddhitām upādāya, vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā, (PSP_4:25)
S06psp_4u:526: āścaryaṃ bhagavan yāvad asyāṃ gambhirāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāyāṃ bahavo 'ntarāyā utpadyeran.
S06psp_4u:527: bhagavān āha: evam etat subhūte evam etat,
S06psp_4u:529: tena kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ likhitā kṣipram eva likhitavyā,
S06psp_4u:530: uddiśatā dhārayatā vācayatā svādhyāyatā yoniśaś ca manasikurvatā,
S06psp_4u:531_0: bhāvayatā kṣipram eva bhāvayitavyā. mā khalv asyāṃ gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ
S06psp_4u:531_1: likhyamānāyām uddiśyamānāyāṃ dhāryamāṇāyāṃ vācyamānāyāṃ svādhyāyamānāyāṃ yoniśo manasikriyamāṇāyāṃ
S06psp_4u:531_2: bhāvyamānāyāṃ vāntarāyaḥ syād iti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_4u:532_0: sacet subhūte yaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā māsena imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ likhet tena
S06psp_4u:532_1: likhitavyaiva bhavet. saced dvābhyāṃ tribhiś ca caturbhiḥ pañcabhiḥ ṣaḍbhiḥ saptabhir
S06psp_4u:532_2: aṣṭābhir yāvat saṃvatsareṇa likhet tena likhitavyaiva bhaved evam upadeṣṭavyā dhārayitavyā
S06psp_4u:532_3: vācayitavyā svādhyātavyā yoniśo manasikartavyā. sacet māsena vā bhāvayet tena bhāvayitavyā
S06psp_4u:532_4: bhavet yāvat saṃvatsareṇa bhāvayet tena bhāvayitavyā bhavet. tat kasya hetor?
S06psp_4u:535: āścaryaṃ bhagavan yad asyāṃ gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ māraḥ pāpīyān antarāyāya yogam āpadyate,
S06psp_4u:538_0: kiṃ cāpi subhūte māraḥ pāpīyān gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyām udyogam āpadyeta antarāya
S06psp_4u:538_1: karaṇāya yad utālikhanāya yāvad abhāvanāyai bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya imāṃ gambhīrāṃ
S06psp_4u:538_2: prajñāpāramitāṃ likhata uddiśato dhārayato vācayataḥ svādhyāyato yoniśo manasikurvato
S06psp_4u:541: atha khalv āyuṣmān śāriputro bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_4u:542_0: kasya bhagavann anubhāvena māraḥ pāpīyān na śaknoty antarāyaṃ kartuṃ bodhisattvānāṃ
S06psp_4u:542_1: mahāsattvānām imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ likhatām uddiśatāṃ dhārayatāṃ vācayatāṃ
S06psp_4u:544_0: buddhānubhāvena śāriputra māraḥ pāpīyān na śaknoty antarāyaṃ kartuṃ bodhisattvānāṃ
S06psp_4u:544_1: mahāsattvānām imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ likhatām uddiśatāṃ dhārayatāṃ vācayatāṃ
S06psp_4u:544_2: svādhyāyatāṃ yoniśo manasikurvatāṃ bhāvayatām. ye 'pi te śāriputra samantā daśasu
S06psp_4u:544_3: dikṣu buddhā bhagavantas tiṣṭhanti dhriyante yāpayanti,
S06psp_4u:545: teṣām api buddhānāṃ bhagavatām anubhāvāt. te 'pi buddhā bhagavantas tān bodhisattvān mahāsattvān samanvāhariṣyanti anuparigrahīṣyanti,
S06psp_4u:546: taiś ca buddhair bhagavadbhir anuparigṛhītānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ māraḥ pāpīyān na śaknoty antarāyaṃ kartum,
S06psp_4u:547: imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ likhatāṃ dhārayatāṃ vācayatām uddiśatāṃ svādhyāyatāṃ yoniśo manasikurvatāṃ bhāvayatām. tat kasya hetor?
S06psp_4u:548: na hi śāriputra buddhair bhagavadbhir anuparigṛhītānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ māreṇa pāpīyasā śaknoty antarāyaḥ kartum. tat kasya hetor?
S06psp_4u:549: dharmaṃ teṣāṃ śāriputra ye 'pi te samantād daśasu dikṣv aprameyeṣv asaṃkhyeyeṣu lokadhātuṣv aprameyā asaṃkhyeyās tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhās tiṣṭhanti dhriyante yāpayanti,
S06psp_4u:550_0: te 'pi buddhā bhagavanta imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ likhato dhārayato vācayata uddiśataḥ
S06psp_4u:550_1: svādhyāyato yoniśo manasikurvato bhāvayato bodhisattvān mahāsattvān samanvāharanti.
S06psp_4u:551_0: veditavyaṃ tena śāriputra kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ
S06psp_4u:551_1: likhatā vā dhārayatā vā vācayatā vā uddiśatā vā svādhyāyatā vā yoniśo manasikurvatā
S06psp_4u:551_2: vā bhāvayatā vā buddhānubhāvenāham imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ likhāmi dhārayāmi
S06psp_4u:551_3: vācayāmi uddiśāmi svādhyāyāmi bhāvayāmi yoniśo manasikaromi.
S06psp_4u:553_0: yaḥ kaścid bhagavan kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ likhiṣyati
S06psp_4u:553_1: dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati uddekṣyati svādhyāsyati yoniśo manasikariṣyati bhāvayiṣyati
S06psp_4u:554: sarvan tadbuddhānubhāvena, sarve ca te buddhaparigṛhītā bhaviṣyanti.
S06psp_4u:555: bhagavān āha: evam etac chāriputra evam etat,
S06psp_4u:556_0: yathā vadasi yaḥ kaścit kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ
S06psp_4u:556_1: likhiṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati uddekṣyati svādhyāsyati yoniśo manasikariṣyati
S06psp_4u:556_2: bhāvayiṣyati veditavyaṃ śāriputra sarvan tadbuddhānubhāvena sarve te buddhaparigṛhītā bhaviṣyanti.
S06psp_4u:559_0: jñātās te bhagavan jñānena kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca dṛṣṭās te bhagavan māṃsacakṣuṣā
S06psp_4u:559_1: kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca tair buddhair bhagavadbhir ye te pūrvadigbhāge yāvad
S06psp_4u:559_2: daśasu dikṣv aprameyāsaṃkhyeyeṣu lokadhātuṣu aprameyāsaṃkhyeyās tathāgatā arhantaḥ
S06psp_4u:560_0: teṣāñ ca bodhisattvā mahāsattvā ya imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ likhiṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti
S06psp_4u:560_1: vācayiṣyanti uddekṣyanti svādhyāsyanti bhāvayiṣyanti yoniśo manasikariṣyanti tathatvāya pratipatsyante.
S06psp_4u:561: bhagavān āha: evam etac chāriputra evam etat,
S06psp_4u:562_0: jñātās te śāriputra jñānena kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca dṛṣṭās te śāriputra māṃsacakṣuṣā
S06psp_4u:562_1: kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca tair buddhair bhagavadbhir ye te pūrvasyāṃ diśi yāvad
S06psp_4u:562_2: daśasu dikṣv aprameyāsaṃkhyeyeṣu lokadhātuṣu aprameyāsaṃkhyeyās tathāgatā arhantaḥ
S06psp_4u:563_0: teṣāñ ca ye bodhisattvā mahāsattvā ya imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ likhiṣyanti
S06psp_4u:563_1: dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti uddekṣyanti svādhyāsyanti bhāvayiṣyanti yoniśo manasikariṣyanti
S06psp_4u:564: te khalu punar mahāyānikāḥ kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca veditavyā abhyāsannī bhaviṣyanty anuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ.
S06psp_4u:566_0: ye 'pi te śāriputra kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ likhitvā
S06psp_4u:566_1: pustakagatāṃ kṛtvā dhārayiṣyanti. te khalu punaḥ śāriputra bodhisattvayānikāḥ kulaputrāḥ
S06psp_4u:566_2: kuladuhitaraś ca iha gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyām adhimuktibahulā bhaviṣyanti,
S06psp_4u:567: ye 'pīmāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ satkariṣyanti gurukariṣyanti mānayiṣyanti pūjayiṣyanti puṣpadhūpagandhamālyavilepanacūrṇacīvaracchatradhvajapatākābhiḥ. (PSP_4:28)
S06psp_4u:568: te 'pi śāriputra bodhisattvayānikāḥ kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca jñātā dṛṣṭāś ca buddhair bhagavadbhis tathāgatāś ca buddhacakṣuṣā paśyanti,
S06psp_4u:569_0: teṣām api kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṛṇāṃ ca mahārthaṃ mahānuśaṃsaṃ mahāphalaṃ mahāvipākaṃ
S06psp_4u:569_1: ya imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ likhitvā dhārayiṣyanti. te tena kuśalamūlena na
S06psp_4u:569_2: jātu buddhair bhagavadbhir virahitā bhaviṣyanti. te na jātv apāyeṣūpapatsyante devamanuṣyeṣūpapatsyamānā
S06psp_4u:569_3: buddhabodhisattvair avirahitā bhaviṣyanti. avinivartanīyāṃ bhūmiṃ cātikramiṣyanti,
S06psp_4u:570: te ca bodhisattvayānikāḥ kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaro vā tenaiva kuśalamūlena na jātu virahitā bhaviṣyanti ṣaḍbhiḥ pāramitābhiḥ,
S06psp_4u:571: adhyātmaśūnyatayā bahirdhāśūnyatayā adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatayā yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatayā na jātu virahitā bhaviṣyanti,
S06psp_4u:573: śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitair vimokṣamukhair na jātu virahitā bhaviṣyanti,
S06psp_4u:574: aṣṭābhir vimokṣair navānupūrvavihārasamāpattibhir na jātu virahitā bhaviṣyanti,
S06psp_4u:575: abhijñābhiḥ samādhidhāraṇīmukhair na jātu virahitā bhaviṣyanti,
S06psp_4u:576_0: daśabhis tathāgatabalaiḥ caturbhir vaiśāradyaiś catasṛbhiḥ pratisaṃvidbhir yāvad
S06psp_4u:576_1: aṣṭādaśabhir āveṇikair buddhadharmair na jātu virahitā bhaviṣyanti sarvajñatayā ca.
S06psp_4u:577: iyaṃ ca śāriputra prajñāpāramitā tathāgatasyātyayena dakṣiṇāpathe pracariṣyati,
S06psp_4u:578_0: tatra bhikṣur bhikṣuṇy upāsakopāsikā imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ likhiṣyanti udgṛhīṣyanti
S06psp_4u:578_1: dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyanti. te tena kuśalamūlena
S06psp_4u:578_2: na durgativinipātaṃ gamiṣyanti te devamānuṣikīsaṃpattiṃ pratyanubhavamānāḥ ṣaḍbhiḥ
S06psp_4u:578_3: pāramitābhir abhyudgamiṣyanti buddhāṃś ca bhagavataḥ satkurvāṇā gurukurvāṇā mānayamānāḥ
S06psp_4u:578_4: pūjayamānā anupūrveṇa tribhir yānaiḥ parinirvāsyanti yad uta śrāvakayānena vā pratyekabuddhayānena vā mahāyānena vā.
S06psp_4u:579_0: seyaṃ śāriputra gambhīrā prajñāpāramitā dakṣiṇāpathād vartanyāṃ pracariṣyati. tatrāpi
S06psp_4u:579_1: bhikṣavo bhikṣuṇy upāsakopāsikāś ca imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ likhiṣyanty udgṛhīṣyanti
S06psp_4u:580_0: vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyanti satkariṣyanti gurukariṣyanti
S06psp_4u:580_2: te tena kuśalamūlena na durgativinipātaṃ gamiṣyanti,
S06psp_4u:581: devamanuṣyasaṃpattiṃ pratyanubhavamānāḥ ṣaḍbhiḥ pāramitābhir abhyudgatā bhaviṣyanti,
S06psp_4u:582: buddhān bhagavataḥ satkurvāṇā gurukurvāṇā mānayamānāḥ pūjayamānā anupūrveṇa tribhir yānaiḥ niryāsyanti śrāvakayānena vā pratyekabuddhayānena vā mahāyānena vā.
S06psp_4u:583: sā khalu punar iyaṃ śāriputra gambhīrā prajñāpāramitā vartanyā uttarāpathe pracariṣyati,
S06psp_4u:584: tatrāpi śāriputra bhikṣavo bhikṣuṇy upāsakopāsikāś ca imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ likhiṣyanty udgṛhīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyanti,
S06psp_4u:585: te tena kuśalamūlena na durgativinipātaṃ gamiṣyanti,
S06psp_4u:586: te devamanuṣyasaṃpattiṃ pratyanubhūya ṣaḍbhiḥ pāramitābhir abhyudgatā bhaviṣyanti,
S06psp_4u:587: buddhāṃś ca bhagavataḥ satkariṣyanti gurukariṣyanti mānayiṣyanti pūjayiṣyanti,
S06psp_4u:588: anupūrveṇa tribhir yānair niryāsyanti śrāvakayānena vā pratyekabuddhayānena vā mahāyānena vā.
S06psp_4u:589: tatra śāriputra iyaṃ gambhīrā prajñāpāramitā buddhakṛtyaṃ kariṣyati tat kasya hetor?
S06psp_4u:590: na hi śāriputra maṇḍaprāpte dharmavinaye saddharmāntarddhānaṃ bhaviṣyati,
S06psp_4u:591: samanvāhṛtās te śāriputra mayā kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca,
S06psp_4u:592: ya imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ likhiṣyanty udgṛhīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyanti tathatvāya ca pratipatsyante,
S06psp_4u:593_0: ye 'pi te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ likhiṣyanti
S06psp_4u:593_1: likhitvā ca satkariṣyanti gurukariṣyanti mānayiṣyanti pūjayiṣyanti puṣpadhūpagandhamālyavilepanacūrṇacīvaracchatradhvajapatākābhis,
S06psp_4u:594_0: te ca khalu punaḥ śāriputra kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaraś ca tena kuśalamūlena na durgativinipātaṃ
S06psp_4u:594_1: gamiṣyanti devamānuṣikīsaṃpattiṃ pratyanubhūya ṣaḍbhiḥ pāramitābhir abhyudgatā bhaviṣyanti
S06psp_4u:594_2: abhyudgamya buddhān bhagavataḥ satkurvanto gurukurvanto mānayanto pūjayanto 'nupūrveṇa
S06psp_4u:594_3: tribhir yānair niryāsyanti śrāvakayānena vā pratyekabuddhayānena vā mahāyānena vā. tat kasya hetor?
S06psp_4u:596: kuladuhitaraś ca tathāgatena buddhacakṣuṣā varṇitās tathāgatena praśastās te tathāgatena,
S06psp_4u:597_0: ye 'pi te samantād daśasu dikṣu sarvalokadhātuprasareṣu buddhā bhagavantas tiṣṭhanti
S06psp_4u:597_1: dhriyante yāpayanti tair api tathāgatair api arhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhair dṛṣṭās te
S06psp_4u:597_2: kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca buddhacakṣuṣā varṇitās te praśastās te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca.
S06psp_4u:599: vaistārikī punar iyaṃ bhagavan gambhīrā prajñāpāramitā paścime kāle paścime samaye uttarasyāṃ diśi bhaviṣyati.
S06psp_4u:600: bhagavān āha: evam etac chāriputra evam etat,
S06psp_4u:601_0: iyaṃ śāriputra gambhīrā prajñāpāramitā paścime kāle paścime samaye uttarasyāṃ diśi
S06psp_4u:601_1: vaistārikī bhaviṣyati. tatra śāriputra paścime kāle paścime samaye te kulaputrāḥ
S06psp_4u:601_2: kuladuhitaraś ca ya imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ śroṣyanti śrutvā ca likhiṣyanti
S06psp_4u:601_3: udgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti yoniśo manasikariṣyanti tathatvāya
S06psp_4u:601_4: ca pratipatsyante. cirayānasaṃprasthitās te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca bahubuddhaparyupāsitās
S06psp_4u:601_5: te tathāgatāvaropitakuśalamūlā ya imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ śroṣyanti śrutvā
S06psp_4u:601_6: ca likhiṣyanti udgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti yoniśaś ca
S06psp_4u:602: śāriputra āha: kiyantas te bhagavan kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā bhaviṣyanti?
S06psp_4u:604_0: ya imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ paścime kāle paścime samaye uttare digbhāge śrutvā
S06psp_4u:604_1: likhiṣyanti udgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyanti
S06psp_4u:606: kiṃ cāpi śāriputra paścime kāle paścime samaye uttare digbhāge bahavo bodhisattvā mahāsattvā bhaviṣyanti,
S06psp_4u:607: alpakāḥ punaḥ śāriputra bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca bhaviṣyanti,
S06psp_4u:608_0: ya imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ śrutvā likhiṣyanti udgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti
S06psp_4u:608_1: vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyanti tathatvāya ca pratipatsyante.
S06psp_4u:610_0: tena khalu punaḥ śāriputra bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca ya
S06psp_4u:610_1: imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāṃ śrutvā nottrasiṣyanti na saṃtrasiṣyanti
S06psp_4u:610_2: na saṃtrāsam āpatsyante. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_4u:611: anubaddhā hi taiḥ kulaputraiḥ kuladuhitṛbhiś ca tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ paripṛcchitāś ca paripraśnīkṛtāś ca. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_4u:612: prajñāpāramitā paripūrṇā hi te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca bhaviṣyanti. evaṃ dhyānapāramitā vīryapāramitā kṣāntipāramitā śīlapāramitā,
S06psp_4u:613: dānapāramitāparipūrṇāś ca te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca bhaviṣyanti,
S06psp_4u:614: adhyātmaśūnyatāparipūrṇāś ca te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca bhaviṣyanti,
S06psp_4u:615: bahirdhāśūnyatāparipūrṇāś ca te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca bhaviṣyanti,
S06psp_4u:616: adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatāparipūrṇāś ca te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca bhaviṣyanti,
S06psp_4u:617_0: yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāparipūrṇāś ca te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca bhaviṣyanti.
S06psp_4u:617_2: ca te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca bhaviṣyanti,
S06psp_4u:618: apramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattiparipūrṇāś ca te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca bhaviṣyanti,
S06psp_4u:619: āryasatyaparipūrṇāś ca te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca bhaviṣyanti,
S06psp_4u:620: aṣṭavimokṣanavānupūrvavihārasamāpattiparipūrṇāś ca te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca bhaviṣyanti,
S06psp_4u:621: śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitābhijñāparipūrṇāś ca te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca bhaviṣyanti samādhidhāraṇīmukhaparipūrṇāś ca te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca bhaviṣyanti,
S06psp_4u:622_1: ca bhaviṣyanti. te khalu punaḥ śāriputra kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca kuśalamūlopastabdhāś
S06psp_4u:626: tathā hy amutra mayā teṣāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṛṇāṃ ca sarvajñatāpratisaṃyuktaiva kathā kathitā,
S06psp_4u:627: ye 'pi te 'bhūvann atīte 'dhvani tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhās,
S06psp_4u:628: tair api buddhair bhagavadbhis teṣāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṛṇāṃ ca sarvajñatāpratisaṃyuktaiva kathā kathitā teṣāñ jātivyativṛttānām api ta eva samudācārā bhaviṣyanti,
S06psp_4u:633: te khalu punaḥ śāriputra bodhisattvāḥ kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca saṃhatā bhaviṣyanti,
S06psp_4u:634: te na śakyante bhettuṃ māreṇa vā mārakāyikābhir vā devatābhir anuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ prāg evānyaiḥ pāpecchaiḥ pāpasamācārair,
S06psp_4u:637_0: te khalu punaḥ śāriputra bodhisattvāḥ kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ
S06psp_4u:637_1: śrutvā udārāṃ prītiṃ prasādaṃ pramodyaṃ pratilapsyante. te ca bahujanaṃ kuśalamūleṣu
S06psp_4u:637_2: pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyanti yad utānuttarām eva samyaksaṃbodhim ārabhya.
S06psp_4u:639: evaṃ ca taiḥ kulaputraiḥ kuladuhitṛbhiś ca mama saṃmukhaṃ vāg bhāṣitā,
S06psp_4u:640_0: vayaṃ bhagavan bahūni prāṇiśatāni bahūni prāṇisahasrāṇi bahūni prāṇiśatasahasrāṇi
S06psp_4u:640_1: bahūni prāṇikoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇi kuśalamūleṣu pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmo yad utānuttarāṃ
S06psp_4u:640_2: samyaksaṃbodhim ārabhya. bodhaye pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmaḥ saṃdarśayiṣyāmaḥ samādāpayiṣyāmaḥ
S06psp_4u:640_3: samuttejayiṣyāmaḥ saṃpraharṣayiṣyāmo 'vinivartanīyatve ca vyākariṣyāmaḥ. tat kasya hetor?
S06psp_4u:641: anumoditā mayā teṣāṃ bodhisattvayānikānāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṛṇāṃ ca vāg bhāṣitā cittena cittaṃ vyavalokya,
S06psp_4u:642: atītānām api tathāgatānām arhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ puratas taiḥ kulaputraiḥ kuladuhitṛbhiś caivaṃ bhāṣitā,
S06psp_4u:643_0: vayaṃ bahūni prāṇiśatāni bahūni prāṇisahasrāṇi bahūni prāṇiśatasahasrāṇi bahūni prāṇikoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇi
S06psp_4u:643_1: bodhisattvacaryāṃ caranto bodhāya pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmaḥ saṃdarśayiṣyāmaḥ samādāpayiṣyāmaḥ
S06psp_4u:643_2: samuttejayiṣyāmaḥ saṃpraharṣayiṣyāmo 'vinivartanīyatve na ca vyākariṣyāmaḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_4u:644: tathā hi tair atītais tathāgatair arhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhair anumoditā teṣāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṛṇāṃ ca vāg bhāṣitā cittena cittaṃ vyavalokya,
S06psp_4u:645_0: teṣāṃ ca khalu śāriputra kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṛṇāṃ ca mayā anumoditam ete bodhisattvā
S06psp_4u:645_1: mahāsattvā bodhāya caranto bahūni prāṇiśatāni bahūni prāṇisahasrāṇi bahūni prāṇiśatasahasrāṇi
S06psp_4u:646: pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyanti saṃdarśayiṣyanti samādāpayiṣyanti samuttejayiṣyanti saṃpraharṣayiṣyanti avinivartanīyatve vyākariṣyanti.
S06psp_4u:648: te khalu punaḥ śāriputra kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca udārādhimuktikā bhaviṣyanti,
S06psp_4u:649: rūpe śabde gandhe rase spraṣṭavye dharmeṣu te udārāṇi dānāni dāsyanti,
S06psp_4u:650: udārāṇi dānāni dattvā udārāṇi kuśalamūlāny abhisaṃskariṣyanti. te udārāṇi kuśalamūlāni abhisaṃskṛtyodāraṃ vipākaṃ parigrahīṣyanti,
S06psp_4u:651: te udāraṃ vipākaṃ parigṛhya teṣām eva sattvānām arthāya vipākād vipākaṃ parigṛhīṣyanti.
S06psp_4u:654_0: yadi vā adhyātmikāni yadi vā bāhyāni sa tena kuśalamūlena anyāni buddhakṣetrāṇi adhyālambiṣyati
S06psp_4u:654_1: yatra saṃmukhī bhūtās tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā dharmaṃ deśayanti. teṣu
S06psp_4u:654_2: ca imām eva prajñāpāramitāṃ śrutvā tatrāpi buddhakṣetre bahūni prāṇiśatāni bahūni
S06psp_4u:654_3: prāṇisahasrāṇi bahūni prāṇiśatasahasrāṇi bahūni prāṇikoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇi anuttarāyai
S06psp_4u:656: āścaryaṃ bhagavan yāvad idaṃ tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena na sa kaścid dharmo yo nājñāto,
S06psp_4u:657: na sā kācid dharmatathatā yā nājñātā,
S06psp_4u:658: na sā kācit sattvānāṃ caryā yā nājñātā,
S06psp_4u:659: yatra hi nāmātītānām api tathāgatānāṃ bodhisattvā buddhakṣetrāṇi śrāvakāś cājñātāḥ,
S06psp_4u:660: anāgatānām api tathāgatānāṃ bodhisattvā buddhakṣetrāṇi śrāvakāś cājñātāḥ,
S06psp_4u:661: pratyutpannānām api tathāgatānāṃ bodhisattvā buddhakṣetrāṇi śrāvakāś cājñātā,
S06psp_4u:662: ye ca te daśadiglokadhātuṣu tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhās tiṣṭhanti dhriyante yāpayanti dharmañ ca deśayanti,
S06psp_4u:663: teṣām api tathāgatānām arhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ bodhisattvā buddhakṣetrāṇi śrāvakāś cājñātāḥ.
S06psp_4u:665: ye 'pi te bhagavan bodhisattvā mahāsattvā āsāṃ ṣaṇṇāṃ pāramitānāṃ (PSP_4:34)
S06psp_4u:667_0: te 'pi etāḥ ṣaṭ pāramitā gaveṣiṣyante paryeṣiṣyante. teṣāṃ khalu punaḥ kulaputrāṇāṃ
S06psp_4u:667_1: kuladuhitṛṇāñ ca imāḥ ṣaṭ pāramitā gaveṣamāṇānāṃ paryeṣamāṇānām etāḥ ṣaṭ pāramitāḥ kecil lapsyante?
S06psp_4u:670: prāyeṇa śāriputra teṣāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṛṇāṃ ca sarvā imāḥ ṣaṭ pāramitā upapatsyante. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_4u:671: tathā hi śāriputra te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś cāsāṃ ṣaṇṇāṃ pāramitānām udyogam āpannāḥ.
S06psp_4u:673: kiṃ punar bhagavann ime gambhīrā gambhīrāḥ sūtrāntāḥ ṣaṭ pāramitā pratisaṃyuktās teṣāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṛṇāṃ cotpatsyante?
S06psp_4u:675: gambhīrā gambhīrāḥ śāriputra sūtrāntāḥ ṣaṭ pāramitā pratisaṃyuktās teṣāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṛṇāṃ cotpatsyante.
S06psp_4u:676: śāriputra āha: keṣāṃ bhagavan kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṛṇāṃ cotpatsyante?
S06psp_4u:678: ye śāriputra bodhisattvāḥ kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś cāsāṃ ṣaṇṇāṃ pāramitānāṃ kṛtaśaḥ tīvreṇa prasādena nirapekṣāḥ kāye jīvite codyogam āpatsyante. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_4u:680_0: ye 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau sattvān pratiṣṭhāpayanti saṃdarśayanti samādāpayanti
S06psp_4u:680_1: samuttejayanti saṃpraharṣayanti niveśayanti. teṣāṃ khalu punaḥ śāriputra kulaputrāṇāṃ
S06psp_4u:680_2: kuladuhitṛṇāṃ ca jātivyativṛttānām apy etāḥ ṣaṭ pāramitā upapatsyante,
S06psp_4u:681: te ṣaṭpāramitāsu yathopadiṣṭāsu pravartamānās tāvad vīryaṃ na saṃśrayiṣyanti yāvan na buddhakṣetraṃ pariśodhayiṣyanti. sattvāṃś ca na paripācayiṣyanti,
S06psp_4u:683: iti prajñāpāramitāyā alobhavikalālobhaviparyayeṇa niyatilābhaguṇa ity uktā guṇāḥ
S06psp_4u:684: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_4u:685: guṇā ime bhagavan parikīrtitās teṣāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṛṇāñ ca ye 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau saṃprasthitāḥ ṣaṭpāramitāsu cariṣyanti,
S06psp_4u:687: buddhakṣetrāṇi pariśodhayiṣyanti. kīdṛśāḥ khalu punar bhagavaṃs teṣāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṛṇāṃ cāntarāyā utpatsyante?
S06psp_4u:690: idaṃ subhūte mārakarma veditavyaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānām.
S06psp_4u:691: subhūtir āha: kena kāraṇena bhagavaṃś cireṇa pratibhānam utpatsyate,
S06psp_4u:694: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāñ caran kṛcchreṇa prajñāpāramitāṃ paripūrayiṣyati. kṛcchreṇa dhyānapāramitāṃ paripūrayiṣyati,
S06psp_4u:699: anena subhūte paryāyena cireṇa pratibhānam utpatsyate,
S06psp_4u:700: idaṃ subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ mārakarma veditavyam. iti kṛcchraprāptiḥ
S06psp_4u:701: punar aparaṃ subhūte atikṣipraṃ pratibhānam utpatsyate tena ca maṃsyate,
S06psp_4u:702: idam api subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ mārakarma veditavyam.
S06psp_4u:704: kena paryāyeṇa bhagavan bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānām atikṣipraṃ pratibhānotpattyā mārakarma utpatsyate?
S06psp_4u:706: iha subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya dānapāramitāyāṃ carataḥ śīlakṣāntivīryadhyānaprajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato 'nupāyakuśalamūlasyātikṣipraṃ pratibhānam utpatsyate,
S06psp_4u:707: anena subhūte paryāyeṇa bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānām atikṣipraṃ pratibhānotpattyā mārakarma veditavyam. ity āśupratibhānatā
S06psp_4u:708: punar aparaṃ subhūte vijṛmbhamāṇā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ likhiṣyanti,
S06psp_4u:709: idam api subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ mārakarma veditavyam.
S06psp_4u:710: punar aparaṃ subhūte hasanta imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ likhiṣyanti,
S06psp_4u:711: idam api subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ mārakarma veditavyam.
S06psp_4u:712: punar aparaṃ subhūte parasparam uccagghayamānā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ likhiṣyanti,
S06psp_4u:713: idam api subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ mārakarma veditavyam. iti kāyavikāradauṣṭhulyaṃ trividham
S06psp_4u:715: idam api subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ mārakarma veditavyam.
S06psp_4u:717: idam api subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ mārakarma veditavyam.
S06psp_4u:719: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānām evaṃ bhaviṣyati,
S06psp_4u:720: na vayaṃ atrāsvādaṃ labhāmaha ity utthāyāsanāt prakramiṣyanti,
S06psp_4u:721: idam api subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ mārakarma veditavyam. iti cittadauṣṭhulyaṃ trividham
S06psp_4u:722: punar aparaṃ subhūte vijṛmbhamāṇā utthāyāsānāt prakramiṣyanti,
S06psp_4u:723: idam api subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ mārakarma veditavyam.
S06psp_4u:724: punar aparaṃ subhūte vijṛmbhamāṇā svādhyāsyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti deśayiṣyanti,
S06psp_4u:726: idam api subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ mārakarma veditavyam.
S06psp_4u:727: punar aparaṃ subhūte parasparaṃ hasamānā udgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti,
S06psp_4u:729: idam api subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ mārakarma veditavyam.
S06psp_4u:730: punar aparaṃ subhūte parasparam uccagghayamānā likhiṣyanti udgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyanti,
S06psp_4u:731: idam api subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ mārakarma veditavyam.
S06psp_4u:732: punar aparaṃ subhūte vikṣiptacittā udgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyanti,
S06psp_4u:733: idam api subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ mārakarma veditavyam.
S06psp_4u:734: punar aparaṃ subhūte anyonyavyañjanasamaṅgina udgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyanti,
S06psp_4u:735: idam api subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ mārakarma veditavyam. ity ayogavihitasvādhyāyāditā
S06psp_4u:736: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat: yad bhagavan evam āha,
S06psp_4u:737: na vayam atra āsvādaṃ labhāmaha ity utthāyāsanāt prakramiṣyanti,
S06psp_4u:738: idam api subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ mārakarma veditavyam iti. kena kāraṇena bhagavan nātrāsvādaṃ labhante?
S06psp_4u:739: bhagavān āha: tathā hi subhūte pūrvam api na caritāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ,
S06psp_4u:741: tathā hi subhūte pūrvam api na caritā dānapāramitāyāṃ,
S06psp_4u:742: tena kāraṇena subhūte āsvādaṃ na labhante,
S06psp_4u:745: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānām evaṃ bhavati,
S06psp_4u:746: na vayam atra vyākṛtāḥ prajñāpāramitāyām ity aprasannacittā utthāyāsanāt prakramiṣyanti,
S06psp_4u:747: idam api subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ mārakarma veditavyam.
S06psp_4u:748: subhūtir āha: kena kāraṇena bhagavan na vyākṛtāḥ prajñāpāramitāyām utthāyāsanāt prakramiṣyanti?
S06psp_4u:750: na khalu punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvā anavakrāntaniyāmā vyākriyante anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau,
S06psp_4u:751: na mamātra prajñāpāramitāyān nāma gṛhītam iti prasādan na pratilapsyante,
S06psp_4u:752: idam api subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ mārakarma veditavyam.
S06psp_4u:754: kena kāraṇena bhagavan nāmadheyāni na parikīrtitāni bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānām iha gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyām?
S06psp_4u:756: na khalu punaḥ subhūte avyākṛtānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ nāmadheyāni parikīrtante,
S06psp_4u:757: nāpi mama nāmadheyaṃ parikīrtitaṃ grāmasya vā nagarasya vā nigamasya vā rājadhānyā vā rāṣṭrasya vā yatrāhaṃ jāta iti,
S06psp_4u:760: sa yathā yathāpakramitavyaṃ maṃsyante tathā tathā dūrībhaviṣyanti buddhadharmebhyo,
S06psp_4u:763: yatra tena punar eva yogam āpattavyam iti,
S06psp_4u:765_1: tān paryeṣitavyān maṃsyante. evaṃ bodhisattvāḥ kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca sarvajñatājñānādhigamasya
S06psp_4u:766: idam api subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ mārakarma veditavyam.
S06psp_4u:767: subhūtir āha: katame te bhagavan sūtrāntā ye sarvajñajñānasyāhārakā na bhavanti,
S06psp_4u:775: te prajñāpāramitāṃ riñcitvā tāṃ paryavāptavyāṃ maṃsyante. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_4u:776: prajñāpāramitānirjātā hi subhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvā laukikalokottarair dharmair niryāsyanti,
S06psp_4u:777: prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣyamāṇāḥ subhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvā laukikalokottareṣu dharmeṣu śikṣiṣyante. iti hetubhraṃśaḥ
S06psp_4u:778_0: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte kukkuraḥ svāmino 'ntikāt piṇḍañ chorayitvā karmakarasyāntikād
S06psp_4u:778_1: ālopaṃ mārgitavyaṃ manyeta. evam eva subhūte bhaviṣyanty anāgate 'dhvani mahāyānikāḥ
S06psp_4u:778_2: kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś cemāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ sarvabuddhadharmāṇāṃ mūlaṃ
S06psp_4u:779: idam api subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ mārakarma veditavyam.
S06psp_4u:780_0: punar aparaṃ subhūte bhaviṣyanty anāgate 'dhvani bodhisattvayānikāḥ kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś
S06psp_4u:780_1: cemāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ riñcitvā lābhasatkārahetoḥ śrāvakapratyekabuddhayānapratisaṃyuktān
S06psp_4u:781: idam api subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ mārakarma veditavyam. iti praṇītāsvādabhraṃśaḥ
S06psp_4u:782: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte kaścid eva puruṣo hastino 'rthiko bhavet,
S06psp_4u:783: sa hastinaṃ labdhvā hastipadaṃ paryeṣitavyaṃ manyeta. tat kiṃ manyase?
S06psp_4u:784: subhūte 'pi nu sa puruṣaḥ paṇḍitajātīyo bhavet.
S06psp_4u:787_0: evam eva subhūte bodhisattvayānikāḥ pudgalā veditavyā ya imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ
S06psp_4u:787_1: riñcitvā ye te sūtrāntāḥ śrāvakayānapratisaṃyuktāḥ pratyekabuddhayānapratisaṃyuktās
S06psp_4u:787_2: tān paryavāptavyān maṃsyante. tat kiṃ manyase?
S06psp_4u:788: subhūte 'pi nu paṇḍitajātīyās te mahāyānikāḥ kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca bhaveyuḥ.
S06psp_4u:790: bhagavān āha: idam api subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ mārakarma (PSP_4:39)
S06psp_4u:792: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte puruṣo mahāsamudraṃ draṣṭukāmo bhavet,
S06psp_4u:793: sa mahāsamudraṃ dṛṣṭvā goṣpadaṃ paryeṣitavyaṃ manyeta,
S06psp_4u:794: tasya taṃ goṣpadaṃ dṛṣṭvā evaṃ bhavet,
S06psp_4u:795: evaṃpramāṇo mahāsamudra iti. tat kiṃ manyase?
S06psp_4u:796: subhūte 'pi nu sa puruṣaḥ paṇḍitajātiko bhavet.
S06psp_4u:798: bhagavān āha: evam eva subhūte tathārūpās te mahāyānikāḥ kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca veditavyā,
S06psp_4u:799: ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ śrutvā labdhvā vā tām utsṛjya śrāvakapratyekabuddhapratisaṃyuktān sūtrāntān udgrahītavyān maṃsyante. tat kiṃ manyase?
S06psp_4u:800: subhūte api nu paṇḍitajātīyās te mahāyānikāḥ kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca bhaveyuḥ.
S06psp_4u:802: bhagavān āha: idam api subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ mārakarma veditavyam. ity uddeśabhraṃśaḥ
S06psp_4u:803: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte palagaṇḍo vā palagaṇḍāntevāsī vā vaijayantasya prāsādasya pramāṇena prāsādaṃ kartukāmo bhavet,
S06psp_4u:804: sa sūryācandramasor maṇḍalavimānāt pramāṇam udgrahītavyaṃ manyet. tat kiṃ manyase?
S06psp_4u:805: subhūte vaijayantaṃ paryeṣya vaijayantasamaṃ prāsādaṃ kartukāmaḥ sūryācandramasor vā maṇḍalavimānāt pramāṇam udgṛhṇīyād,
S06psp_4u:806: api nu sa paṇḍitajātīyaḥ puruṣo bhavet.
S06psp_4u:809_0: evam eva subhūte bhaviṣyanty anāgate 'dhvani ekatyā bodhisattvayānikāḥ kulaputrāḥ
S06psp_4u:809_1: kuladuhitaraś ca ya imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ śrutvā vā labdhvā vā riñcitvā
S06psp_4u:809_2: cchorayitvā vā śrāvakapratyekabuddhapratisaṃyuktaiḥ sūtrāntaiḥ sarvākārajñatāṃ paryeṣitavyāṃ
S06psp_4u:810: subhūte api nu paṇḍitajātīyās te bodhisattvāḥ kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca bhaveyuḥ.
S06psp_4u:813: idam api subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ mārakarma veditavyam. iti hetuphalasaṃbandhabhraṃśaḥ
S06psp_4u:814: punar aparaṃ subhūte tadyathāpi nāma kasyacid eva puruṣasya koṭṭarājānaṃ dṛṣṭvā evaṃ bhaved,
S06psp_4u:816: ca yādṛśo 'yaṃ koṭṭarāja iti. sa koṭṭarājasya varṇasaṃsthānenākṛtyānimittaṃ liṅgāni udgṛhyaivaṃ vaded,
S06psp_4u:817: rājñaś cakravartinaḥ īdṛśo varṇasaṃsthānākṛtiviśeṣa iti. tat kiṃ manyase?
S06psp_4u:818: subhūte api nu sa puruṣaḥ paṇḍitajātīyo bhavet.

S06psp_4u:821_1: ca ya imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ śrutvā labdhvā vā tāṃ riñcitvā cchorayitvā vā
S06psp_4u:821_2: śrāvakapratyekabuddhapratisaṃyuktaiḥ sūtrāntaiḥ sarvākārajñatāṃ paryeṣitavyāṃ maṃsyante. tat kiṃ manyase?

S06psp_4u:826: punar aparaṃ subhūte teṣāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṛṇāṃ cemāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ likhatāṃ bahūni pratibhānāny utpatsyante,
S06psp_4u:827_0: yānīmāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ likhyamānāṃ vikṣepsyanti. tadyathāpi nāma rūpapratibhānaṃ
S06psp_4u:829: yāvad anuttaraṃ samyaksaṃbodhipratibhānam. tat kasya hetor?
S06psp_4u:838: anupalambhā hi subhūte prajñāpāramitā. tat kasya hetor?
S06psp_4u:839_0: na hi subhūte iha gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyām ime dharmāḥ saṃvidyante. sacet subhūte
S06psp_4u:839_1: bodhisattvayānikaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ śrutvā
S06psp_4u:839_2: likhanebhir dharmo vikṣipyate. idam api subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ mārakarma veditavyam.
S06psp_4u:841: subhūtir āha: śakyā punar bhagavan prajñāpāramitā likhitum.
S06psp_4u:842: bhagavān āha: no subhūte, tat kasya hetor?
S06psp_4u:843: na hi subhūte prajñāpāramitāyāḥ svabhāvaḥ saṃvidyate,
S06psp_4u:844: na dhyānapāramitāyā na vīryapāramitāyā na kṣāntipāramitāyā na śīlapāramitāyā na dānapāramitāyāḥ svabhāvaḥ saṃvidyate,
S06psp_4u:845: na sarvaśūnyatānāṃ na saptatriṃśadbodhipakṣāṇāṃ dharmāṇāṃ nāryasatyānāṃ svabhāvaḥ saṃvidyate,
S06psp_4u:846: nāpramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattīnāṃ na śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitānāṃ nāṣṭānāṃ vimokṣāṇāṃ na navānupūrvavihārasamāpattīnāṃ nābhijñānāṃ svabhāvaḥ saṃvidyate,
S06psp_4u:847: na sarvasamādhīnāṃ na sarvadhāraṇīmukhānāṃ svabhāvaḥ saṃvidyante,
S06psp_4u:848: na daśānāṃ balānāṃ na vaiśāradyānāṃ na pratisaṃvidāṃ nāṣṭādaśānām āveṇikānāṃ buddhadharmāṇāṃ svabhāvaḥ saṃvidyate,
S06psp_4u:849: na sarvajñatāyāḥ svabhāvaḥ saṃvidyate. yasyāś ca svabhāvo na saṃvidyate,
S06psp_4u:850: so 'bhāvo yo 'bhāvaḥ. seyaṃ prajñāpāramitā na cābhāvenābhāvaḥ śakyo likhitum.
S06psp_4u:852: sacet punaḥ subhūte mahāyānikāḥ kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca imāṃ prajñāpāramitām abhāva iti saṃjñāsyanti idam api teṣāṃ mārakarma veditavyam. ity abhāvābhiniveśāntarāyaḥ
S06psp_4u:854: ye kecid bhagavan mahāyānikāḥ kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ lipyakṣarair likhitvā gambhīrā prajñāpāramitā mayā likhiteti maṃsyante,

S06psp_4u:856: idam api bhagavaṃs teṣāṃ mārakarma veditavyam. iti lipyakṣareṣu prajñāpāramitābhiniveśāntarāyaḥ

S06psp_4u:1131: idam api subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ mārakarma veditavyam.
S06psp_4u:1132: punar aparaṃ subhūte māraḥ pāpīyān anekāni bodhisattvaśatāni anekāni bodhisattvasahasrāṇi upadarśayati,
S06psp_4u:1134: evaṃ śīlapāramitāyāṃ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ vīryapāramitāyāṃ dhyānapāramitāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ cariṣyanti,
S06psp_4u:1135: te bodhisattvās teṣāṃ māranirmitānām antike spṛhām utpādayiṣyanti spṛhām utpādya sarvajñatāyāḥ parihāsyanti,
S06psp_4u:1137: iha gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ likhyamānāyām uddiśyamānāyāṃ svādhyāyamānāyāṃ yoniśo manasikriyamāṇāyāṃ bhāvyamānāyām,
S06psp_4u:1138: idam api subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ mārakarma veditavyam. tat kasya hetor?
S06psp_4u:1139: na hīha subhūte gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ rūpaṃ saṃvidyate,
S06psp_4u:1140: na vedanā na saṃjñā na saṃskārāḥ,
S06psp_4u:1142: na skandhā na dhātavo nāyatanāni na pratītyasamutpādo na pratītyasamutpādāṅgāni saṃvidyante,
S06psp_4u:1143: na pāramitā na bodhipakṣyā dharmā nāryasatyāni nāpramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattayaḥ nāṣṭavimokṣā na navānupūrvavihārasamāpattayaḥ na śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitābhijñāḥ saṃvidyante,
S06psp_4u:1144: na sarvaśūnyatā na sarvasamādhayaḥ na sarvadhāraṇīmukhāni saṃvidyante,
S06psp_4u:1145: na tathāgatabalāni na vaiśāradyāni na pratisaṃvido nāveṇikabuddhadharmā na vimokṣamukhāni na bodhiḥ saṃvidyate,
S06psp_4u:1146: yatra ca subhūte na rūpaṃ saṃvidyate,
S06psp_4u:1147: na vedanā na saṃjñā na saṃskārā na vijñānaṃ saṃvidyate,
S06psp_4u:1148_0: na skandhā na dhātavo nāyatanāni na pratītyasamutpādo na pratītyasamutpādāṅgāni na
S06psp_4u:1148_1: pāramitā na bodhipakṣyā dharmā nāryasatyāni nāpramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattayo nāṣṭavimokṣā
S06psp_4u:1148_2: na navānupūrvavihārasamāpattayo na śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitābhijñā na sarvaśūnyatā
S06psp_4u:1149: sarvadhāraṇīmukhāni na tathāgatabalāni na vaiśāradyāni na pratisaṃvido nāveṇikabuddhadharmā na vimokṣamukhāni na bodhiḥ saṃvidyate,
S06psp_4u:1150: yatra na bodhir na tatra buddho na bodhisattvā na śrāvakāḥ saṃvidyante. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_4u:1153: punar aparaṃ subhūte bahvantarāyeyaṃ prajñāpāramitā bhaviṣyati,
S06psp_4u:1154: teṣāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṛṇāṃ ca imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ dhārayatāṃ vācayatām uddiśatāṃ svādhyāyatāṃ yoniśo manasikurvatāṃ. tadyathāpi nāma subhūte yāni jāmbūdvīpakāni ratnāni,
S06psp_4u:1155_1: bhaviṣyanti. evam etat subhūte teṣāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṛṇāṃ cāsyāṃ gambhīrāyāṃ
S06psp_4u:1155_3: bhāṣyamāṇāyāṃ yoniśo manasikriyamāṇāyāṃ bhāvyamānāyāṃ bahavo 'ntarāyā bhaviṣyanti
S06psp_4u:1156: subhūtir āha: evam etad bhagavann evam etat sugata,
S06psp_4u:1159: ya imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ likhatām uddiśatāṃ svādhyāyatāṃ bhāvayatām antarāyaṃ kariṣyanti. alpabuddhayas te bhagavan mohapuruṣā bhaviṣyanti,
S06psp_4u:1160: mandabuddhayo ye 'syāṃ gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ likhyamānāyāṃ yāvad bhāvyamānāyām antarāyaṃ kariṣyanti. na teṣām udārodāreṣu dharmeṣu buddhiḥ prakramiṣyati,
S06psp_4u:1161: ya imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitān na likhiṣyanti likhyamānāyām antarāyaṃ kariṣyanti yāvan na bhāvayiṣyanti bhāvyamānāyāñ cāntarāyaṃ kariṣyanti.
S06psp_4u:1163_0: evam etat subhūte evam etat mārādhiṣṭhitās te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca bhaviṣyanti
S06psp_4u:1164: ya imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ na likhiṣyanti na vācayiṣyanti noddekṣyanti na svādhyāsyanti na yoniśo manasikariṣyanti,
S06psp_4u:1166: alpabuddhikās te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca mandabuddhikāḥ parīttabuddhikā,
S06psp_4u:1167: na ca teṣām udārodāreṣu dharmeṣu cittaṃ kramiṣyati,
S06psp_4u:1169: likhiṣyanti na dhārayiṣyanti noddekṣyanti na svādhyāsyanti na yoniśo manasikariṣyanti yāvan na bhāvayiṣyanti,
S06psp_4u:1170: anyeṣāñ ca likhatāṃ yāvad bhāvayatām antarāyaṃ kariṣyanti,
S06psp_4u:1171: kiñ cāpi subhūte iha gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ likhyamānāyāṃ yāvad bhāvyamānāyām imāni mārakarmāṇy utpatsyante,
S06psp_4u:1172: sacet punaḥ subhūte yad imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṛṇāṃ ca likhatāṃ svādhyāyatām uddiśatāṃ yoniśo manasikurvatāṃ bhāvayatāṃ mārakarmāṇi notpatsyante,
S06psp_4u:1176_1: balāni vaiśāradyāni pratisaṃvida āveṇikabuddhadharmān yāvat sarvajñatāṃ paripūrayiṣyanti.
S06psp_4u:1176_2: veditavyam idaṃ subhūte buddhānubhāva eṣa yenaiṣāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṛṇāṃ ca
S06psp_4u:1176_3: imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ likhatāṃ vācayatām uddiśatāṃ svādhyāyatāṃ yoniśo manasikurvatāṃ
S06psp_4u:1178: sarvaśūnyatāḥ sarvabodhipakṣyān dharmān sarvasamādhīn sarvadhāraṇīmukhāni sarvavimokṣamukhāni paripūrayiṣyanti,
S06psp_4u:1179: catvāri dhyānāni catvāry apramāṇāni catasra ārūpyasamāpattīḥ pañcābhijñāḥ paripūrayiṣyanti,
S06psp_4u:1181: daśa tathāgatabalāni catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvido 'ṣṭādaśāveṇikān buddhadharmān paripūrayiṣyanti,
S06psp_4u:1182: sarvākārajñatāṃ paripūrayiṣyanti. ye 'pi te daśasu dikṣu buddhā bhagavantas tiṣṭhanti dhriyante yāpayanti dharmañ ca deśayanti,
S06psp_4u:1183: te 'pi teṣāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṛṇāṃ ca kṛtaśa udyogam āpatsyante,
S06psp_4u:1184: imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ likhatāṃ vācayatāṃ svādhyāyatāṃ yoniśo manasikurvatāṃ,
S06psp_4u:1185_0: ye 'pi te daśasu dikṣu avinivartanīyā bodhisattvās te 'pi teṣāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṛṇāṃ
S06psp_4u:1185_1: ca imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ likhatāṃ vācayatām uddiśatāṃ svādhyāyatāṃ yoniśo
S06psp_4u:1186: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte striyāḥ kasyāścid eva bahavaḥ putrā bhaveyuḥ,
S06psp_4u:1188: viṃśatir vā triṃśad vā catvāriṃśad vā pañcāśad vā śataṃ vā sahasraṃ vā śatasahasraṃ vā,
S06psp_4u:1189: te 'syā mātur glānāyāḥ sarve 'py udyogam āpadyeran,
S06psp_4u:1190: kim ity asmākaṃ mātur antarāyo na bhavet,
S06psp_4u:1191: kim ity asmākaṃ mātā ciraṃ jīvet,
S06psp_4u:1192: kim ity asmākaṃ mātuḥ śarīre amanaāpaḥ sparśo na nipated,
S06psp_4u:1193: eṣāsmākaṃ jananī śarīrasya dātrī jīvitasya dhātrī,
S06psp_4u:1194: te tāṃ mātaram upasthitām upatiṣṭheran sugopitāṃ gopāyeyur,
S06psp_4u:1195: mā bhūd asyā jīvitāntarāyo vā śarīradaurbalyaṃ vā daṃśamaśakasarīsṛpopanipāto vā śītoṣṇakṣutpipāsādi duṣkhaṃ vā,
S06psp_4u:1196: evan te putrās tasyā mātuḥ sarvasukhopadhānāny upasaṃhareyuḥ,
S06psp_4u:1197: evan te tāṃ mātaraṃ sukelāyitāṃ kelāyeyur mimīyur eṣāsmākam asya lokasya darśayitrī. evam eva subhūte tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ,
S06psp_4u:1198: imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ buddhacakṣuṣā satatasamitaṃ samanvāharanti. tat kasya hetor?
S06psp_4u:1199: eṣā hi gambhīrā prajñāpāramitāsmākaṃ sarvabuddhadharmāṇāṃ jananī jñānālokasya kārikā,
S06psp_4u:1200: ye 'pi te daśasu dikṣu gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhā bhagavantas tiṣṭhanti dhriyante yāpayanti,
S06psp_4u:1201: te 'pīmām eva prajñāpāramitāṃ buddhacakṣuṣā satatasamitaṃ samanvāharanti. tat kasya hetor?
S06psp_4u:1202: eṣā hi gambhīrā prajñāpāramitā jananī tathāgatānām,
S06psp_4u:1204: tena tathāgatāḥ kṛtajñatām upādāya ye imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ buddhacakṣuṣā satatasamitaṃ samanvāharanti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_4u:1206: ato nirjātā hi tathāgatānām adhyātmaśūnyatā yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā,
S06psp_4u:1207: ato nirjātāni catvāri smṛtyupasthānāni catvāri samyakprahāṇāni catvāra ṛddhipādāḥ pañcendriyāṇi pañcabalāni saptabodhyaṅgāni āryāṣṭāṅgo mārgaḥ,
S06psp_4u:1210: ato nirjātāni catvāri dhyānāni catvāry apramāṇāni catasra ārūpyasamāpattayo,
S06psp_4u:1213: ato nirjātāni daśatathāgatabalāni catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvido 'ṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmāḥ,
S06psp_4u:1219: ato nirjātās tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ. ye 'pi kecit subhūte (PSP_4:58)
S06psp_4u:1220: tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhā abhisaṃbudhyante abhisaṃbhotsyante ca,
S06psp_4u:1221: sarve te imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitām āgamyānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhāḥ abhisaṃbudhyante 'bhisaṃbhotsyante ca,
S06psp_4u:1222_0: ye 'pi te subhūte mahāyānasaṃprasthitāḥ kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca imāṃ gambhīrāṃ
S06psp_4u:1222_1: prajñāpāramitāṃ likhiṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti uddekṣyanti svādhyāsyanti
S06psp_4u:1222_2: yoniśo manasikariṣyanti sarve te tathāgatair arhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhair buddhacakṣuṣā
S06psp_4u:1222_3: satatasamitaṃ samanvāhriyante teṣāṃ subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṛṇāñ
S06psp_4u:1222_4: ca tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ satatasamitaṃ rakṣāvaraṇaṃ guptiṃ saṃvidhāsyanti
S06psp_4u:1223: iti jāmbūdvīpakamahāratnodāharaṇādidṛṣṭāntena mahānubhāvatvam ity uktā doṣāḥ
S06psp_4u:1225: prajñāpāramitā tathāgatānām arhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ janayitrī asya ca lokasya darśayitrī ti. kathaṃ ca bhagavan buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ prajñāpāramitā janayitrī?
S06psp_4u:1226: kathañ ca bhagavan prajñāpāramitāsya lokasya darśayitrī?
S06psp_4u:1227: kathañ ca bhagavan prajñāpāramitayā tathāgato janitaḥ?
S06psp_4u:1229: bhagavān āha: anayā subhūte gambhīrayā prajñāpāramitayā daśatathāgatabalāni janitāni,
S06psp_4u:1230: catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvido mahākaruṇā mahāmaitrī mahāmuditā mahopekṣā aṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmā yāvat sarvākārajñatā janitā,
S06psp_4u:1231: ebhiś ca subhūte dharmais tathāgata iti prabhāvyate,
S06psp_4u:1232: tasmāt tarhi subhūte anayā gambhīrayā prajñāpāramitayā tathāgato janitaḥ. iti tathāgatanirvṛttijñānam
S06psp_4u:1233: subhūtir āha: katamaḥ punar bhagavaṃs tathāgatena loka ity ākhyātaḥ?
S06psp_4u:1234: bhagavān āha: pañca subhūte skandhās tathāgatena loka ākhyātaḥ.
S06psp_4u:1235: subhūtir āha: kathaṃ bhagavan prajñāpāramitāyā pañca skandhā darśitāḥ?
S06psp_4u:1236: bhagavān āha: na subhūte prajñāpāramitā imān pañca skandhān lujyamānān darśayati,
S06psp_4u:1243: nāyūhaṃ na niryūhaṃ nātītān nānāgatān na pratyutpannān dharmān darśayati. tat kasya hetor?
S06psp_4u:1244: na hi śūnyatā lujyate vā pralujyate vā,
S06psp_4u:1247: nānabhisaṃskaro nānutpādo na nirodho nābhāvo nāsvabhāvo lujyate vā pralujyate vā. evaṃ hi subhūte tathāgatena gambhīrā prajñāpāramitā lokasya darśayitrī ākhyātā. iti lokasya jñānam
S06psp_4u:1248: ye 'pi te subhūte aprameyāṇāṃ sattvānām asaṃkhyeyānāṃ sattvānām aparimāṇānāṃ sattvānāṃ cittacaritāni prajānanti,
S06psp_4u:1249: aprameyāḥ sattvāḥ paracittavidas te 'pi prajñāpāramitām āgamya prajānanti. na punaḥ subhūte iha gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sattvo na sattvaprajñaptir upalabhyate,
S06psp_4u:1251: na vedanā na saṃjñā na saṃskārā,
S06psp_4u:1253: na cakṣūrūpaṃ na cakṣurvijñānaṃ na cakṣuḥsaṃsparśo na cakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanā upalabhyate,
S06psp_4u:1258_0: evaṃ na śrotraṃ na śabdo na ghrāṇaṃ na gandho na jihvā na raso na kāyo na spraṣṭavyaṃ
S06psp_4u:1258_1: na mano na dharmo na manovijñānaṃ na manaḥsaṃsparśo na manaḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanāprajñaptir
S06psp_4u:1258_2: upalabhyate. evaṃ na pāramitā na bodhipakṣyā dharmā na vimokṣamukhaṃ na balavaiśāradyapratisaṃvido
S06psp_4u:1258_3: nāveṇikabuddhadharmā yāvan na sarvākārajñatāprajñaptir upalabhyate. evaṃ hi subhūte
S06psp_4u:1258_4: iyaṃ gambhīrā prajñāpāramitā tathāgatānāṃ lokasya saṃdarśayitrī,
S06psp_4u:1259: sā punar iyaṃ gambhīrā prajñāpāramitā na rūpasya darśayitrī yāvan na sarvajñatāyā darśayitrī. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_4u:1260: prajñāpāramitā eva tāvat subhūte prajñāpāramitāyāṃ na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
S06psp_4u:1263: kutaḥ punar vijñānam upalapsyate yāvat kutaḥ punaḥ sarvākārajñatā (PSP_4:60)
S06psp_4u:1265_0: punar aparaṃ subhūte yāvantaḥ sattvāḥ sattvaprajñaptyā prajñapyante rūpiṇo vā arūpiṇo
S06psp_4u:1265_1: vā saṃjñino 'saṃjñino naivasaṃjñino nāsaṃjñina iha vā lokadhātau 'nyeṣu vā daśadiśi
S06psp_4u:1265_2: lokadhātuṣu yāvantaḥ sattvās teṣāṃ yāni saṃkṣiptāni cittāni vikṣiptāni cittāni tāni
S06psp_4u:1265_3: saṃkṣiptāni cittāni vikṣiptāni cittānīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti. kathañ ca subhūte
S06psp_4u:1265_4: tathāgatas teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ tāni saṃkṣiptāni cittāni vikṣiptāni cittānīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti?
S06psp_4u:1266: dharmatayā subhūte tathāgatas teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ saṃkṣiptāni cittāni vikṣiptāni cittānīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti.
S06psp_4u:1268: katamayā bhagavan dharmatayā tathāgatas teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ saṃkṣiptāni cittāni vikṣiptāni cittānīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti?
S06psp_4u:1270: yatra subhūte dharmatāyāṃ dharmataiva nopalabhyate prāg eva saṃkṣiptāni cittāni vikṣiptāni cittāni,
S06psp_4u:1271: anayā subhūte dharmatayā tathāgataḥ saṃkṣiptāni cittāni vikṣiptāni cittāni teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti. iti cittasaṃkṣepajñānam
S06psp_4u:1272_0: punar aparaṃ subhūte tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho 'kṣayataḥ teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ saṃkṣiptāni
S06psp_4u:1272_1: cittāni vikṣiptāni cittāni yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti. kathaṃ ca subhūte tathāgatas teṣāṃ
S06psp_4u:1272_2: sattvānām akṣayataḥ saṃkṣiptāni cittāni vikṣiptāni cittāni yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti?
S06psp_4u:1273: iha subhūte tathāgato nirodhataḥ prahāṇatas teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ tāni cittāni yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti,
S06psp_4u:1274: śāntatas tucchato viviktataḥ tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhas teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ saṃkṣiptāni cittāni vikṣiptāni cittāni yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti. iti cittākṣayākārajñānam
S06psp_4u:1275: punar aparaṃ subhūte tathāgatas teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ sarāgaṃ cittaṃ sarāgaṃ cittam iti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti,
S06psp_4u:1276: vītarāgaṃ cittaṃ vītarāgaṃ cittam iti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti,
S06psp_4u:1277: sadoṣaṃ cittaṃ sadoṣaṃ cittam iti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti,

S06psp_4u:2472: na subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo yāvat sarvākārajñatāṃ vyavacārayati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_4u:2473: tathā hi subhūte sarvākārajñatā na kenacit kṛtā na kutaścid āgatā na kvacid gatā nāpi kvacit sthitā na deśasthā na pradeśasthā na tasyāḥ saṃkhyā upalabhyate,
S06psp_4u:2475: yasyāś ca na saṃkhyā na gamanaṃ nāgamanam upalabhyate,
S06psp_4u:2477: na rūpeṇa na vedanayā na saṃjñayā na saṃskārair na vijñānena na skandhair na dhātubhir nāyatanair na pratītyasamutpādena na pratītyasamutpādāṅgair,
S06psp_4u:2478: na dānena na śīlena na kṣāntyā na vīryeṇa na dhyānena na prajñayā yāvan na sarvākārajñatā jñānenābhisaṃboddhum. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_4u:2481: vijñānam eva sarvākārajñatā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_4u:2482: tathā hi subhūte yā ca rūpasya tathatā,
S06psp_4u:2484: yā ca buddhadharmāṇāṃ tathatā ekaivaiṣā tathatādvayādvaidhīkārā vedanāyāḥ saṃjñāyāḥ saṃskārāṇāṃ,
S06psp_4u:2487: yā ca buddhadharmāṇāṃ tathatā ekaivaiṣā tathatādvayādvaidhīkārā,
S06psp_4u:2490: yā ca buddhadharmāṇāṃ tathatā ekaivaiṣā tathatādvayādvaidhīkārā,
S06psp_4u:2493: yā ca buddhadharmāṇāṃ tathatā ekaivaiṣā tathatādvayādvaidhīkārā. evaṃ yā ca pāramitātathatā,
S06psp_4u:2503: yā ca buddhadharmāṇāṃ tathatā ekaivaiṣā tathatādvayādvaidhīkārā.
S06psp_4u:2504_0: atha khalu kāmāvacarā rūpāvacarāś ca devaputrā divyāni candanacūrṇāni gṛhītvā divyāny
S06psp_4u:2506: yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkrāntā upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasābhivandya ekānte tiṣṭhan,
S06psp_4u:2507: ekānte sthitāś ca kāmāvacarā rūpāvacarāś ca devaputrā bhagavantam etad avocan:
S06psp_4u:2508_0: gambhīrā bhagavan prajñāpāramitā durdṛśā duranubodhātarkātarkāvacarā śāntā śūkṣmā
S06psp_4u:2508_1: nipuṇapaṇḍitavijñavedanīyā sarvalokavipratyanīkā yad uta tathāgatānāṃ bodhir yatra
S06psp_4u:2509: evaṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitām evaṃ nipuṇāṃ nirdiśanti,
S06psp_4u:2512: vijñānam eva sarvākārajñatā sarvākārajñataiva vijñānam. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_4u:2514: yā ca sarvākārajñatāyās tathatā ekaivaiṣā tathatādvayādvaidhīkārā,
S06psp_4u:2519: yā ca sarvākārajñatāyās tathatā ekaivaiṣā tathatādvayādvaidhīkārā. evaṃ skandhadhātvāyatanapratītyasamutpāda eva sarvākārajñatā,
S06psp_4u:2522: yā ca sarvākārajñatātathatā ekaivaiṣā tathatādvayādvaidhīkārā. evaṃ yā ca yāvad buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ tathatā,
S06psp_4u:2523: yā ca yāvat sarvākārajñatāyās tathatā ekaivaiṣā tathatādvayādvaidhīkārā.
S06psp_4u:2524: evam ukte bhagavāṃs tān kāmāvacārān rūpāvacārāṃś ca devaputrān etad avocat:
S06psp_4u:2526: rūpam eva devaputrāḥ sarvākārajñatā sarvākārajñataiva devaputrā rūpaṃ,
S06psp_4u:2528: vijñānam eva devaputrāḥ sarvākārajñatā sarvākārajñataiva devaputrā vijñānam. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_4u:2529: yā ca rūpasya tathatā yā ca sarvākārajñatāyās tathatā ekaivaiṣā tathatādvayādvaidhīkārā,
S06psp_4u:2530: yā ca vedanāyās tathatā yā ca saṃjñāyās tathatā yā ca saṃskārāṇāṃ tathatā,
S06psp_4u:2531: yā ca vijñānasya tathatā yā ca sarvākārajñatāyās tathatā ekaivaiṣā tathatādvayādvaidhīkārā. evaṃ skandhadhātvāyatanapratītyasamutpāda eva sarvākārajñatā,
S06psp_4u:2533: yā ca skandhadhātvāyatanapratītyasamutpādatathatā yā ca sarvākārajñatāyās tathatā ekaivaiṣā tathatādvayādvaidhīkārā. dānapāramitaiva sarvākārajñatā sarvākārajñataiva (PSP_4:116)
S06psp_4u:2536: prajñāpāramitaiva devaputrāḥ sarvākārajñatā sarvākārajñataiva devaputrāḥ prajñāpāramitā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_4u:2538: yā ca sarvākārajñatātathatā ekaivaiṣā tathatādvayādvaidhīkārā. evaṃ śīlapāramitā kṣāntipāramitā vīryapāramitā dhyānapāramitā,
S06psp_4u:2540: yā ca sarvākārajñatātathatā ekaivaiṣā tathatādvayādvaidhīkārā. adhyātmaśūnyataiva sarvākārajñatā sarvākārajñataivādhyātmaśūnyatā,
S06psp_4u:2541: evaṃ yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyataiva sarvākārajñatā sarvākārajñataivābhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_4u:2543: yā ca sarvākārajñatāyās tathatā ekaivaiṣā tathatādvayādvaidhīkārā. smṛtyupasthānāny eva sarvākārajñatā sarvākārajñataiva smṛtyupasthānāi,
S06psp_4u:2544: evaṃ samyakprahāṇarddhipādendriyabalabodhyaṅgamārgā eva sarvākārajñatā sarvākārajñataiva samyakprahāṇarddhipādendriyabalabodhyaṅgamārgāḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_4u:2545: yā ca smṛtyupasthānatathatā yā ca sarvākārajñatātathathā ekaivaiṣā tathatādvayādvaidhīkārā. evaṃ yā ca samyakprahāṇarddhipādendriyabalabodhyaṅgamārgatathatā,
S06psp_4u:2546: yā ca sarvākārajñatātathatā ekaivaiṣā tathatādvayādvaidhīkārā. apramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattaya eva sarvākārajñatā sarvākārajñataivāpramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattayaḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_4u:2547_0: yā cāpramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattitathatā yā ca sarvākārajñatātathatā ekaivaiṣā tathatādvayāadvaidhīkārā.
S06psp_4u:2548: āveṇikabuddhadharmā eva sarvākārajñatā sarvākārajñataivāveṇikabuddhadharmāḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_4u:2550: yā ca sarvākārajñatāyās tathathā ekaivaiṣā tathatādvayādvaidhīkārā. evaṃ srotaāpattiphalaṃ sakṛdāgāmiphalam anāgāmiphalam arhattvaṃ pratyekabuddhā,
S06psp_4u:2551: buddhā eva sarvākārajñatā sarvākārajñataiva buddhāḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_4u:2553_0: yā ca sarvākārajñatāyās tathatā ekaivaiṣā tathatādvayādvaidhīkārā. idam api devaputrā
S06psp_4u:2553_1: arthavaśaṃ saṃpaśyaṃs tathāgato 'lpotsukatāyāṃ cittaṃ nāmayāmāsa na dharmadeśanāyām. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_4u:2555: dharmo durdṛśo duranubodho 'tarko 'tarkāvacaraḥ śāntaḥ śūkṣmaḥ paṇḍitavijñavedanīyaḥ sarvalokavipratyanīko yad uteyaṃ tathāgatānāṃ bodhiḥ,
S06psp_4u:2556_0: sā na kenacid abhisaṃbuddhā na kadācid abhisaṃbuddhā na kvacid abhisaṃbuddhā iyaṃ
S06psp_4u:2556_1: sā dharmāṇāṃ gambhīratā dharmatā yatra na dvayasamudācāro nādvayasamudācāraḥ saṃvidyate.
S06psp_4u:2558: tathatāgambhīratayā dharmadhātugambhīratayā bhūtakoṭīgambhīratayā acintyadharmadhātugambhīratayā devaputrā gambhīro 'yaṃ dharmaḥ,
