S06psp_4u:2562: skandhagambhīratayā dhātugambhīratayāyatanagambhīratayā pratītyasamutpādagambhīratayā pratītyasamutpādāṅgagambhīratayā devaputrā gambhīro 'yaṃ dharmaḥ,
S06psp_4u:2564: śīlapāramitāgambhīratayā kṣāntipāramitāgambhīratayā vīryapāramitāgambhīratayā dhyānapāramitāgambhīratayā prajñāpāramitāgambhīratayā devaputrā gambhīro 'yaṃ dharmaḥ,
S06psp_4u:2565: adhyātmaśūnyatāgambhīratayā yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāgambhīratayā devaputrā gambhīro 'yaṃ dharmaḥ,
S06psp_4u:2570: evam ukte devaputrā bhagavantam etad avocan:
S06psp_4u:2571: sarvalokavipratyanīko 'yaṃ bhagavan dharmo deśyate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_4u:2572: nāyaṃ bhagavan dharmo rūpasyodgrahāya nānudgrahāya vā deśyate,
S06psp_4u:2573: na vedanāyā na saṃjñāyā na saṃskārāṇāṃ,
S06psp_4u:2574: na vijñānasyodgrahāya nānudgrahāya vā deśyate, na (PSP_4:118)
S06psp_4u:2575_1: vā deśyate. evaṃ na sarvaśūnyatānāṃ saptatriṃśadbodhipkṣyāṇāṃ dharmāṇāṃ daśabalavaiśāradyapratisaṃvidāveṇikabuddhadharmāṇām
S06psp_4u:2575_2: udgrahāya vā nānudgrahāya vā dharma upadeśyate,
S06psp_4u:2576: na sarvadharmāṇām udgrahāya nānudgrahāya vā dharmo deśyate,
S06psp_4u:2577_0: nāyaṃ bhagavan dharmaḥ srotaāpattiphalasya udgrahāya nānudgrahāya vā deśyate. evaṃ
S06psp_4u:2577_1: na sakṛdāgāmiphalasya nānāgāmiphalasya nārhattvasya na pratyekabodher yāvat sarvākārajñatāyā
S06psp_4u:2578: udgrahe ca lokaś carati mama rūpaṃ,
S06psp_4u:2579: mama vedanā mama saṃjñā mama saṃskārā mama vijñānaṃ,
S06psp_4u:2580: mama skandhā mama dhātavo mamāyatanāni mama pratītyasamutpādo 'haṃ pratītyasamutpannaḥ,
S06psp_4u:2581: mama dānam ahaṃ dānapatir mama śīlam ahaṃ śīlavān mama kṣāntir ahaṃ kṣāntimān mama vīryam ahaṃ vīryavān mama dhyānam ahaṃ dhyānavān mama prajñā ahaṃ prajñāvān,
S06psp_4u:2582: mamādhyātmaśūnyatā aham adhyātmaśūnyatāṃ bhāvayāmi yāvan mamābhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāham abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāṃ bhāvayāmi,
S06psp_4u:2583_1: mamāryasatyāni mamābhijñā mama vimokṣasamādhisamāpattidhāraṇīmukhāni mama śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitāni
S06psp_4u:2583_3: mama srotaāpattiphalam ahaṃ srotaāpanno mama sakṛdāgāmiphalam ahaṃ sakṛdāgāmī mamānāgāmiphalam
S06psp_4u:2583_4: aham anāgāmī mamārhattvam aham arhan mama pratyekabodhir ahaṃ pratyekabuddho mama
S06psp_4u:2584: bhagavān āha: evam etad devaputrā evam etan,
S06psp_4u:2585: nāyaṃ devaputrā dharmo rūpasyodgrahāya deśyate nānudgrahāya,
S06psp_4u:2586: na vedanāyā na saṃjñāyā na saṃskārāṇāṃ,
S06psp_4u:2587: na vijñānasyodgrahāya deśyate nānudgrahāya. ye tu devaputrā rūpasyodgrahāya caranti,
S06psp_4u:2590: na te bhavyāḥ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayitum. ye skandhadhātvāyatanapratītyasamutpādānām udgrahāya caranti,
S06psp_4u:2595: na te bhavyāḥ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayituṃ yāvan na pratibalā dhyānavīryakṣāntiśīladānapāramitāṃ bhāvayituṃ,
S06psp_4u:2596: yāvan na pratibalāḥ sarvākārajñatāṃ bhāvayitum. iti sarvalokavipratyanīkasvabhāvaḥ
S06psp_4u:2597: subhūtir āha: sarvadharmānulomiko 'yaṃ bhagavan dharmaḥ, kasyānulomiko 'yaṃ bhagavan dharmaḥ?
S06psp_4u:2599: yāvad dhyānapāramitā vīryapāramitā kṣāntipāramitā śīlapāramitā dānapāramitānulomiko 'yaṃ bhagavan dharmaḥ,
S06psp_4u:2608: sarvākārajñatānulomiko 'yaṃ bhagavan dharmaḥ. nāyaṃ dharmaḥ kvacit pratihanyate rūpe na pratihanyate,
S06psp_4u:2609: evaṃ vedanāyāṃ saṃjñāyāṃ saṃskāreṣu vijñāne na pratihanyate,
S06psp_4u:2615: sarvākārajñatāyāṃ na pratihanyate. apratihatalakṣaṇo batāyaṃ dharmaḥ,
S06psp_4u:2640: atha khalu te kāmāvacarā rūpāvacarāś ca devaputrā bhagavantam etad avocan:
S06psp_4u:2641: anujāto 'yaṃ bhagavan bhagavataḥ subhūtiḥ sthaviraḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_4u:2642: tathā hi yadyad eva deśayati sarvatac chūnyatānimittāpraṇihitam ārabhya dharmaṃ deśayati.
S06psp_4u:2643: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtis tān kāmāvacarān rūpāvacarāṃś ca devaputrān āmantrayāmāsa:
S06psp_4u:2646: kim ity anujātatvāt subhūtiḥ sthaviro 'nujātas tathāgatasya?
S06psp_4u:2649: evaṃ hi subhūtiḥ sthaviras tathāgatasyānujātaḥ. yā tathāgatasya tathatā sā sarvadharmatathatā,
S06psp_4u:2650: yā sarvadharmatathatā sā tathāgatatathatā avitathatā ananyatathatā,
S06psp_4u:2651: evaṃ hi subhūtiḥ sthaviras tathāgatam anujātaḥ. yā tathāgatatathatā sā sthititathatā yā sthititathatā sā tathāgatatathatā,
S06psp_4u:2652: evaṃ hi subhūtiḥ sthaviras tathāgatam anujātaḥ. yathā tathāgatatathatāvikārā nirvikārā,
S06psp_4u:2653_0: evaṃ hi subhūteḥ sthavirasya tathatāvikārā nirvikārā yathā tathāgatasya tathatā na
S06psp_4u:2653_1: kvacit pratihanyate. evaṃ sarvadharmatathatā na kvacit pratihanyate. yā ca tathāgatatathatā
S06psp_4u:2654: ekaivaiṣā tathatādvayādvaidhīkārā na sā kadācin na tathatā,
S06psp_4u:2655: yataḥ sā na kadācin na tathatā tataḥ sā tathatādvayādvaidhīkārā. evaṃ hi subhūtiḥ sthaviras tathāgatam anujātaḥ. yathā tathāgatatathatā sarvatragāvikalpā nirvikalpā,
S06psp_4u:2656: evaṃ hi subhūtitathatā sarvatragāvikalpā nirvikalpā. yathā tathāgatatathatā abhinnā abhedatathatānupalabhyā,
S06psp_4u:2657: evaṃ subhūtitathatā abhinnā abhedatathatānupalabhyā. evaṃ hi subhūtisthaviras tathāgatam anujātaḥ. yathā tathāgatatathatānanyatathatā sarvadharmatathatā,
S06psp_4u:2658: yā na sā kadācin na tathatā,
S06psp_4u:2659: sadā sā tathatā tathaiva subhūtisthaviro 'nanyatathatā yā tathāgatam anujāto na kvacid anujātaḥ,

S06psp_4u:2661: evaṃ sarvadharmatathatā nātītā nānāgatā na pratyutpannā. evaṃ hi subhūtisthaviratathatā nātītā nānāgatā na pratyutpannā,

S06psp_4u:2699: dakṣiṇā dig unnamati uttarā dig avanamati,
S06psp_4u:2702: atha khalu kāmāvacarā rūpāvacarāś ca devaputrā divyaiś candanacūrṇair bhagavantaṃ subhūtisthaviraṃ cābhyavakirann evaṃ ca vācam abhāṣanta,
S06psp_4u:2703: āścaryaṃ bhagavan yāvad ayaṃ subhūtisthaviras tathāgatatathatayā tathāgatam anujātaḥ. ity agatisvabhāvaḥ
S06psp_4u:2704: atha khalu subhūtisthaviras teṣāṃ devaputrāṇāṃ tām eva kathām anubadhnāti sma,
S06psp_4u:2705: iti hi devaputrāḥ subhūtisthaviro na rūpam anujāto na rūpasya tathatām anujāto,
S06psp_4u:2710_0: nānyatra vijñānatathatāyā anujātaḥ na skandhadhātvāyatanam anujāto na skandhadhātvāyatanatathatām
S06psp_4u:2710_1: anujāto nānyatra skandhadhātvāyatanatathatāyā anujātaḥ na pratītyasamutpādam anujāto
S06psp_4u:2711_0: nānyatra pratītyasamutpādatathatāyā anujātaḥ. evaṃ sarvapāramitāḥ sarvaśūnyatāḥ saptatriṃśadbodhipakṣyā
S06psp_4u:2716: nānyatra saṃskṛtatathatāyā anujātaḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_4u:2717: tathā hi te dharmā na saṃvidyante nopalabhyante yo vānujāyeta yena vānujāyeta,
S06psp_4u:2718: yo vānujanyeta yena vānujanyeta. ity ajātisvabhāvaḥ
S06psp_4u:2719: atha khalv āyuṣmāc chāriputro bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_4u:2720: gambhīreyaṃ bhagavaṃs tathatā avitathatā ananyatathatā dharmatā dharmadhātusthititā dharmaniyāmatā bhūtakoṭir,
S06psp_4u:2721: yatra na rūpam upalabhyate na rūpatathatā,
S06psp_4u:2722: yadā rūpam eva nopalabhyate kutaḥ punā rūpatathatopalapsyate,
S06psp_4u:2723: yatra na vedanā na saṃjñā na saṃskārā,
S06psp_4u:2724: yatra na vijñānam upalabhyate na vijñānatathatā,
S06psp_4u:2725: yadā vijñānam eva nopalabhyate kutaḥ punar vijñānatathatopalapsyate. yatra na skandhadhātvāyatanāny upalabhyante na skandhadhātvāyatanatathatā,
S06psp_4u:2727: kutaḥ punaḥ skandhadhātvāyatanatathatopalapsyate. yatra na pratītyasamutpādo na pratītyasamutpādāṅgāni copalabhyante na pratītyasamutpādatathatā na pratītyasamutpādāṅgatathatā vā,
S06psp_4u:2728: yadā pratītyasamutpādaḥ pratītyasamutpādāṅgāny eva vā nopalabhyate,
S06psp_4u:2729_0: kutaḥ punaḥ pratītyasamutpādatathatā pratītyasamutpādāṅgatathatā vopalapsyate. evaṃ
S06psp_4u:2735: bhagavān āha: evam etac chāriputra evam etad,
S06psp_4u:2739: rūpam eva nopalabhyate kutaḥ punā rūpasya tathatopalapsyate,
S06psp_4u:2740: yatra na vedanā na saṃjñā na saṃskārā,
S06psp_4u:2741: na vijñānam upalabhyate na vijñānasya tathatopalabhyate vijñānam eva nopalabhyate kuto vijñānasya tathatopalapsyate. (PSP_4:125)
S06psp_4u:2742: yatra na skandhadhātvāyatanapratītyasamutpādā upalabhyante na skandhadhātvāyatanapratītyasamutpādasya tathatopalabhyate,
S06psp_4u:2744: kutaḥ punaḥ skandhadhātvāyatanapratītyasamutpādasya tathatopalapsyate. evaṃ yāvan na sarvākārajñatopalabhyate na sarvākārajñatāyās tathatopalabhyate sarvākārajñataiva nopalabhyate,
S06psp_4u:2745_0: kutaḥ punaḥ sarvākārajñatāyās tathatopalapsyate. asyāṃ khalu punaḥ śāriputra tathatāyām
S06psp_4u:2745_1: avitathatāyām ananyatathatāyāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāyāṃ bhikṣuśatadvayasyānupādāyāsravebhyaś cittāni vimuktāni,
S06psp_4u:2746: pañcānāṃ bhikṣuṇīśatānāṃ virajo vigatamalaṃ dharmeṣu dharmacakṣur viśuddhaṃ,
S06psp_4u:2748: ṣaṣṭeś ca bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ parihāṇadharmakāṇām anupādāyāsravebhyaś cittāni vimuktāni.
S06psp_4u:2749: atha khalv āyuṣmān śāriputras teṣāṃ bodhisattvānām anupādāyāsravebhyaś cittāni vimuktāni viditvā bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_4u:2750: ko bhagavan hetuḥ kaḥ pratyayo yad eteṣāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānām anupādāyāsravebhyaś cittāni vimuktāni?
S06psp_4u:2752: etaiś ca śāriputra bodhisattvaiḥ pañcabuddhaśatāni paryupāsitāni sarvatra ca dānaṃ dattaṃ śīlaṃ rakṣitaṃ kṣāntyā saṃpāditaṃ vīryam ārabdhaṃ dhyānāny utpāditāni prajñā bhāvitā,
S06psp_4u:2753: te prajñāpāramitayā virahitatvād upāyakauśalyena cāparigṛhītatvād evaṃ caritāḥ,
S06psp_4u:2754: vayaṃ dānaṃ dadāmo vayaṃ śīlaṃ rakṣāmo vayaṃ kṣāntyā saṃpādayāmo vayaṃ vīryam ārabhāmahe vayaṃ dhyānaṃ samāpadyāmahe vayaṃ prajñāṃ bhāvayāmaḥ,
S06psp_4u:2755: te prajñāpāramitāvirahitatvād anupāyakauśalena dānaṃ śīlaṃ kṣāntiṃ vīryaṃ dhyānaṃ prajñāṃ bhāvayāmāsuḥ,
S06psp_4u:2756: te nānātvasaṃjñāyāṃ caranto nānātvopalabdhyā bodhisattvaniyāmaṃ nāvakrāmanti,
S06psp_4u:2757: te bodhisattvaniyāmam anavakrāmantaḥ srotaāpattiphalaṃ prāptā yāvad arhattvaṃ prāptāḥ,
S06psp_4u:2758_0: kiṃ cāpi śāriputra bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānām asti mārgaḥ śūnyatā vā nimittaṃ vā
S06psp_4u:2758_1: praṇihitaṃ vā te prajñāpāramitayā virahitā upāyakauśalyena cāparigṛhītā bhūtakoṭiṃ
S06psp_4u:2761_0: kena kāraṇena bhagavaṃs tair evaṃ śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitair dharmaiḥ subhāvitaiḥ
S06psp_4u:2761_1: prajñāpāramitayā virahitā upāyakauśalyena cāparigṛhītā bhūtakoṭiṃ sākṣātkṛtvā śrāvakā
S06psp_4u:2761_2: bhavanti. bodhisattvāḥ punar bhagavaṃs tair evaṃ śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitair dharmaiḥ
S06psp_4u:2761_3: subhāvitaiḥ prajñāpāramitām upāyakauśalyaṃ cāgamyānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhyante?
S06psp_4u:2762: bhagavān āha: iha śāriputra ekaḥ sarvākārajñatācittena virahitaḥ,
S06psp_4u:2763_0: śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitān dharmān bhāvayann upāyakauśalyam anāgamya śrāvako bhavati.
S06psp_4u:2763_1: aparaḥ punaḥ śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvākārajñatācittenāvirahitaḥ śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitān
S06psp_4u:2763_2: dharmān bhāvayann upāyakauśalena bodhisattvaniyāmam avakrāmaty anuttarāṃ ca samyaksaṃbodhim
S06psp_4u:2763_3: abhisaṃbuddhyate. tadyathāpi nāma śāriputra pakṣiṇaḥ śakuner yojanaśatiko vā ātmabhāvo bhaved,
S06psp_4u:2764: dviyojanaśatiko vā triyojanaśatiko vā caturyojanaśatiko vā ātmabhāvo bhavet,
S06psp_4u:2765: sa devebhyas trayastriṃśebhyo jambūdvīpam āgantavyaṃ manyeta,
S06psp_4u:2766: sa ca pakṣī śakunir apakṣo bhavet,
S06psp_4u:2767: sa devebhyas trayastriṃśebhya ātmānaṃ parimoktavyaṃ manyeta jambūdvīpaṃ gamiṣyāmīti. atha tasya pakṣiṇaḥ śakuner ardhapatitasyaltad abhavat,
S06psp_4u:2768: aho batāhaṃ deveṣu trayastriṃśeṣu pratitiṣṭheyam iti. tat kiṃ manyase śāriputrāpi nu sa pakṣī śakuniḥ pratibalaḥ,
S06psp_4u:2773: aho batāham akṣato 'nupahato jambūdvīpe pratitiṣṭheyam iti. tat kiṃ manyase śāriputrāpi nu sa pakṣī śakunir akṣato 'nupahato jambūdvīpe pratitiṣṭhet?
S06psp_4u:2775: kṣataś cāsau bhagavann upahataś cāprāpta eva jambūdvīpaṃ maraṇaṃ nigacchet. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_4u:2776: evam etad bhavati bhagavan yasya mahāṃś cātmabhāvo bhavati,
S06psp_4u:2777: ajātapakṣaś ca dūrāc ca viprakṛṣṭāt prapatati.
S06psp_4u:2779: evam eva śāriputra kiñ cāpi bodhisattvo mahāsattvo gaṅgānadīvālukopamān kalpān avagamya dānaṃ dadāti śīlaṃ rakṣati kṣāntyā saṃpādayati vīryam ārabhate dhyānaṃ samāpadyate,
S06psp_4u:2780: tasya ca mahat prasthānaṃ mahāṃś cittotpādo 'pramāṇaparigraho 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃboddhuṃ,
S06psp_4u:2782: virahitaḥ śrāvakabhūmiṃ vā pratyekabuddhabhūmiṃ vā patati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_4u:2783_0: tathā hi tena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sarvākārajñatāvirahitena cittena dānaṃ dattaṃ
S06psp_4u:2783_1: bhavati śīlaṃ rakṣitaṃ kṣāntyā saṃpāditaṃ vīryam ārabdhaṃ dhyānāny utpāditāni sa
S06psp_4u:2784_0: tena sa śrāvakabhūmiṃ vā pratyekabuddhabhūmiṃ vā patati. kiñ cāpi sa śāriputra bodhisattvo
S06psp_4u:2785: na ca sa tathāgatānāṃ śīlaṃ jānāti samādhiṃ jānāti prajñāṃ jānāti vimuktiṃ jānāti vimuktijñānadarśanaṃ jānāti,
S06psp_4u:2786_0: so 'jānan na budhyamānaḥ śūnyatāyām ānimitte praṇihite vā śāntiṃ śṛṇoti sa tāṃ śāntiṃ
S06psp_4u:2786_1: nimittīkaroti nimittataś cānuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye pariṇāmayati. evaṃ hi pariṇāmayan
S06psp_4u:2786_2: bodhisattvaḥ sthāsyati śrāvakabhūmau vā pratyekabuddhabhūmau vā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_4u:2787: evam etac chāriputra yaḥ prajñāpāramitayopāyakauśalena ca virahito bhavati,
S06psp_4u:2788: na ca kuśalamūlāny anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye pariṇāmayati,
S06psp_4u:2789: sa śrāvakabhūmiṃ vā pratyekabuddhabhūmiṃ vā patati. iti tathatānupalambhasvabhāvaḥ
S06psp_4u:2791_0: yaḥ punaḥ śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prathamacittotpādam upādāya sarvākārajñatācittenāvirahito
S06psp_4u:2791_1: dānaṃ dadāti śīlaṃ rakṣati kṣāntyā saṃpādayati vīryam ārabhate dhyānāni ca samāpadyate
S06psp_4u:2792: smṛtyupasthānasamyakprahāṇarddhipādendriyabalabodhyaṅgamārgān bhāvayati na ca nimittīkaroti yāvat sarvākārajñatāṃ bhāvayati na ca nimittīkaroti. iti sāmānyena mokṣabhāgīyam
S06psp_4u:2793: sa ca prajñāpāramitayopāyakauśalyena cāvirahitas traiyadhvikān buddhān samanvāharati,
S06psp_4u:2794: teṣāṃ cātītānāgatapratyutpannānāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatayaś ca śīlaskandhaḥ samādhiskandhaḥ prajñāskandho vimuktiskandho vimuktijñānadarśanaskandhaḥ,
S06psp_4u:2795_0: tatsarvaṃ na nimittīkaroti na śūnyatāsamādhiṃ nimittīkaroti ānimittasamādhim apraṇihitasamādhiṃ
S06psp_4u:2795_1: na nimittīkaroti veditavyam etac chāriputra nāyaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ śrāvakabhūmau
S06psp_4u:2797: akṣato 'nupahato 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyate. iti śraddhātmakaṃ mokṣabhāgīyam
S06psp_4u:2799: tathā hi tena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prathamacittotpādam upādāya dānaṃ dattaṃ na ca nimittīkṛtaṃ,
S06psp_4u:2800: śīlaṃ rakṣitaṃ kṣāntyā saṃpāditaṃ vīryam ārabdhaṃ dhyānaṃ samāpannaṃ prajñā bhāvitā na ca nimittīkṛtā,
S06psp_4u:2802_0: idaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ tad upāyakauśalyaṃ yan nimittavirahitena
S06psp_4u:2802_1: cittena dānaṃ dadāti śīlaṃ rakṣati kṣāntyā saṃpādayati vīryam ārabhate dhyānaṃ samāpadyate
S06psp_4u:2806: daśabalavaiśāradyapratisaṃvidāveṇikabuddhadharmān bhāvayati yāvat sarvākārajñatāyāṃ carati na ca nimittīkaroti. iti vīryātmakaṃ mokṣabhāgīyam
S06psp_4u:2807: śāriputra āha: yathāhaṃ bhagavan bhagavato bhāṣitasyārtham ājānāmi,
S06psp_4u:2808: yo bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitayā copāyakauśalyena cāvirahitāśayas tasyānuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiḥ. iti smṛtyātmakaṃ mokṣabhāgīyam
S06psp_4u:2810_0: tathā hi bhagavan tena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prathamacittotpādam upādāya na
S06psp_4u:2810_1: kaścid dharma upalabdho yo 'bhisaṃbudhyeta yena cābhisaṃbudhyeta yaṃ cābhisaṃbudhyeta
S06psp_4u:2810_2: rūpaṃ vā vedanā vā saṃjñā vā saṃskārā vā vijñānaṃ vā,
S06psp_4u:2811_0: evaṃ skandhadhātvāyatanapratītyasamutpādo vā pratītyasamutpādāṅgāni vā sarvapāramitā
S06psp_4u:2811_1: vā sarvaśūnyatā vā saptatriṃśadbodhipakṣyā vā dharmā āryasatyāni vā apramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattayo
S06psp_4u:2811_3: vā buddhadharmāḥ sarvākārajñatā vā. ye punar ime bhagavan bodhisattvayānikāḥ kulaputrāḥ
S06psp_4u:2811_4: kuladuhitaraś ca prajñāpāramitāvirahitā upāyakauśalyavirahitāś ca saṃśayas teṣāṃ
S06psp_4u:2813: tathā hi bhagavaṃs tair bodhisattvayānikaiḥ kulaputraiḥ kuladuhitṛbhir vā prajñāpāramitopāyakauśalyavirahitair yadyad eva dānaṃ dattaṃ tatsarvaṃ nimittīkṛtya dattam,
S06psp_4u:2814: evaṃ yadyad eva śīlaṃ rakṣitaṃ kṣāntyā saṃpāditaṃ vīryam ārabdhaṃ dhyānaṃ samāpannaṃ,
S06psp_4u:2815_0: yā caiva prajñā vyavacāritā sā sarvā nimittīkṛtya vyavacāritā. tasmāt saṃśayas teṣāṃ
S06psp_4u:2815_1: bodhisattvayānikānāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṛṇāṃ cānuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ pratikāṅkṣitavyaḥ.
S06psp_4u:2815_2: tasmāt tarhi bhagavan bodhisattvena mahāsattvenānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃboddhukāmena
S06psp_4u:2816_1: dānaṃ dātavyaṃ śīlaṃ rakṣitavyaṃ kṣāntyā saṃpādayitavyaṃ vīryam ārabdhavyaṃ dhyānaṃ
S06psp_4u:2816_2: samāpattavyaṃ prajñā bhāvayitavyā. ānimittasahagatena cittena adhyātmaśūnyatā bhāvayitavyā,
S06psp_4u:2817: yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā bhāvayitavyā. ānimittasahagatena cittena smṛtyupasthānāni bhāvayitavyāni. evaṃ samyakprahāṇarddhipādendriyabalabodhyaṅgāni,
S06psp_4u:2818_0: ānimittasahagatena cittenāryāṣṭāṅgo mārgo bhāvayitavyaḥ. ānimittasahagatena cittenāpramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattayaḥ
S06psp_4u:2821: atha khalu kāmāvacarā rūpāvacarāś ca devaputrā bhagavantam etad avocan:
S06psp_4u:2823: yatra hi sarvākāraiś ca nāma bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sarvadharmā 'bhisaṃboddhavyās te ca dharmā na saṃvidyanti nopalabhyante.
S06psp_4u:2824: bhagavān āha: evam etad devaputrā evam etat,
S06psp_4u:2827: na ca me kaścid dharma upalabdho yo 'bhisaṃbudhyeta yena cābhisaṃbudhyeta yaṃ cābhisaṃbudhyeta. (PSP_4:130)
S06psp_4u:2828: tat kasya hetoḥ? atyantaviśuddhatvād devaputrāḥ sarvadharmāṇām. iti prajñātmakaṃ mokṣabhāgiyam
S06psp_4u:2829: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat: yad bhagavān evam āha,
S06psp_4u:2831: yathā punar ahaṃ bhagavato bhāṣitasyārtham ājānāmi. yathā ca mama bhavati,
S06psp_4u:2832: tathā svabhisaṃbodhā bhagavann anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_4u:2833: tathā hi bhagavan na kaścid abhisaṃbudhyate na kenacid abhisaṃbudhyate na kiñcid abhisaṃboddhavyaṃ,
S06psp_4u:2835: śūnyeṣu bhagavan sarvadharmeṣu sa dharmo na saṃvidyate,
S06psp_4u:2836: yo 'bhisaṃbudhyeta yena vābhisaṃbudhyeta yaṃ vābhisaṃbudhyeta. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_4u:2838: yasyāpi dharmasya vṛddhaye vā prahāṇāya vā dānaṃ vā dadyāt,
S06psp_4u:2839: śīlaṃ vā rakṣet kṣāntiṃ vā saṃpādayet vīryaṃ vā ārabheta dhyānaṃ vā samāpadyeta,
S06psp_4u:2842_0: yaś cābhisaṃbudhyeta yena cābhisaṃbudhyeta yaṃ cābhisaṃbudhyeta sarve te dharmāḥ
S06psp_4u:2842_1: śūnyāḥ. anena bhagavan paryāyeṇa svabhisaṃbodhā bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānām anuttarā
S06psp_4u:2843: tathā hi bhagavan rūpaṃ rūpasvabhāvena śūnyaṃ,
S06psp_4u:2853: atha khalv āyuṣmān śāriputra āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
S06psp_4u:2854: anenāyuṣman subhūte paryāyeṇa durabhisaṃbhavānuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_4u:2855: tathā hy āyuṣman subhūte nākāśasyaivaṃ bhavati,
S06psp_4u:2856: aham anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsya iti. evam evāyuṣman subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya naivaṃ bhavati,
S06psp_4u:2857: aham anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsya iti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_4u:2860: atha ca punar bodhisattvo mahāsattva ākāśasamān sarvadharmān adhimucyānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyate,
S06psp_4u:2861_0: sacet punar bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyākāśasamān sarvadharmān adhimucya svabhisaṃbodhā

S06psp_4u:3388: yāni mayaivaṃ buddhvā sarveṣv api triṣu yāneṣu śikṣitavyam.
S06psp_4u:3389: tam enaṃ māraḥ pāpīyān bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ harṣitaṃ viditvā evaṃ vakṣyati:
S06psp_4u:3390_0: icchasi tvaṃ kulaputra tān bodhisattvān mahāsattvān draṣṭuṃ yair bodhisattvair mahāsattvair
S06psp_4u:3391_0: gaṅgānadīvālukopamānāṃ ca tathāgatānām arhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānām antike dānapāramitā
S06psp_4u:3391_1: paripūritā śīlapāramitā paripūritā kṣāntipāramitā paripūritā vīryapāramitā paripūritā
S06psp_4u:3392: gaṅgānadīvālukopamāś caiva buddhā bhagavantaḥ paryupāsitāḥ paripṛcchitāḥ paripraśnīkṛtā,
S06psp_4u:3393: asyaiva bodhisattvayānasyārthāya kathaṃ bodhisattvair mahāsattvair bodhisattvayāne sthātavyaṃ?
S06psp_4u:3394: kathaṃ dānapāramitāyāṃ caratā śīlapāramitāyāṃ caratā kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ caratā vīryapāramitāyāṃ caratā dhyānapāramitāyāṃ caratā prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā sthātavyam? evaṃ (PSP_4:151)
S06psp_4u:3396: yathā tair buddhair bhagavadbhir ākhyātaṃ tathā sthitvā tathā caritvā tathā yogam āpadyāpi tair eva tāvad bodhisattvair mahāsattvair anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhir nābhisaṃbuddhā,
S06psp_4u:3397: tathā caritais tathānuśāsitais tathā sthitais tathā śikṣamāṇaiḥ sarvākārajñatā nānuprāptā,
S06psp_4u:3398: kutaḥ punas tvam anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim anuprāpsyasi?
S06psp_4u:3399: saced bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya evaṃ vivecyamānasya cittasyānyathātvaṃ na bhavati nottrasyati na saṃtrasyati na saṃtrāsam āpadyate,
S06psp_4u:3401: bahukaro me 'yaṃ bhikṣur yo mamaitāny aṅgāny upadiśati,
S06psp_4u:3402: yair aṅgaiḥ srotaāpattiphalaṃ prāpyate sakṛdāgāmiphalam anāgāmiphalam arhattvaṃ pratyekabodhir yāvat sarvākārajñatānuprāpyate.
S06psp_4u:3403: tataḥ sa punar māraḥ pāpīyān bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya cittasyānavalīnatāṃ viditvā tatraiva pṛthivīpradeśe saṃbahulān bhikṣūn abhinirmiṇoti,
S06psp_4u:3405: ime te 'rhantaḥ kṣīṇāsravā ye te 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau saṃprasthitā abhūvaṃs te 'rhattve sthitāḥ,
S06psp_4u:3406: kutaḥ punas tvam anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyase?
S06psp_4u:3409: na ca bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran pratyudāvartyānuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ śrāvakabhūmiṃ vā pratyekabuddhabhūmiṃ vā patati,
S06psp_4u:3411_0: asthānam anavakāśo yad bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dānapāramitāyāṃ caran śīlapāramitāyāṃ
S06psp_4u:3411_1: caran kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ caran vīryapāramitāyāṃ caran dhyānapāramitāyāṃ caran prajñāpāramitāyāṃ
S06psp_4u:3411_2: carann adhyātmaśūnyatāyāṃ caran bahirdhāśūnyatāyāṃ caran yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāyāṃ caran,
S06psp_4u:3412: smṛtyupasthāneṣu caran samyakprahāṇarddhipādendriyabalabodhyaṅgamārgeṣu caran sarvavimokṣasamādhisamāpattidhāraṇīmukheṣu carann apramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattiṣu caran,
S06psp_4u:3418: punar aparaṃ subhūte 'vinivartanīyasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carata evaṃ bhavati,
S06psp_4u:3419_0: saced evaṃ śikṣitvā yathā tathāgatenākhyātaṃ tayā caryayāvirahitasyaibhiḥ pāramitāpratisaṃyuktair
S06psp_4u:3419_1: manasikārair avirahito bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na parihīyate dānapāramitayā na parihīyate
S06psp_4u:3419_2: śīlapāramitayā na parihīyate kṣāntipāramitayā na parihīyate vīryapāramitayā na parihīyate
S06psp_4u:3419_3: dhyānapāramitayā na parihīyate prajñāpāramitayā na parihīyate adhyātmaśūnyatayā na
S06psp_4u:3419_5: na parihīyate apramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattibhir na parihīyate śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitābhijñābhir
S06psp_4u:3420: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carata evaṃ bhavati,
S06psp_4u:3421_0: yo mārakarmāṇi budhyate sa na parihīyate 'nuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ ebhiḥ subhūte
S06psp_4u:3421_1: ākārair ebhir liṅgair ebhir nimittaiḥ samanvāgato 'vinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo
S06psp_4u:3422: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_4u:3423: kuto bhagavann avinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'vinivartanīya iti prajñāyate.
S06psp_4u:3426: dhātusaṃjñāyā āyatanasaṃjñāyāḥ pratītyasamutpādasaṃjñāyāḥ pratītyasamutpādāṅgasaṃjñāyā rāgasaṃjñāyā doṣasaṃjñāyā mohasaṃjñāyā dṛṣṭisaṃjñāyāḥ,
S06psp_4u:3427: dānapāramitāsaṃjñāyāḥ śīlapāramitāsaṃjñāyāḥ kṣāntipāramitāsaṃjñāyāḥ vīryapāramitāsaṃjñāyā dhyānapāramitāsaṃjñāyāḥ prajñāpāramitāsaṃjñāyā vivartito,
S06psp_4u:3434: bodhisattvasaṃjñāyā vivartito yāvad buddhasaṃjñāyā vivartitaḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_4u:3435_0: tathā hi subhūte 'vinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ svalakṣaṇaśūnyair dharmair
S06psp_4u:3435_1: bodhisattvanyāmam avakrāntaḥ. sa tam api dharmaṃ nopalabhate anupalabhamāno nābhisaṃskaroty
S06psp_4u:3435_2: anabhisaṃskurvan notpādayati tenocyate 'nutpādakṣāntiko bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'vinivartanīya ity,
S06psp_4u:3436: ebhiḥ subhūte ākārair ebhir liṅgair ebhir nimittaiḥ samanvāgato 'vinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo veditavyaḥ.
S06psp_4u:3438: punar aparaṃ subhūte māraḥ pāpīyān bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvam upasaṃkramyaivaṃ vicchandayiṣyati:
S06psp_4u:3439: ākāśasamaiṣā yad uta sarvākārajñatā ākāśabhāvanaiṣā abhāvasvabhāvalakṣaṇaśūnyatā,
S06psp_4u:3440: ete 'pi dharmā ākāśasamā abhāvasvabhāvāḥ svalakṣaṇaśūnyā na cākāśasamair dharmair abhāvasvabhāvaiḥ svalakṣaṇaśūnyaiḥ kaścid dharma upalabhyate,
S06psp_4u:3441: yo vābhisaṃbudhyate yena vābhisaṃbudhyate yaṃ vābhisaṃbudhyate,
S06psp_4u:3442: sarva ete ākāśasamā dharmā abhāvasvabhāvāḥ svalakṣaṇaśūnyā nirarthakaṃ tvaṃ vihanyase mārakarma etat paridīpitaṃ yad iyam anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhir abhisaṃbodhavyā,
S06psp_4u:3443_0: naitat samyaksaṃbuddhabhāṣitam iti. tasmāt tvaṃ kulaputra pratiprasrambhaya etān
S06psp_4u:3443_1: manasikārān mā te dīrgharātram anarthāya duṣkhāya vinipātāya saṃvarterann iti. tatra
S06psp_4u:3443_2: tair bodhisattvayānikaiḥ kulaputraiḥ kuladuhitṛbhir vā tāḥ paribhāṣāḥ śrutvaivam upaparīkṣitavyaṃ,
S06psp_4u:3444: mārakarmāṇo tāni yo me 'nuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodher vivecayati kiṃ cāpy ākāśasamāḥ sarvadharmā abhāvasvabhāvāḥ svalakṣaṇaśūnyās,
S06psp_4u:3445_0: tān sattvā na jānanti na paśyanti na budhyante tān vayam ākāśasamān abhāvasvabhāvān
S06psp_4u:3445_1: sarvadharmān svalakṣaṇaśūnyatāsaṃnāhaṃ saṃnahya sarvākārajñatām abhisaṃbuddhya sattvānāṃ
S06psp_4u:3450_1: prathamacittotpādam upādāya imān dharmān śrutvā dṛḍhacittair bhavitavyam aprakampacittair
S06psp_4u:3451: ta ime yair dṛḍhacittatāyai aprakampacittatāyai asaṃhāryacittatāyai samanvāgatāḥ ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu caranto bodhisattvaniyāmam avakrāmayiṣyanti.
S06psp_4u:3453: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_4u:3454: kiṃ punar bhagavann avinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'vinivartanīyo vaktavyaḥ utāho vinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'vinivartanīyo vaktavyaḥ?
S06psp_4u:3455: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
S06psp_4u:3458: subhūtir āha: kathaṃ bhagavann avinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'vinivartanīyo vaktavyaḥ?
S06psp_4u:3459: kathaṃ ca vinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'vinivartanīyo vaktavyaḥ?
S06psp_4u:3461: yaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ śrāvakabhūmau vā pratyekabuddhabhūmau vā vinivartito 'yaṃ subhūte 'vinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'vinivartanīyo vaktavyaḥ,
S06psp_4u:3462_0: yaḥ punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ śrāvakabhūmau vā pratyekabuddhabhūmau vā
S06psp_4u:3462_2: vaktavyaḥ. ebhir api subhūte ākārair ebhir liṅgair ebhir nimittaiḥ samanvāgatasyāvinivartanīyasya
S06psp_4u:3463: yair ākārair yair liṅgair yair nimittaiḥ samanvāgato 'vinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo māreṇa pāpīyasā na śakyate vivecayitum anuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ.
S06psp_4u:3465: punar aparaṃ subhūte ākāṅkṣann avinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prathamaṃ dhyānaṃ samāpadyate,
S06psp_4u:3468: ākāṅkṣann avinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvaś catvāri smṛtyupasthānāni samāpadyate samyakprahāṇarddhipādendriyabalabodhyaṅgamārgān samāpadyate,
S06psp_4u:3471: imaiś caturbhir dhyānaiś catasṛbhir ārūpyasamāpattibhir nirodhasamāpattibhiś ca parijayaṃ karoti,
S06psp_4u:3472: catvāri smṛtyupasthānāni bhāvayati samyakprahāṇarddhipādendriyabalabodhyaṅgam āryāṣṭāṅgikaṃ mārgaṃ śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitaṃ samādhiṃ samāpadyate,
S06psp_4u:3475_0: na srotaāpattiphalaṃ parigṛhṇāti na sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ nānāgāmiphalaṃ nārhattvaṃ parigṛhṇāti
S06psp_4u:3475_1: na pratyekabodhiṃ parigṛhṇāti ākāṅkṣamāṇa evaṃ saṃcintyātmabhāvaṃ parigṛhṇāti yenātmabhāvena
S06psp_4u:3475_2: sarvasattvānām arthaṃ karoti tam ātmabhāvaṃ parigṛhṇāti ebhiḥ subhūte ākārair ebhir
S06psp_4u:3475_3: liṅgair ebhir nimittaiḥ samanvāgato 'vinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo veditavyaḥ.
S06psp_4u:3476: punar aparaṃ subhūte 'vinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo manasikāreṇa samanvāgato bodhicittenāvirahito na rūpaguruko bhavati na kṣaṇaguruko bhavati nāsravaguruko bhavati,
S06psp_4u:3477: na dānaguruko bhavati na śīlaguruko bhavati na kṣāntiguruko bhavati na vīryaguruko bhavati na dhyānaguruko bhavati na prajñāguruko bhavati,
S06psp_4u:3478_0: nāpramāṇaguruko bhavati nārūpyaguruko bhavati na samāpattiguruko bhavati nābhijñāguruko
S06psp_4u:3478_1: bhavati na saptatriṃśadbodhipakṣyadharmaguruko bhavati na sarvavimokṣasamādhisamāpattiguruko
S06psp_4u:3478_2: bhavati na śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitaguruko bhavati nāryasatyaguruko bhavati na vaiśāradyaguruko
S06psp_4u:3478_3: bhavati na pratisaṃvidguruko bhavati na samyaksaṃbodhiguruko bhavati na sattvaparipācanaguruko
S06psp_4u:3478_4: bhavati na buddhadarśanaguruko bhavati na kuśalamūlāvaropanaguruko bhavati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_4u:3479_0: tathā hi te sarvadharmā ākāśasamā abhāvasvabhāvāḥ svalakṣaṇaśūnyāḥ. sa khalu punaḥ
S06psp_4u:3479_1: subhūte 'vinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattva ane imena ca manasikāreṇa samanvāgataś
S06psp_4u:3479_2: caturbhiś ceryāpathair abhikrāmati na pratikrāmati na bhrāntacitta āgacchati na bhrāntacitto
S06psp_4u:3480: na ca sthāsyati na niṣīdiṣyati na śayyāṃ kalpayiṣyati sa smṛta evāgamiṣyati gamiṣyati caṅkramiṣyati sthāsyati niṣīdiṣyati śayyāṃ kalpayiṣyati,
S06psp_4u:3481: ebhiḥ subhūte ākārair ebhir liṅgair ebhir nimittaiḥ samanvāgato 'vinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo veditavyaḥ.
S06psp_4u:3483: punar aparaṃ subhūte 'vinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'gāram adhyāvasann upāyakauśalyena sattvānāṃ paripācanāya pañcakāmaguṇān upadiśati sarvasattvānāṃ dānaṃ dadāti,
S06psp_4u:3485: pānaṃ pānārthikānāṃ yāvad anyatarānyatarān mānuṣyakān pariṣkārān dadāti,
S06psp_4u:3487: parāṃś ca dānapāramitāyāṃ samādāpayati dānapāramitāyāś ca varṇaṃ bhāṣate,
S06psp_4u:3488: ye cānye dānapāramitāyāṃ caranti teṣāṃ ca varṇavādī bhavati samanujñaḥ,
S06psp_4u:3493: ye cānye prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caranti teṣāṃ ca varṇavādī bhavati samanujñaḥ. iti samudaye dharmajñānam
S06psp_4u:3494: sa khalu punaḥ subhūte 'vinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'gāram adhyāvasan jambūdvīpaṃ saptaratnaparipūrṇaṃ kṛtvā dānaṃ dadāti,
S06psp_4u:3495: evaṃ cāturdvīpakaṃ lokadhātuṃ sāhasraṃ lokadhātuṃ dvisāhasraṃ lokadhātuṃ yāvat trisāhasraṃ mahāsāhasraṃ lokadhātuṃ saptaratnaparipūrṇaṃ kṛtvā dānaṃ dadāti,
S06psp_4u:3496: na ca kāmaguṇān paribhuṅkte satatasamitaṃ brahmacārī bhavati,
S06psp_4u:3497: na ca kasyacid avamardanākāraṃ janayati yenāvamardanākāreṇa paro 'nāttamanāḥ syāt,
S06psp_4u:3498: ebhir api subhūte ākārair ebhir liṅgair ebhir nimittaiḥ samanvāgato 'vinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo veditavyaḥ.
S06psp_4u:3499: punar aparaṃ subhūte 'vinivartanīyasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya satatasamitaṃ vajrapānir yakṣaḥ sadānubaddho bhaviṣyaty,
S06psp_4u:3500: ayaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo yāvad anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyate,
S06psp_4u:3501: yathā mamānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhasya satatasamitaṃ samanubaddho yāvat pañcavajrapāṇi kulāni satatasamitaṃ samanubaddhāni bhaviṣyanti,
S06psp_4u:3502: sa na śakyate manuṣyair amanuṣyair vāvakramanāyānavamardanīyo (PSP_4:157)
S06psp_4u:3503: bhavati sa devena vā māreṇa vā brahmaṇā vā kenacid vā punarloke sahadharmeṇa. iti samudaye 'nvayajñānakṣāntiḥ
S06psp_4u:3504: tasya cittaṃ na vikṣipyate bodhimanasikārād yāvad anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyate,
S06psp_4u:3505: tasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya nendriyāṇi vikalāni bhavanti śraddhendriyaṃ vīryendriyaṃ smṛtindriyaṃ samādhindriyaṃ prajñendriyaṃ sa satpuruṣo bhaviṣyati nāsatpuruṣaḥ.
S06psp_4u:3506: subhūtir āha: kiyatā bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ satpuruṣo bhavati nāsatpuruṣaḥ?
S06psp_4u:3507: bhagavān āha: yadā subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya bodhicittaṃ na vinaṅkṣyate,
S06psp_4u:3508: etāvatā subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ satpuruṣo bhavati nāsatpuruṣaḥ,
S06psp_4u:3509: ebhir api subhūte ākārair ebhir liṅgair ebhir nimittaiḥ samanvāgato 'vinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo veditavyaḥ.
S06psp_4u:3510_0: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bodhimanasikāraiḥ samanvāgato yāni tāni
S06psp_4u:3510_1: strīṇām āveśanāni vaśīkaraṇāni mantravidyauṣadhibhaiṣajyāni tāni sarvāṇi sarveṇa
S06psp_4u:3510_2: sarvaṃ sarvathā sarvan na prayukte na ca prayojayati na ca strīṇām āveśanam anyatarānyataraṃ karoti,
S06psp_4u:3511: na striyāḥ puruṣasya vā ādeśanāprātihāryaṃ karoti,
S06psp_4u:3512: putro vā te bhaviṣyati dhītā vā te bhaviṣyati,
S06psp_4u:3514: dīrghāyuṣko vā bhaviṣyati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_4u:3515: tathā hi subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ svalakṣaṇaśūnyeṣu dharmeṣu nimittaṃ na samanupaśyati,
S06psp_4u:3518: ebhiḥ subhūte ākārair ebhir liṅgair ebhir nimittaiḥ samanvāgato 'vinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo veditavyaḥ. iti samudaye 'nvayajñānam
S06psp_4u:3519_0: punar aparaṃ subhūte avinivartanīyasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya ye ākārā yāni
S06psp_4u:3519_1: liṅgāni yāni nimittāni yair ākārair yair liṅgair yair nimittaiḥ samanvāgato 'vinivartanīyo
S06psp_4u:3520: tān ākārāṃs tāni liṅgāni tāni nimittāni deśayiṣyāmi,
S06psp_4u:3521: tāni śṛṇu sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasikuru bhāṣiṣye 'ham,
S06psp_4u:3522: evaṃ bhagavann ity āyuṣmāṃ subhūtir bhagavataḥ pratyaśroṣīt.
S06psp_4u:3524: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran bodhimanasikārair avirahito na skandhayogam anuyukto (PSP_4:158)
S06psp_4u:3526: na dhātvāyatanayogam anuyukto viharati. na pratītyasamutpādāṅgayogam anuyukto viharati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_4u:3527: tathā hi sa śūnyatāyāṃ sthito na kasyacid dharmasya hīnatvaṃ vā utkṛṣṭatvaṃ vā samanupaśyati. iti nirodhe dharmajñānakṣāntiḥ
S06psp_4u:3528: na caurakathāyogam anuyukto viharati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_4u:3529: tathā hi sa svalakṣaṇaśūnyeṣu dharmeṣu na kasyacid dharmasyāharaṇaṃ vā haranaṃ vā samanupaśyati. iti nirodhe dharmajñānam
S06psp_4u:3530: na senākathāyogam anuyukto viharati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_4u:3531: tathā hi sa prakṛtiśūnyatāyāṃ sthito na kasyacid dharmasyālpatvaṃ vā bahutvaṃ vā samanupaśyati. iti nirodhe 'nvayajñānakṣāntiḥ
S06psp_4u:3532: na yuddhakathāyogam anuyukto viharati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_4u:3533: tathā hi sarvadharmatāyāṃ sthito na kasyacid dharmasyānunayaṃ vā pratighaṃ vā samanupaśyati. na grāmakathāyogam anuyukto viharati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_4u:3534: tathā hi sarvaśūnyatāyāṃ sthito na kasyacid dharmasya nicayaṃ vāsaṃnicayaṃ vā samanupaśyati. na nagarakathāyogam anuyukto viharati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_4u:3535: tathā hi sa ākāśaśūnyatāyāṃ sthito na kasyacid dharmasya saṃgrahaṃ vāsaṃgrahaṃ vā samanupaśyati. na nigamakathāyogam anuyukto viharati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_4u:3536: tathā hi subhūte koṭyāṃ sthito na kasyacid dharmasyātyayaṃ vānatyayaṃ vā samanupaśyati. nātmakathāyogam anuyukto viharati,
S06psp_4u:3537: evaṃ na sattvajīvajantupoṣapuruṣapudgalamanujamānavakārakavedakajānakapaśyakakathāyogam anuyukto viharati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_4u:3538: atyantaviśuddhatvāt sarvadharmāṇām anyatra prajñāpāramitākathāyogam anuyukto viharati,
S06psp_4u:3539: avirahitaś ca sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktair manasikāraiḥ. iti nirodhe 'nvayajñānam
S06psp_4u:3540: sa dānapāramitāyāṃ caran na mātsaryakathāyogam anuyukto viharati,
S06psp_4u:3541: śīlapāramitāyāṃ caran na dauḥśīlyakathāyogam anuyukto viharati,
S06psp_4u:3542: kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ caran na pratighakathāyogam anuyukto viharati,
S06psp_4u:3543: vīryapāramitāyāṃ caran na kauśīdyakathāyogam anuyukto viharati,
S06psp_4u:3544: dhyānapāramitāyāṃ caran na vikṣepakathāyogam anuyukto viharati,
S06psp_4u:3545: prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran na dauṣprajñākathāyogam anuyukto viharati,
S06psp_4u:3546: sarvadharmaśūnyatāyāṃ viharan dharmakāmaś caiva bhavati nādharmakāmaḥ,
S06psp_4u:3547: sa dharmadhātau caran na bhedyasya dharmasya varṇavādī (PSP_4:159)
S06psp_4u:3549_0: samitrakāmo bhavati nāmitrakāmo buddhānāṃ bhagavatām antike bodhisattvānāṃ ca mahāsattvānāṃ
S06psp_4u:3549_1: ye ca śrāvakapratyekabuddhayānikāḥ kulaputrās tān apy anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau
S06psp_4u:3551: darśanāya yatra lokadhātau tiṣṭhanti dhriyante yāpayanti,
S06psp_4u:3553: sa imair manasikārair rātriṃdivaṃ viharati yad uta buddhamanasikāraiḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_4u:3554_0: tathā hi prāyeṇa subhūte 'vinivartanīyā bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ kāmadhātupratisaṃyuktān
S06psp_4u:3554_1: manasikārān utpādayitvā daśabhiḥ kuśalaiḥ karmapathair vartamānāḥ teṣu buddhakṣetreṣūpapadyante,
S06psp_4u:3555_0: yatra saṃmukhībhūtās tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhās tiṣṭhanti dhriyante yāpayanti.
S06psp_4u:3555_1: tatra prathamaṃ dhyānam utpādayitvā yāvan naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanasamāpattim utpādayitvā tatropapadyante,
S06psp_4u:3556: yatra saṃmukhībhūtās tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhās tiṣṭhanti dhriyante yāpayanti,
S06psp_4u:3557: ebhiḥ subhūte ākārair ebhir liṅgair ebhir nimittaiḥ samanvāgato 'vinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo veditavyaḥ. iti mārge dharmajñānakṣāntiḥ
S06psp_4u:3558_0: punar aparaṃ subhūte 'vinivartanīyasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ
S06psp_4u:3558_1: carato 'dhyātmaśūnyatāyāṃ sthitasya yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāyāṃ sthitasya smṛtyupasthāne
S06psp_4u:3559: avinivartanīyo vāhaṃ na vāham avinivartanīya iti vicikitsā cāsya notpadyate. niḥsaṃśayaś ca bhavati svakāyāṃ bhūmau. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_4u:3560: tathā hi so 'ṇum api dharmaṃ na samanupaśyati,
S06psp_4u:3561_0: yo vivartate vā na vā vivartate. tadyathāpi nāma subhūte srotaāpannaḥ srotaāpattiphalabhūmau
S06psp_4u:3561_1: sthito na kāṅkṣati na vicikitsati svakāyāṃ bhūmāv evaṃ sakṛdāgāmyanāgāmyarhattvabhūmau
S06psp_4u:3561_2: sthito buddhabhūmau sthito na kāṅkṣati na vicikitsaty,
S06psp_4u:3562: evam eva subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ svakāyāṃ bhūmau na kāṅkṣati na vicikitsati. (PSP_4:160)
S06psp_4u:3563: sa tatrāvinivartanīyabhūmau sthito buddhakṣetrañ ca pariśodhayati,
S06psp_4u:3567_0: sarvāṇi ca tāni mārakarmāṇi budhyate buddhvā ca vidhvastāni viralīkaroti. tadyathāpi
S06psp_4u:3567_1: nāma subhūte puruṣa ānantaryakarmakārī ānantaryacittenāvirahito yāvan maraṇakālam
S06psp_4u:3569_0: anuvartate cāsya tat paryutthānaṃ yāvan maraṇakālam. evam eva subhūte 'vinivartanīyasya
S06psp_4u:3569_1: bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya tad avinivartanīyacittaṃ bhūtaṃ sthitam avinivartanīyabhūmāv
S06psp_4u:3570: na śakyate sadevamānuṣāsureṇa lokena vivartayitum. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_4u:3571: tathā hi tad avinivartanīyacittaṃ sadevamānuṣāsuram atikramya samyaktvaniyāmam avakrāntaṃ sa svakāyāṃ bhūmau sthitvābhijñāparamapāramitāḥ prāpya buddhakṣetraṃ ca pariśodhayati,
S06psp_4u:3574: teṣu ca buddhakṣetreṣu kuśalamūlāny avaropayitvā tāṃś ca buddhān bhagavataḥ paripṛcchati paripraśnayati paryupāste.
S06psp_4u:3575: sa khalu punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ tathā sthitaḥ,
S06psp_4u:3576: sa māna utpannotpannāni ca mārakarmāṇy avabudhyate,
S06psp_4u:3577: utpannotpannānāñ ca mārakarmāṇāṃ vaśena na gacchati,
S06psp_4u:3578: tāni ca mārakarmāṇy upāyakauśalyena bhūtakoṭīḥ śodhayati,
S06psp_4u:3579: svakāyāñ ca bhūmau na kāṅkṣati na vicikitsati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_4u:3581: na bhūtakoṭim ekāṃ vā dve vā vikalpayati,
S06psp_4u:3582: tasya jātivinivṛttasyāpi na śrāvakapratyekabuddhabhūmau cittam utpadyate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_4u:3583: tathā hi subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ svalakṣaṇaśūnyeṣu dharmeṣu na kasyacid dharmasyotpādaṃ vā nirodhaṃ vā saṃkleśaṃ vā vyavadānaṃ vā samanupaśyati. iti mārge dharmajñānam
S06psp_4u:3584_0: tasya khalu punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya svalakṣaṇaśūnyeṣu sarvadharmeṣu
S06psp_4u:3584_1: na kasyacid dharmasyotpādaṃ vā nirodhaṃ vā saṃkleśaṃ vā vyavadānaṃ vā samanupaśyate.
S06psp_4u:3586: abhisaṃbhotsya evāham anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_4u:3587: tathā hi subhūte svalakṣaṇaśūnyā anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiḥ.
S06psp_4u:3589: sa khalu punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattva evaṃ sthitaḥ svakāyāṃ bhūmāv,
S06psp_4u:3591: anavamardanīyaḥ svakāyāṃ bhūmau. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_4u:3592: tathā hi subhūte 'vinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattva evaṃ sthito 'saṃhāryeṇa jñānena samanvāgato bhavati.
S06psp_4u:3593: sacet khalu punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya māraḥ pāpīyān buddhaveṣeṇopasaṃkramyaivaṃ vakṣyati:
S06psp_4u:3596: na ca tvayānutpattikeṣu dharmeṣu kṣāntiḥ pratilabdho,
S06psp_4u:3597: yena tvaṃ vyākriyathās tais tathāgatair arhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhair anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau,
S06psp_4u:3598: na ca tvayi te ākārās tāni liṅgāni tāni nimittāni saṃvidyante,
S06psp_4u:3599: yair ākārair yair liṅgair yair nimittaiḥ samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvo vyākriyate 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau.
S06psp_4u:3600: sacet punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvas tad vacanaṃ śrutvā nāvalīyate na saṃlīyate nottrasyati na saṃtrasyati na saṃtrāsam āpadyate,
S06psp_4u:3601: na ca cittasyānyathā tvaṃ bhavati veditavyaṃ,
S06psp_4u:3602: subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena vyākṛto 'haṃ tais tathāgatair arhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhair anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_4u:3603: tathā hi mama te dharmāḥ saṃvidyante yair dharmair bodhisattvā mahāsattvā vyākriyante 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau. iti mārge 'nvayajñānakṣāntiḥ
S06psp_4u:3604: sacet punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya māraḥ pāpīyān buddhaveṣeṇopasaṃkramyaivaṃ vakṣyati:
S06psp_4u:3605: mārādhiṣṭhito vā puruṣaḥ śrāvakatve tvaṃ kulaputra vyākṛto na tvam anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau,
S06psp_4u:3607: sacet subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya evaṃ bhaviṣyati,
S06psp_4u:3608: māro batāyaṃ pāpīyān buddhaveṣeṇopasaṃkrānto mārādhiṣṭhito vā puruṣo,
S06psp_4u:3609: na ca tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ śrāvakabhūmau vā pratyekabuddhabhūmau vā samādāpayati.
S06psp_4u:3610: saced ayam asya subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya māraḥ pāpīyān buddhaveṣeṇopasaṃkramyaivaṃ vakṣyati:
S06psp_4u:3611: naitad buddhabhāṣitaṃ na śrāvakair mārabhāṣitāny etāni sūtrāṇi yatra tvaṃ carasi. veditavyam etad bodhisattvena mahāsattvena māro batāyaṃ pāpīyān mārādhiṣṭhito vā puruṣo,
S06psp_4u:3612: yo mām amuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodher vivecayati. veditavyam etat subhūte vyākṛto 'yaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ taiḥ pūrvakais tathāgatair (PSP_4:162)
S06psp_4u:3613: arhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhair anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau sthito 'yaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'vinivartanīyāyāṃ bhūmau. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_4u:3614: tathā hy asya subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya ta ākārās tāni liṅgāni tāni nimittāni saṃvidyante ye 'vinivartanīyānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānām,
S06psp_4u:3615: ebhiḥ subhūte ākārair ebhir liṅgair ebhir nimittaiḥ samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'vinivartanīyo veditavyaḥ.
S06psp_4u:3616_0: punar aparaṃ subhūte 'vinivartaniyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran
S06psp_4u:3616_1: saddharmaparigrahasya kṛtenātmaparityāgam api karoti jīvitaparityāgam api karoti.
S06psp_4u:3616_2: sa khalu punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ saddharmaparigrahasya kṛtenaiva yogam
S06psp_4u:3616_4: tatra kataro dharmo yasya kṛtena bodhisattvo mahāsattva ātmaparityāgam api karoti
S06psp_4u:3617: iha subhūte tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ sarvadharmāḥ śūnyā iti dharmaṃ deśayati,
S06psp_4u:3618: tatraike mohapuruṣāḥ pratikrośanti prativahanti naiṣa dharmo na vinayo naitac chāstuḥ śāsanam,
S06psp_4u:3619: asya subhūte kṛtaśo bodhisattvo mahāsattva ātmaparityāgam api karoti jīvitaparityāgam api karoti. tatra subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvenaivam upaparīkṣitavyaṃ,
S06psp_4u:3620: ye 'pi te tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā dharmaṃ bhāṣiṣyante,
S06psp_4u:3621_0: aham api tatra gaṇanāṃ yāsyāmy aham api tatra vyākṛto mamāpy eṣa dharmo yasya dharmasya
S06psp_4u:3621_1: kṛtenāham ātmaparityāgaṃ karomi jīvitaparityāgaṃ karomīmaṃ subhūte 'rthavaśaṃ saṃpaśya
S06psp_4u:3621_2: bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ saddharmaparigrahasya kṛtenātmaparityāgaṃ karoti jīvitaparityāgaṃ karoty,
S06psp_4u:3622: ebhiḥ subhūte ākārair ebhir liṅgair ebhir nimittaiḥ samanvāgato 'vinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo veditavyaḥ.
S06psp_4u:3623: punar aparaṃ subhūte 'vinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvas tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya dharmaṃ deśayato na kāṅkṣati na vicikitsati,
S06psp_4u:3624: yaṃ ca te buddhā bhagavanto dharmaṃ bhāṣante taṃ sarvam udgṛhṇāti tathodgṛhītañ ca samānaṃ na vipraṇāśayati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_4u:3626: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_4u:3627: katamasyā bhagavan dhāraṇyāḥ pratilabdhatvād bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya tathāgatabhāṣitāḥ sūtrāntā na vipraṇaśyanti?
S06psp_4u:3630: dhāraṇadhāraṇīpratilabdhasya subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya tathāgatabhāṣitāḥ sūtrāntā na vipraṇaśyanti.
S06psp_4u:3632_0: tathāgatasyaiva bhagavann arhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya na śrāvakabhāṣitāni na devabhāṣitāni
S06psp_4u:3632_1: na nāgabhāṣitāni na yakṣabhāṣitāni na gandharvabhāṣitāni nāsurabhāṣitāni na garuḍabhāṣitāni
S06psp_4u:3634: ye kecit subhūte rutasaṃketaghoṣāḥ sarvatra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na kāṅkṣati na vicikitsati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_4u:3636: ebhiḥ subhūte ākārair ebhir liṅgair ebhir nimittaiḥ samanvāgato 'vinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo veditavyaḥ.
S06psp_4u:3637: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_4u:3642: evam etat subhūte evam etat mahāguṇasamanvāgataḥ subhūte 'vinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo,
S06psp_4u:3644: parimitaguṇasamanvāgataḥ subhūte 'vinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_4u:3645: tathā hy anenānantam aparyantaṃ jñānaṃ pratilabdham asaṃhāryaṃ śrāvakapratyekabuddhais,
S06psp_4u:3646: tatra ca jñāne sthitvāvinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ pratisaṃvido 'bhinirharati yābhiḥ pratisaṃvidbhir abhinirhṛtābhiḥ sadevamānuṣāsureṇa lokena na śakyaḥ paryādātum.
S06psp_4u:3648: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_4u:3649_1: mahāsattvasya gaṅgānadīvālukopamān kalpān ākāraliṅganimittāni nirdeṣṭuṃ yair ākārair
S06psp_4u:3649_2: yair liṅgair yair nimittair avinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prabhāvyate sādhu
S06psp_4u:3649_3: bhagavan gambhīrāṇi gambhirāṇi sthānāni nirdiśatu yatra sthitvā bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ
S06psp_4u:3649_4: ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu caraṃś catvāri smṛtyupasthānāni paripūrayati,
S06psp_4u:3658: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat: sādhu sādhu subhūte,
S06psp_4u:3659: sādhu khalu punas tvaṃ subhūte yas tvam avinivartanīyānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānām arthāya gambhīrāṇi gambhīrāṇi sthānāni paripṛcchitavyāni manyase,
S06psp_4u:3660_0: gambhīram iti subhūte śūnyatāyā etad adhivacanam ānimittasyāpraṇihitasyānabhisaṃskārasyānutpādasyānirodhasyānirvāṇasyāśāntasya
S06psp_4u:3660_1: tathatāyā bhūtakoṭer dharmadhātor imāni tāni subhūte gambhīragambhīrāṇi sthānāni
S06psp_4u:3660_2: yeṣām etad adhivacanaṃ yad idaṃ nirvāṇam iti.
S06psp_4u:3661: subhūtir āha: nirvāṇasyaivaitad bhagavann adhivacanaṃ na punar bhagavan sarvadharmāṇām?
S06psp_4u:3662: bhagavān āha: sarvadharmāṇām evaitat subhūte 'dhivacanaṃ gambhīram iti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_4u:3667: evaṃ śrotraṃ ghrāṇaṃ jihvā kāyo mano 'pi subhūte gambhīraṃ,
S06psp_4u:3671: cakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyayā vedanā subhūte gambhīrā. evaṃ śrotraṃ ghrāṇaṃ jihvā kāyo,
S06psp_4u:3676: evam abdhātuḥ tejodhātur vāyudhātur ākāśadhātur vijñānadhātuḥ subhūte gambhīraḥ. pratītyasamutpādaḥ subhūte gambhīro,
S06psp_4u:3678: evaṃ saṃskārā vijñānaṃ nāmarūpaṃ ṣaḍāyatanaṃ sparśo vedanā tṛṣṇā upādānaṃ bhavo jātir jarāmaraṇaṃ śokaparidevaduṣkhadaurmanasyopāyāsāḥ subhūte gambhīrāḥ,
S06psp_4u:3684: bodhir api subhūte gambhīrā. kathañ ca punaḥ subhūte rūpaṃ gambhīraṃ?
S06psp_4u:3695: yathā bodhipakṣyāṇāṃ dharmāṇāṃ tathatā tathā gambhīraṃ,
S06psp_4u:3700: yathā bodhitathatā tathā gambhīram. iti bhāvanāmārgagāmbhīryam
S06psp_4u:3701: subhūtir āha: kathaṃ bhagavan rūpasya tathatā?
S06psp_4u:3702: bhagavān āha: yatra subhūte tathatāyāṃ na rūpaṃ nānyatra rūpād,

S06psp_4u:3704: yatra subhūte tathatāyāṃ na saṃjñā nānyatra saṃjñayāḥ,
S06psp_4u:3705: yatra subhūte tathatāyāṃ na saṃskārā nānyatra saṃskārebhyo,
S06psp_4u:3706: yatra subhūte tathatāyāṃ na vijñānaṃ nānyatra vijñānād. evaṃ yatra subhūte tathatāyāṃ na skandhadhātvāyatanāni nānyatra skandhadhātvāyatanebhyo,
S06psp_4u:3707: yatra subhūte tathatāyāṃ na pratītyasamutpādo nānyatra pratītyasamutpādād,
S06psp_4u:3708: yatra subhūte tathatāyāṃ na pratītyasamutpādaṅgāni nānyatra pratītyasamutpādāṅgebhyo,

S06psp_4u:3710: yatra subhūte tathatāyāṃ na sarvaśūnyatā nānyatra sarvaśūnyatābhyo,
S06psp_4u:3711: yatra subhūte tathatāyāṃ na bodhipakṣyā dharmā nānyatra bodhipakṣebhyo dharmebhyo,
S06psp_4u:3714: yatra subhūte tathatāyāṃ nāveṇikābuddhadharmā nānyatrāveṇikebhyo buddhadharmebhyo,
S06psp_4u:3715: yatra subhūte tathatāyāṃ na bodhir nānyatra bodheḥ tathatā.
S06psp_4u:3717: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_4u:3718: āścaryaṃ bhagavan yāvat sūkṣmeṇopāyenāvinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo rūpataś ca vārito nirvāṇaṃ ca sūcitam. evaṃ vedanāyāḥ saṃjñāyāḥ saṃskārebhyo,
S06psp_4u:3719: vijñānataś ca vārito nirvāṇaṃ ca sūcitaṃ,
S06psp_4u:3720: sarvadharmasaṃgrahe 'py asya laukikalokottareṇa sāsraveṇānāsraveṇa sāsravāṇāsravebhyo vārito nirvāṇaṃ ca sūcitam.
S06psp_4u:3722: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
S06psp_4u:3723: yadā punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattva imāni gambhīragambhīrāṇi sthānāni prajñāpāramitāpratisaṃyuktāni cintayiṣyati tulayiṣyaty upanidhyāsyati. iti bhāvanāpathaḥ
S06psp_4u:3724: evaṃ mayā sthātavyaṃ yathā prajñāpāramitāyām ājñaptam,
S06psp_4u:3725: evaṃ mayā śikṣitavyaṃ yathā prajñāpāramitāyām ākhyātam,
S06psp_4u:3726_0: evaṃ mayā pratipattavyaṃ yathā prajñāpāramitāyām uddiṣṭam ity. ayaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo
S06psp_4u:3726_1: mahāsattvaḥ tathā saṃpādayaṃs tathopanidhyāyaṃs tathopaparīkṣamāṇas tathā prayujyamānas
S06psp_4u:3728: sa tena cittotpādenāsaṃkhyeyam aprameyam aparimāṇakuśalamūlaṃ parigrahīṣyaty aparimāṇāt kalpāt saṃsārāc chorayiṣyati vipṛṣṭhīkariṣyati vyantīkariṣyati,

S06psp_4u:3729_1: vihariṣyati. tadyathāpi nāma subhūte sa puruṣo rāgacarito vitarkacaritas tasyānyatarayā

S06psp_4u:3729_3: strī paraparigṛhītā na labhate gṛhato niṣkramaṇāya. tat kiṃ manyase?

S06psp_4u:3732: iyaṃ me strī āgatā etayā sārdhaṃ niṣīdiṣyāmi pratikramiṣyāmi paricārayiṣyāmīti.
S06psp_4u:3734: subhūte rātryā vā divasasya vātyayena kiyantas tasya puruṣasya vitarkā varteran.
S06psp_4u:3736: bahavo bhagavan bahavaḥ sugata tasya puruṣasya divasasya vātyayena rātryā vātyayena vitarkā varteran.
S06psp_4u:3739: yāvantaḥ subhūte tasya puruṣasya divasasya vātyayena rātryā vātyayena vitarkā vartante,
S06psp_4u:3740_0: iyataḥ kalpān sa bodhi sattvo mahāsattvaḥ saṃsārāc chorayati vipṛṣṭhīkaroti vyantīkaroti

S06psp_4u:3741_0: yathā yathā tān doṣān vivarjayati yair doṣair bodhisattvā mahāsattvā vivartante 'nuttarāyāḥ
S06psp_4u:3741_1: samyaksaṃbodheḥ. evaṃ yogan anuyuktasya subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyānena

S06psp_4u:3741_3: yena kuśalamūlena gaṅgānadīvālukopamā lokadhātavaḥ paripūrṇāḥ syur,

S06psp_4u:3742_2: api upaniśām api upaniṣadam api nopaiti.

S06psp_4u:3749: ya iha gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yathopadiṣṭāyāṃ yogam āpadyate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_4u:3750: eṣa hi bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ mārgo yenānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyante.

S06psp_4u:3830: aparimāṇam iti subhūte yan na śakyaṃ pramātum.
S06psp_4u:3831: subhūtir āha: syād bhagavan paryāyo yad rūpam apy asaṃkhyeyam aprameyam aparimāṇaṃ syāt,
S06psp_4u:3832: vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā vijñānam api bhagavann asaṃkhyeyam aprameyam aparimāṇaṃ syāt.
S06psp_4u:3834: bhagavān āha: syāt subhūte paryāyo yena paryāyeṇa rūpam apy asaṃkhyeyam aprameyam aparimāṇaṃ syāt,
S06psp_4u:3836: vijñānam apy asaṃkhyeyam aprameyam aparimāṇaṃ syād ity asaṃkhyeyādīnām upalakṣaṇām.
S06psp_4u:3837: katamena bhagavan paryāyeṇa rūpam asaṃkhyeyam aprameyam aparimāṇaṃ syāt,
S06psp_4u:3839: vijñānam apy asaṃkhyeyam aprameyam aparimāṇaṃ syāt?
S06psp_4u:3840: bhagavān āha: rūpaṃ subhūte śūnyam asaṃ khyeyam aprameyam aparimāṇaṃ,
S06psp_4u:3842: vijñānaṃ subhūte śūnyam asaṃkhyeyam aprameyam aparimāṇaṃ syāt.
S06psp_4u:3843: subhūtir āha: kiṃ punar bhagavan rūpam eva śūnyaṃ,
S06psp_4u:3847: bhagavān āha: tat kiṃ manyase? subhūte na mayā sarvadharmāḥ śūnyā ity ākhyātāḥ.
S06psp_4u:3848: subhūtir āha: śūnyā iti bhagavan sarvadharmās tathāgatenākhyātā,
S06psp_4u:3849: ye ca bhagavan śūnyā akṣayā api te,
S06psp_4u:3850: asaṃkhyeyā api te aprameyā api te,
S06psp_4u:3856: tasmāt tarhi bhagavan naiṣāṃ dharmāṇām arthato vā vyañjanato vā nānākaraṇam upalabhyate.
S06psp_4u:3857: bhagavān āha: evam etat subhūte evam etat,
S06psp_4u:3858: naiṣāṃ dharmāṇām arthato vā vyañjanato vā nānākaraṇam upalabhyate. anabhilapyam etat subhūte tathāgatenābhilapitam,
S06psp_4u:3859_0: akṣayam iti vā asaṃkhyeyam iti vā aprameyam iti vā aparimāṇam iti vā śūnyam iti vā
S06psp_4u:3859_1: ānimittam iti vā apraṇihitam iti vā anabhisaṃskāram iti vā anutpāda iti vā virāga
S06psp_4u:3859_2: iti vā nirodha iti vā nirvāṇam iti vā deśanāniṣpandanirdeśa eṣa subhūte tathāgatasyākṣayam
S06psp_4u:3859_3: iti yāvan nirvāṇam iti ceti codyapūrvakas tathāgatakaruṇāniṣpandanirdeśaḥ.
S06psp_4u:3860: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_4u:3861: āścaryaṃ bhagavan yāvad iyaṃ dharmāṇāṃ dharmatā tathāgatena deśyate,
S06psp_4u:3862: sā ca dharmatā anabhilapyā yathāhaṃ bhagavan bhagavato bhāṣitasyārtham ājānāmi,
S06psp_4u:3865: bhagavān āha: evam etat subhūte evam etat,
S06psp_4u:3867: yā subhūte dharmāṇām anabhilapyatā sā śūnyatā,
S06psp_4u:3869: subhūtir āha: kiṃ punar bhagavann anabhilāpyasyārthasya vṛddhir vā parihāṇir vā?
S06psp_4u:3870: bhagavān āha: na subhūte anabhilapyasyārthasya nāpi vṛddhir nāpi parihāṇir.
S06psp_4u:3871: subhūtir āha: saced bhagavann anabhilapyasyārthasya nāpi vṛddhir nāpi parihāṇiḥ,
S06psp_4u:3872: dānapāramitāyā api na vṛddhir na parihāṇir bhaviṣyati,
S06psp_4u:3873: evaṃ śīlakṣāntivīryadhyānapāramitāyā api na vṛddhir na parihāṇir bhaviṣyati,
S06psp_4u:3874: prajñāpāramitāyā api na vṛddhir na parihāṇir bhaviṣyati,
S06psp_4u:3875: caturṇāṃ smṛtyupasthānānāṃ na vṛddhir na parihāṇir bhaviṣyati,
S06psp_4u:3876: evaṃ samyakprahāṇarddhipādendriyabalabodhyaṅgānām āryāṣṭāṅgikasya mārgasya na vṛddhir na parihāṇir bhaviṣyati,
S06psp_4u:3877: aṣṭānāṃ vimokṣāṇāṃ na vṛddhir na parihāṇir bhaviṣyati,
S06psp_4u:3878: navānupūrvavihārasamāpattīnām apramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattīnām āryasatyānāṃ śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitābhijñānaṃ na vṛddhir na parihāṇir bhaviṣyati,
S06psp_4u:3879_0: daśānāṃ tathāgatabalānāṃ caturṇāṃ vaiśāradyānāṃ catasṛṇāṃ pratisaṃvidāṃ na vṛddhir
S06psp_4u:3879_1: na parihāṇir bhaviṣyati adhyātmaśūnyatāyā bahirdhāśūnyatāyā adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatāyā
S06psp_4u:3879_2: yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāyā na vṛddhir na parihāṇir bhaviṣyati,
S06psp_4u:3880: aṣṭādaśānām āveṇikabuddhadharmāṇāṃ na vṛddhir na parihāṇir bhaviṣyati. saced bhagavann āsāṃ ṣaṇṇāṃ pāramitānāṃ na vṛddhir na parihāṇir bhaviṣyati,
S06psp_4u:3881: yāvad aṣṭādaśānām āveṇikānāṃ buddhadharmāṇāṃ na vṛddhir na parihāṇir bhaviṣyati,
S06psp_4u:3882: tadā abhavyā hi bhagavan sarvākārajñatānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃboddhum ity anabhilapyasya hānivṛddhyā bhāvena codyam.
S06psp_4u:3883: bhagavān āha: evam etat subhūte evam etat,
S06psp_4u:3884_0: nānabhilapyasyārthasya vṛddhir vā parihāṇir vā. sacet punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvasya
S06psp_4u:3884_1: mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataḥ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayataḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ
S06psp_4u:3890: 'haṃ dānapāramitayā vivarddhe. eṣa ca punar asyaivaṃ bhavati,
S06psp_4u:3893: caraṃs tān manasikārāṃs tāṃś cittotpādāṃs tāni ca kuśalamūlāny anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye pariṇāmayati,
S06psp_4u:3895_0: evaṃ śīlakṣāntivīryadhyānapāramitā prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caraṃs tān manasikārāṃs tāṃś
S06psp_4u:3895_1: cittotpādāṃs tāni ca kuśalamūlāny anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye pariṇāmayati yathānuttarā
S06psp_4u:3896: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_4u:3897: katamā ca punar bhagavann anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiḥ?
S06psp_4u:3899: subhūtir āha: katamaiṣā bhagavan sarvadharmāṇāṃ tathatā yānuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiḥ?
S06psp_4u:3901: yā subhūte rūpasya tathatā yā vedanāyās tathatā yā saṃjñayāḥ tathatā yā saṃskārāṇāṃ tathatā yā vijñānasya tathatā,
S06psp_4u:3902: evaṃ yā skandhatathatā yā dhātutathatā yā āyatanatathatā yā pratītyasamutpādatathatā yā pratītyasamutpādāṅgatathatā,
S06psp_4u:3903: evaṃ yāvad yā nirvāṇasya tathatā sānuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiḥ,
S06psp_4u:3904: sā naiva vivarddhate na parihīyate. tat subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitayāvirahito 'bhīksṇaṃ bahulaṃ viharati,
S06psp_4u:3905: na kasyacid dharmasya vṛddhiṃ vā parihāṇiṃ vā samanupaśyati. evaṃ khalu subhūte anabhilapyasyārthasya naiva vṛddhir na parihāṇir,
S06psp_4u:3906: evaṃ ca subhūte dānapāramitāyā na vṛddhir na parihāṇir,
S06psp_4u:3907: evaṃ śīlakṣāntivīryadhyānaprajñāpāramitāyā na vṛddhir na parihāṇir,
S06psp_4u:3908_0: evaṃ śūnyatānāṃ bodhipakṣyāṇāṃ dharmāṇām āryasatyānām apramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattīnāṃ
S06psp_4u:3908_2: daśānāṃ balānāṃ vaiśāradyānāṃ pratisaṃvidām aṣṭādaśānām āveṇikānāṃ buddhadharmāṇāṃ
S06psp_4u:3908_3: na vṛddhir na parihāṇiḥ. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ
S06psp_4u:3911: tat kiṃ prathamacittotpādena bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyate,
S06psp_4u:3912: utāho paścimena cittotpādena bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyate?
S06psp_4u:3913: yadi tāvad bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prathamacittotpādenānuttarāṃ (PSP_4:175)
S06psp_4u:3917: evam asamavasṛtānāṃ bhagavaṃś cittacaitasikānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ kathaṃ kuśalamūlāny upacayaṃ gacchanti,
S06psp_4u:3918: na cānupacitaiḥ kuśalamūlaiḥ śakyānuttarā samyaksaṃbodhir abhisaṃboddhum?
S06psp_4u:3920: bhagavān āha: tena hi subhūte upamāṃ te kariṣyāmy asyaivārthasya vijñāpanāya,
S06psp_4u:3921: upamayā ihaikatyā vidvāṃsaḥ puruṣā bhāṣitasyārtham ājñāsyanti. tat kiṃ manyase?
S06psp_4u:3922: subhūte tailapradyotasya jvalitasya dīpyamānāyāṃ vartau prathamābhinipātenārciṣaḥ sā vartir dagdhā,
S06psp_4u:3925: na bhagavan prathamābhinipātenārciṣaḥ sā vartir dagdhā na ca prathamābhinipātam anāgamyārciṣaḥ sā vartir dagdhā,
S06psp_4u:3926: na bhagavan paścimābhinipātenārciṣaḥ sā vartir dagdhā,
S06psp_4u:3927: na ca paścimābhinipātam anāgamyārciṣaḥ sā vartir dagdhā.
S06psp_4u:3928: bhagavān āha: tat kiṃ manyase? subhūte api nu sā vartir dagdhā.
S06psp_4u:3929: subhūtir āha: dagdhā bhagavan dagdhā sugata.
S06psp_4u:3931: evam eva subhūte na prathamacittotpādena bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyate,
S06psp_4u:3932: na ca prathamacittotpādam anāgamya bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyate,
S06psp_4u:3933: na ca paścimacittotpādena subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyate,
S06psp_4u:3934_0: na ca paścimacittotpādam anāgamya bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim
S06psp_4u:3934_1: abhisaṃbudhyate. abhisaṃbudhyate ca bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim
S06psp_4u:3934_2: atra hi subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran prathamacittotpādam
S06psp_4u:3934_3: upādāya daśa bhūmīḥ paripūrayitvānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyate.
S06psp_4u:3936: katamā bhagavan daśa bhūmīḥ paripūrayitvā bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyate?
S06psp_4u:3938: śuklavipaśyanābhūmiṃ subhūte paripūrayitvā bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyate,
S06psp_4u:3939: evaṃ gotrabhūmim aṣṭamakabhūmiṃ darśanabhūmiṃ tanubhūmiṃ vītarāgabhūmiṃ kṛtāvībhūmiṃ paripūrayitvā bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim (PSP_4:176)
S06psp_4u:3941: śrāvakapratyekabuddhabhūmiṃ paripūrayitvā bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyate,
S06psp_4u:3942: bodhisattvabhūmiṃ paripūrayitvā bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyate,
S06psp_4u:3943: buddhabhūmiṃ paripūrayitvā bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyate,
S06psp_4u:3944: tatra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo daśasu bhūmiṣu śikṣamāṇo na ca prathamacittotpādenānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyate,
S06psp_4u:3945: na ca prathamacittotpādam anāgamyānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyate,
S06psp_4u:3947: na ca paścimacittotpādam anāgamyānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyate,
S06psp_4u:3948: abhisaṃbudhyate ca bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbodhim.
S06psp_4u:3952: na ca prathamacittotpādam anāgamya bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyate,
S06psp_4u:3953: na ca nāma bhagavan paścimena cittotpādena,
S06psp_4u:3954: na ca paścimacittotpādam anāgamya bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyate,
S06psp_4u:3955: abhisaṃbudhyate ca bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim.
S06psp_4u:3956: bhagavān āha: tat kiṃ manyase? subhūte yac cittaṃ niruddham api nu tat punar evotpatsyate.
S06psp_4u:3957: subhūtir āha: no hīdaṃ bhagavan. ity utpādagāmbhīryam
S06psp_4u:3958: bhagavān āha: tat kiṃ manyase? subhūte yac cittam utpannam api nu tan nirodhadharmi.
S06psp_4u:3959: subhūtir āha: nirodhadharmi bhagavan nirodhadharmi sugata.
S06psp_4u:3960: bhagavān āha: tat kiṃ manyase? subhūte yan nirodhadharmi tan nirotsyate.
S06psp_4u:3961: subhūtir āha: no hīdaṃ bhagavan. iti nirodhagāmbhīryam
S06psp_4u:3962: bhagavān āha: tat kiṃ manyase? subhūte tathaiva sthāsyati yathā tathatā.
S06psp_4u:3963: subhūtir āha: tathaiva bhagavaṃ sthāsyati yathā tathatā.
S06psp_4u:3965: bhagavān āha: tat kiṃ manyase? subhūte tathaiva sthāsyati yathā tathatā bhūtakoṭir bhaviṣyati.
S06psp_4u:3967: bhagavān āha: tat kiṃ manyase? subhūte gambhīrā tathatā.
S06psp_4u:3968: subhūtir āha: gambhīrā bhagavan. iti tathatāgāmbhīryam
S06psp_4u:3969: bhagavān āha: tat kiṃ manyase? subhūte tathaiva cittaṃ yathā tathatā.
S06psp_4u:3971: bhagavān āha: tat kiṃ manyase? subhūte anyatra tathatāyāś cittam.
S06psp_4u:3972: subhūtir āha: no hīdaṃ bhagavan. iti jñeyagāmbhīryam
S06psp_4u:3973: bhagavān āha: tat kiṃ manyase? subhūte api nu tathatā tathatāṃ samanupaśyati.
S06psp_4u:3974: subhūtir āha: no hīdaṃ bhagavan. iti jñānagāmbhīryam
S06psp_4u:3975: bhagavān āha: tat kiṃ manyase? subhūte ya evaṃ carati, sa gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati.
S06psp_4u:3976: subhūtir āha: yo bhagavaim evaṃ carati, sa gambhīrāyāṃ prajñā pāramitāyāṃ carati.
S06psp_4u:3977: bhagavān āha: tat kiṃ manyase? subhūte ya evaṃ carati, sa kutra carati.
S06psp_4u:3978: subhūtir āha: yo bhagavnn evaṃ carati, sa na kutracic carati. tat kasya hetos?
S06psp_4u:3979: tathā hi bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carata ete samudācārā na bhavanti,
S06psp_4u:3980: na samudācaranti tathatāyāṃ sthitasya na bhagavan kiñcit samudācārati,
S06psp_4u:3981: nāpi tatra kaścit samudācarati. iti caryāgāmbhīryam
S06psp_4u:3982: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
S06psp_4u:3983: yaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāṃ carati sa kutra carati?
S06psp_4u:3984: subhūtir āha: carati bhagavan paramārthe yatra dvayasamudācāro na saṃvidyate.
S06psp_4u:3985: bhagavān āha: tat kiṃ manyase? subhūte yaḥ paramārthe carati samudācāre carati, sa nimitte carati.
S06psp_4u:3988: subhūte api nu tena nimittasaṃjñā vānimittasaṃjñā vā vibhāvitā bhavati.
S06psp_4u:3990: subhūtir āha: no hīdaṃ bhagavan. ity advayagāmbhīryam
S06psp_4u:3992: tat kathaṃ subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena nimittasaṃjñā vā ānimittasaṃjñā vā na vibhāvitā bhavati?
S06psp_4u:3993: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_4u:3994: na bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann evaṃ prayujyate,
S06psp_4u:3995: nimittaṃ vā bhāvayiṣyāmy animittaṃ vā bhāvayiṣyāmīti,
S06psp_4u:3996_0: iha punar bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran nāparipūrṇair
S06psp_4u:3996_1: daśabhis tathāgatabalair caturbhir vaiśāradyaiś catasṛbhiḥ pratisaṃvidbhir mahāmaitryā
S06psp_4u:3996_2: mahākaruṇayā aṣṭādaśabhir āveṇikair buddhadharmair anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyate.
S06psp_4u:3996_3: idaṃ punar bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyopāyakauśalyaṃ yenopāyakauśalyena
S06psp_4u:3996_4: na kaṃcid dharmaṃ bhāvī vā karoty abhāvī vā karoti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_4u:3997: tathā hi bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvadharmāṇāṃ svalakṣaṇaśūnyatāyāṃ sthitas,
S06psp_4u:3998: tatra ca svalakṣaṇaśūnyatāyāṃ sthitvā trīn samādhīn samāpadyate,
S06psp_4u:3999: sattvānāṃ kṛtaśas taiś ca samādhibhiḥ sattvān paripācayati.
S06psp_4u:4000: evaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvas trīn samādhīn samāpadyate,
S06psp_4u:4001: tatra ca bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvas trīṣu samādhiṣu sthitvā sattvāṃś ca praṇidhānena caratas tān apraṇihitena niyojayati,
S06psp_4u:4002: sattvāṃś ca vikalpe caratas tān bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ śūnyatāyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpayati,
S06psp_4u:4003_0: sattvāṃś ca nimitte caratas tān bodhisattvo mahāsattva ānimitte pratiṣṭhāpayati.
S06psp_4u:4003_1: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caraṃs tribhiḥ samādhibhiḥ
S06psp_4u:4004: ity upāyakauśalaṃ gāmbhīryam ity uktaḥ śaikṣo 'vaivartiko gaṇaḥ
S06psp_4u:4005: atha khalv āyuṣmān śāriputra āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim āmantrayate sma:
S06psp_4u:4006: ya āyuṣman subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ svapnāntaragatas trīn samādhīn samāpadyate śūnyatām ānimittam apraṇihitam,
S06psp_4u:4008: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir āyuṣmantaṃ śāriputram etad avocat:
S06psp_4u:4009: yady āyuṣman śāriputra divase bhāvanayā vivardhate,
S06psp_4u:4010: evaṃ svapnāntaragato 'pi vivardhate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_4u:4012: atha khalv āyuṣman śāriputra svapnaś ca divasaś ca,
S06psp_4u:4013: saced āyuṣman śāriputra yadi divase bodhisattvasya (PSP_4:179)
S06psp_4u:4015: tadā svapnāntaragatasyāpi bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitābhāvanā bhaviṣyati. iti bhavaśāntyor akalpanā
S06psp_4u:4016: evam ukte āyuṣmān śāriputra āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
S06psp_4u:4017: yat punar āyuṣman subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ svapnāntaragataḥ karma karoti,
S06psp_4u:4018: bhavati tasya karmaṇa ācayo vā upacayo vā,
S06psp_4u:4020: tathā nāsya bhavaty ācayo vā upacayo vā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_4u:4021: na hi svapne kasyacid dharmasyācavo vā upacayo vā upalabhyate. atha vibuddho vikalpayiṣyati,
S06psp_4u:4023: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir āyuṣmantaṃ śāriputram etad avocat: yaś ca divasaṃ prāṇātipātaṃ kṛto,
S06psp_4u:4024: yaś ca svapnāntare hatas taṃ prativibudho vikalpayati,
S06psp_4u:4025: aho hato mayā hataḥ sādhu hata iti,
S06psp_4u:4027: śāriputra āha: nāyuṣman subhūte anārambaṇakarmotpadyate sārambaṇam eva karmotpadyate.
S06psp_4u:4029_0: evam etad āyuṣman śāriputra nānārambaṇaṃ karmotpadyate nānārambaṇaṃ cetanotpadyate
S06psp_4u:4029_1: sārambaṇam evāyuṣman śāriputra karmotpadyate nānārambaṇaṃ sārambaṇā cetanotpadyate
S06psp_4u:4030: nādṛṣṭair nāśrutair nāmatair nāvijñātair dharmair buddhiḥ pravartate. tatra kācid buddhiḥ saṃkleśaṃ parigṛhṇāti,
S06psp_4u:4032: tasmāt tarhy āyuṣman śāriputra sārambaṇam eva karmotpadyate nānārambaṇaṃ sārambaṇaiva cetanotpadyate nānārambaṇā.
S06psp_4u:4033: śāriputra āha: yady āyuṣman subhūte sarvāṇi karmāṇi sarvāś cetanā viviktā uktā bhagavatā,

S06psp_4u:4036: subhūtir āha: nimittīkṛtyāyuṣman śāriputra sārambaṇam eva karmotpadyate nānārambaṇaṃ,
S06psp_4u:4038: atha khalv āyuṣmān śāriputraḥ subhūtiṃ sthaviram etad avocat:
S06psp_4u:4039: yady āyuṣman subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ svapnāntaragato dānaṃ dadyāc chīlaṃ rakṣet kṣāntyā saṃpādayed vīryam ārabheta dhyānaṃ (PSP_4:180)
S06psp_4u:4041: tac ca kuśalamūlam anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayet pariṇāmitaṃ bhavaty anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye.
S06psp_4u:4042: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtiḥ sthavira āyuṣmantaṃ śāriputram etad avocat:
S06psp_4u:4043: ayam āyuṣman śāriputra maitreyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ saṃmukhībhūta ekajātipratibaddho bhagavatāvinivartanīyatāyai vyākṛta eṣa paripraṣṭavya eṣa visarjayiṣyati.
S06psp_4u:4044: atha khalv āyuṣmān śāriputro maitreyaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvam etad avocat:
S06psp_4u:4046: ayaṃ maitreyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ saṃmukhībhūta ekajātipratibaddho bhagavato 'vinivartanīyatāyai vyākṛta eṣa paripraṣṭavya eṣa visarjayiṣyatīti.

S06psp_4u:4048: tat kiṃ nāmadheyaṃ maitreyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo visarjayiṣyaty,
S06psp_4u:4053: yā vedanāśūnyatā yā saṃjñāśūnyatā yā saṃskāraśūnyatā,

S06psp_4u:4057: tat kiṃ visarjayiṣyati nāhaṃ taṃ dharmaṃ samanupaśyāmi,
S06psp_4u:4061: tam apy ahaṃ dharmaṃ na samanupaśyāmi,
S06psp_4u:4065: tam apy ahaṃ dharmaṃ na samanupaśyāmi sarva ete dharmā advayā advaidhīkārāḥ.
S06psp_4u:4066: atha khalv āyuṣmān śāriputro maitreyaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvam etad avocat:
S06psp_4u:4067: kaścit tvayā maitreya ete dharmā evaṃ sākṣātkṛtā yathaitān dharmān bhāṣase?
S06psp_4u:4068: maitreya āha: na mayaite dharmā evaṃ sākṣātkṛtā yathāham etān dharmān bhāṣe.

S06psp_4u:4072: atha khalu bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ śāriputram etad avocat: tat kiṃ manyase?

S06psp_4u:4188: tathā tathā ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu cariṣyāmi buddhakṣetraṃ ca pariśodhayiṣyāmi,
S06psp_4u:4189: sattvāṃś ca paripācayiṣyāmi yathā me 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhasya tatra buddhakṣetre sattvānāṃ catvāro vyādhayo na bhaviṣyanti na prajñāsyante. katame catvāro?

S06psp_4u:4194: sattvāṃś ca paripācayiṣyāmi yathā me 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhasya tatra buddhakṣetre trayaḥ kleśā na bhaviṣyanti na prajñāsyante. katamāḥ trayo?

S06psp_4u:4201: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu caratābhimānikān sattvān dṛṣṭvaivam upaparikṣitavyaṃ,

S06psp_4u:4207: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu carataivaṃ cittam utpādayitavyaṃ,
S06psp_4u:4209: sacet me tatra buddhakṣetre mitam āyuḥpramāṇaṃ syād mitā ca prabhā,

S06psp_4u:4213: sattvāṃś ca paripācayiṣyāmi yathā me 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhasya tatra buddhakṣetre amitam āyuḥpramāṇaṃ bhaviṣyati,
S06psp_4u:4215: amitaś ca bhikṣusaṃgho bhaviṣyati. evaṃ caran subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ ṣaṭ pāramitāḥ paripūrayati sarvākārajñatāyāś cābhyāsī bhavati.
S06psp_4u:4216: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu carataivam upaparīkṣitavyaṃ,
S06psp_4u:4217: yāvanti gaṅgānadīvālukāsamāni buddhakṣetrāṇi tāvanti mamaikaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ yāvan na bhaven na tāvad aham anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsye,
S06psp_4u:4218: 'pi tu khalu tathā tathā ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu cariṣyāmi,
S06psp_4u:4220_0: sattvāṃś ca paripācayiṣyāmi yathā me 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhasya yāvanti
S06psp_4u:4220_1: gaṅgānadīvālukāsamāni buddhakṣetrāṇi bhavanti mamaikaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ bhaviṣyati.
S06psp_4u:4220_2: evaṃ caran subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ ṣaṭ pāramitāḥ paripūrayati sarvākārajñatāyāś cābhyāsī bhavati.
S06psp_4u:4221: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu carataivam upaparīkṣitavyaṃ,
S06psp_4u:4223: bahur ayaṃ sattvadhātus tenaivaṃ yoniśo manasikartavyam,
S06psp_4u:4227: na ca kaścit parinirvāsyati. evaṃ caran subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ ṣaṭ pāramitāḥ paripūrayati sarvākārajñatāyāś cābhyāsī bhavati.
S06psp_4u:4228: atha khalu tasyāṃ parṣadi gaṅgadevā nāma bhaginī saṃnipatitābhut saṃniṣaṇṇā,
S06psp_4u:4229: sotthāyāsanād ekāṃśam uttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā dakṣiṇaṃ jāmumaṇḍalaṃ pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya yena bhagavāṃs tenāñjaliṃ praṇamya (PSP_4:190)
S06psp_4u:4231: ahaṃ bhagavann ahaṃ sugata ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu caritvaivaṃrūpaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ parigṛhīṣye yathā tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddheneha prajñāpāramitāyām upadiṣṭam.
S06psp_4u:4232: atha khalu sā strī suvarṇapuṣpaṃ gṛhītvā,
S06psp_4u:4236_0: suvarṇavarṇapītavarṇaṃ ca puṣpayugaṃ gṛhītvā yena bhagavāṃs tena kṣipati sma. samanantarakṣiptaṃ
S06psp_4u:4236_1: ca tad dūṣyayugam atha tāvad eva buddhānubhāvenopari vaihāyasam antarīkṣe bhagavato
S06psp_4u:4237: caturasraṃ catuḥsthūṇaṃ samaṃ bhāgaśo ghaṭitaṃ suvibhaktaṃ ramaṇīyaṃ.
S06psp_4u:4238: atha khalu sā strīs tatkūṭāgāraṃ sarvasattvasādhāraṇaṃ kṛtvānuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye pariṇāmayati.
S06psp_4u:4239: atha khalu bhagavāṃs tasyāḥ striyā adhyāśayaṃ viditvā tasyāṃ velāyāṃ smitaṃ prādurakarot,
S06psp_4u:4240: dharmatā khalu punar eṣā buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ yadā smitaṃ prāduḥ kurvanti.
S06psp_4u:4241_0: atha khalu tāvad evānekavarṇā nānāvarṇā arciṣo bhagavato mukhadvārād niścaranti sma.
S06psp_4u:4241_1: tadyathāpi nāma nīlāḥ pītā lohitā avadātā māñjiṣṭhāḥ sphaṭikarajatavarṇās tān anantāparyantān
S06psp_4u:4241_2: lokadhātūn gatvā punar evāgatya bhagavantaṃ tripradakṣiṇīkṛtya bhagavato mūrdhny antarhitāḥ.
S06psp_4u:4242_0: atha khalv āyuṣmān ānanda utthāyāsanād ekāṃsam uttarāsaṅgaṃ cīvaraṃ pravaritvā dakṣiṇaṃ
S06psp_4u:4242_1: jānumaṇḍalaṃ pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya yena bhagavāṃs tenāñjaliṃ praṇamya bhagavantam
S06psp_4u:4244: smitasya prāduṣkaraṇāya nāhetukaṃ nāpratyayaṃ tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ smitaṃ prāduṣkurvanti.
S06psp_4u:4245: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ ānandam etad avocat:
S06psp_4u:4246_0: iyam ānanda gaṅgadevā bhaginī anāgate 'dhvani suvarṇapuṣpo nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho
S06psp_4u:4246_1: loke bhaviṣyati tārakopame kalpe 'yam ānanda etasyā gaṅgadevāyā bhaginyāś caramaḥ
S06psp_4u:4246_2: strībhāvo bhaviṣyati. iyam ānanda gaṅgadevā bhaginī strībhāvaṃ vivarjya puruṣabhāvaṃ
S06psp_4u:4247: sa tatra brahmacaryaṃ cariṣyati. asya khalu punar ānanda bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya suvarṇapuṣpa iti nāmadheyaṃ (PSP_4:191)
S06psp_4u:4248: bhaviṣyati. sa khalu punar ānanda suvarṇapuṣpo bodhisattvo mahāsattvas tataś cyutaḥ samāno buddhakṣetreṇa buddhakṣetraṃ saṃkramiṣyati,
S06psp_4u:4250: tadyathāpi nāṃ ānanda rājā cakravartī prāsādena prāsādaṃ caṅkrāmati,
S06psp_4u:4251: sa yāvajjīvaṃ pādatalābhyāṃ dharaṇīṃ nākrāmati yāvan maraṇakālam iti. evam evānanda suvarṇapuṣpo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo buddhakṣetreṇa buddhakṣetraṃ saṃkramiṣyati,
S06psp_4u:4254: yāvanto bodhisattvā mahāsattvās tatra buddhaksetre saṃnipatitā bhaviṣyanti,
S06psp_4u:4256: atha khalu bhagavān āyuṣmata ānandasya cetasā cetaḥparivitarkam ājñāyāyuṣmantam ānandam etad avocat:
S06psp_4u:4258_0: tathāgatasaṃnipātaḥ sa veditavyo bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ yaḥ saṃnipātaḥ suvarṇapuṣpasya
S06psp_4u:4258_1: ca tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya buddhaksetre na pramāṇabaddho bhikṣusaṃgho bhaviṣyati,
S06psp_4u:4259: na śakyaṃ tasya bhikṣusaṃghasya pramāṇaṃ kartum,
S06psp_4u:4268_1: khalu punar ānanda tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasyānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim
S06psp_4u:4268_2: abhisaṃbuddhasya tatra buddhakṣetra ime doṣāḥ sarveṇa sarvaṃ sarvathā sarvaṃ na bhaviṣyanti na prajñāsyante,
S06psp_4u:4270: evam ukte āyuṣmān ānando bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_4u:4271: kva bhagavann etayā gaṅgadevayā kuśalamūlam avaropitam?
S06psp_4u:4273: dīpaṅkarasyānanda tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasyāntike etayā bhaginyā kuśalamūlam avaropitam anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittam utpāditaṃ,
S06psp_4u:4274: tac ca kuśalamūlam anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye pariṇāmitaṃ,
S06psp_4u:4275: sa ca dīpaṅkaras tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ suvarṇapuṣpair abhyavakīrṇo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhiṃ prārthayamānayā,
S06psp_4u:4276: yadā mayā ānanda dīpaṃkaras tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ pañcabhir (PSP_4:192)
S06psp_4u:4278_0: tadāhaṃ tena dīpaṃkareṇa bhagavatā tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena kuśalamūlasamanvāgato
S06psp_4u:4278_1: 'yam iti viditvā vyākṛto 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau bhaviṣyasi tvam anāgate 'dhvani
S06psp_4u:4278_2: sākyamunir nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavid
S06psp_4u:4278_3: anuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devānāṃ ca manuṣyānāñ ca buddho bhagavāṃs tadā

S06psp_4u:4280_1: tasya dīpaṃkarasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasyāntike prathamaṃ cittam anuttarāyai
S06psp_4u:4281: evam ukte āyuṣmān ānando bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_4u:4282: kṛtaparikarmā bhagavann iyaṃ gaṅgadevā bhaginy anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye.
S06psp_4u:4283: bhagavān āha: evam etad ānanda evam etat,
S06psp_4u:4285: kṛtaparikarmā ānandaiṣā gaṅgadevā bhaginy anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye.
S06psp_4u:4287: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_4u:4288: prajñāpāramitāyāṃ bhagavaṃś caratā bodhisattvena mahāsattvena kathaṃ śūnyatāyāṃ parijayaḥ kartavyaḥ?
S06psp_4u:4294: yāvat kathaṃ bodhipakṣeṣu dharmeṣu parijayaḥ kartavyaḥ?
S06psp_4u:4297: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
S06psp_4u:4298: iha subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā rūpaṃ śūnyam iti pratyavekṣitavyam,
S06psp_4u:4304: evaṃ yāvat kāmadhātuḥ śūnya iti pratyavekṣitavyaḥ,
S06psp_4u:4306: ārūpyadhātuḥ śūnya iti pratyavekṣitavyaḥ. tathā ca pratyavekṣitavyaṃ,
S06psp_4u:4307: yathā pratyavekṣamāṇas tac cittaṃ na vikṣipati,
S06psp_4u:4311: asamanupaśyan na sākṣātkaroti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_4u:4312: tathā hi svalakṣaṇaśūnyair dharmaiḥ suśikṣito na kasyacid dharmasya vyavacchedaṃ karoti,
S06psp_4u:4316: sarvāṃs tān dharmān na saṃyuktān na visaṃyuktān samanupaśyati.
S06psp_4u:4317: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat: yad bhagavān evam āha,
S06psp_4u:4318: na bodhisattvena mahāsattvena śūnyā dharmāḥ sākṣātkartavyā iti. kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ śūnyatāyāṃ sthitaḥ śūnyatāṃ na sākṣātkaroti?
S06psp_4u:4319: bhagavān āha: yadā subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvākāravaropetāṃ śūnyatāṃ pratyavekṣate,
S06psp_4u:4323: nāyaṃ kālaḥ sākṣātkriyāyā iti pratyavekṣate parijayasyāyaṃ kālo nāyaṃ kālaḥ sākṣātkriyāyā iti pratyavekṣate. asamāhita eva bodhisattvo mahāsattva āraṃbaṇe cittam upanibadhnāti,
S06psp_4u:4324: atrāntare bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na parihīyate bodhipakṣair dharmair,
S06psp_4u:4325: na cāsravakṣayaṃ sākṣātkaroti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_4u:4326: evam udārajñānasamanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhaviṣyati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_4u:4327: yo bodhipakṣyeṣu dharmeṣu sthita evaṃ jānāti parijayasyāyaṃ kālo nāyaṃ kālaḥ sākṣātkriyāyā iti.
S06psp_4u:4328: tena khalu punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataivaṃ pratyavekṣitavyaṃ,
S06psp_4u:4336: evaṃ samyakprahāṇarddhipādendriyabalabodhyaṅgānām āryāṣṭāṅgikasya mārgasya bhāvanāyā ayaṃ kālaḥ,
S06psp_4u:4338: adhyātmaśūnyatāyā ayaṃ kālo bahirdhāśūnyatāyā ayaṃ kālo 'dhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatāyā ayaṃ kālo yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāyā ayaṃ kālaḥ,
S06psp_4u:4344: caturṇāṃ vaiśāradyānāṃ pratilābhāyāyaṃ kālaḥ pratisaṃvitpratilābhāyāyaṃ kālo, (PSP_4:194)
S06psp_4u:4352: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran śūnyatāyāṃ ca parijayaṃ karoti,
S06psp_4u:4357: apraṇihitena ca viharati. smṛtyupasthānāni ca bhāvayati smṛtyupasthānaiś ca viharati na ca sākṣātkaroti. evaṃ samyakprahāṇarddhipādendriyabalabodhyaṅgāni,
S06psp_4u:4358: āryāṣṭāṅgikaṃ ca mārgañ ca bhāvayaty āryāṣṭāṅgikena ca mārgeṇa viharati na ca sākṣātkaroti.
S06psp_4u:4359: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bodhipakṣyeṣu dharmeṣu parijayaṃ karoti,
S06psp_4u:4360: bodhipakṣyāṃś ca dharmān bhāvayati bodhipakṣyaiś ca dharmair viharati,
S06psp_4u:4361: na ca srotaāpattiphalaṃ sākṣātkaroti na ca sakṛdāgāmiphalan na cānāgāmiphalan nārhattvaphalaṃ sākṣātkaroti. ity upāyakauśalaprayogaḥ
S06psp_4u:4362: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte kaścid eva puruṣaḥ śūraś ca bhaved,
S06psp_4u:4371: sarvāsu ca catuḥṣaṣṭhiṣu kalāsu pariniṣpanno bhavet,
S06psp_4u:4372: sarvatra ca śilpasthāneṣu ca karmasthāneṣu ca gatiṃgato bhavet,

S06psp_4u:4375: tena ca bahujanaṃ satkuryād gurukuryāt mānayet pūjayet,
S06psp_4u:4376_0: sa bhūyasyā mātrayā āttamanasko bhavet pramuditaḥ prītisaumanasyajātaḥ sa mātāpitṛputradārān
